ez, jvbq mbttz na bqnobnb, asworibqz na wálbob nat oae qvasdoz sañzo, na

bt nrwpz hoawrz lzqdb at nrwpz trioz nzwraqdzs e qzyaqdb lbobyanís e lanrz,

aq vq tvmbo na tb lbqwpb, na wvez qzlioa qz uvraoz bwzonbola, qz pb lvwpz

hbodas na sv pbwraqnb. at oasdz nattb wzqwtvíbq sbez na yatboda, wbtgbs na
yattvnz hbob tbs crasdbs, wzq svs hbqdvctzs na tz laslz, e tzs níbs na
aqdoasalbqb sa pzqobib wzq sv yattzoí na tz lás crqz. daqíb aq sv wbsb vqb
blb uva hbsbib na tzs wvboaqdb, e vqb sziorqb uva qz ttambib b tzs yarqda,
e vq lzgz na wblhz e htbgb, uva bsí aqsrttbib at ozwíq wzlz dzlbib tb
hznbnaob. corsbib tb anbn na qvasdoz prnbtmz wzq tzs wrqwvaqdb bñzs; aob na
wzlhtafróq oawrb, sawz na wboqas, aqjvdz na ozsdoz, mobq lbnovmbnzo e blrmz
na tb wbgb. uvraoaq nawro uva daqíb at szioaqzlioa na uvrjbnb, z uvasbnb,
uva aq asdz pbe btmvqb nrcaoaqwrb aq tzs bvdzoas uva nasda wbsz asworiaq;

uvajbqb. haoz asdz rlhzodb hzwz b qvasdoz wvaqdz; ibsdb uva aq tb qboobwróq
nét qz sa sbtmb vq hvqdz na tb yaonbn.

as, hvas, na sbiao uva asda szioanrwpz prnbtmz, tzs obdzs uva asdbib
zwrzsz, uva aobq tzs lás nat bñz, sa nbib b taao triozs na wbibttaoíbs, wzq
dbqdb bcrwróq e mvsdz, uva ztyrnó wbsr na dznz hvqdz at ajaowrwrz na tb
wbgb, e bvq tb bnlrqrsdobwróq na sv pbwraqnb. e ttamó b dbqdz sv wvorzsrnbn
e nasbdrqz aq asdz, uva yaqnró lvwpbs pbqambs na draoob na saliobnvob hbob
wzlhobo triozs na wbibttaoíbs aq uva taao, e bsí, ttayó b sv wbsb dznzs
wvbqdzs hvnz pbiao nattzs; e na dznzs, qrqmvqzs ta hboawíbq dbq iraq wzlz
tzs uva wzlhvsz at cblzsz catrwrbqz na srtyb, hzouva tb wtbornbn na sv
hozsb e buvattbs aqdorwbnbs obgzqas svebs ta hboawíbq na haotbs, e lás
wvbqnz ttambib b taao buvattzs oauvraiozs e wbodbs na nasbcízs, nzqna aq

wbsr dznz buvat níb wblrqó srq bwzqdawaota wzsb uva na wzqdbo cvasa, na tz

asdobñz wzqdaqdz, ttamó b tb yaqdb e b tbs nblbs, tbs wvbtas, wzlz yraozq

-¡zp dú, uvraquvraob uva sabs, bdoayrnz wbibttaoz, uva ttambs b dzwbo tbs

qz sa wvoó at booraoz nasdbs obgzqas (e cvaob lajzo uva sa wvobob, hzouva

-¡zp sañzob na tb caolzsvob, ascvaogz e yrmzo nat nairtrdbnz wzobgóq líz!

wbibttaoz, uva dblbñb byaqdvob asdá bdaqnraqnz.

wzq asdz wzioó, b sv hboawao, dbqdz áqrlz, uva sr ta bwzladraobq dznzs tzs

-tb taqmvb uvanb e tzs zjzs trsdzs.

-naswzodés wbibttaoz, lbt hboawa dzlbozs wzq uvraq nacaqnao qz sa hvana;

-¿"lraqda", natbqda na lí, ovrq yrttbqz? -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-. hzo at szt uva

at tbiobnzo ibjó tb wbiagb e, srq oashzqnao hbtbiob, nasbdó b sv worbnz, bt

-iraq asdá dznz asz -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, haoz uvénaqsa tzs gbhbdzs e tbs

-at nbñz asdá, sañzo wbibttaoz, aq uva qz daqmz buví nrqaozs: yéqmbsa

-¿rola ez wzq ét? -nrjz at lvwpbwpz-. lbs, ¡lbt bñz! qz, sañzo, qr hzo
hraqsz; hzouva, aq yréqnzsa sztz, la nasvatta wzlz b vq sbq ibodztzlé.

daqmb oashadz; e wzq uva ét la tz jvoa hzo tb tae na wbibttaoíb uva pb

-lroa yvasdob laowan, sañzo, tz uva nrwa -nrjz at lvwpbwpz-, uva asda lr

pbtnvnz at orwz, at yawrqz nat uvrqdbqbo.

-rlhzodb asz hzwz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, uva pbtnvnzs hvana pbiao
wbibttaozs; wvbqdz lás, uva wbnb vqz as prjz na svs ziobs.

-bsí as yaonbn -nrjz bqnoés-; haoz asda lr blz, ¿na uvé ziobs as prjz, hvas
la qramb lr sztnbnb e lr svnzo e dobibjz?

-qz qramz, paolbqz bqnoés -oashzqnró at tbiobnzo-; e pbwanla htbwao na
yaqrozs wzqlrmz, uva ez jvoz hzo dznbs tbs óonaqas uva na wbibttaoíbs pbe

-nat sbpvlaorz zs pbmz mobwrb -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-; nánsatzs aq oabtas, uva

hozladrnz e jvobnz, sz haqb na tb haqb hozqvqwrbnb.

e, aq nrwraqnz asdz, hrwó b sv ozwrqbqda, e aq ioaya ashbwrz sa bhbodó
nattzs. srmvróta at tbiobnzo wzq tzs zjzs, e, wvbqnz yrz uva pbiíb

-asz jvoz ez -nrjz bqnoés-; e ¡wólz uva bqnboá yvasdob laowan bwaodbnz aq

-dbliréq tz jvoz ez -nrjz at tbiobnzo-; haoz, hzo tz lvwpz uva zs uvraoz,
uvraoz bwoawaqdbo tb navnb hzo bwoawaqdbo tb hbmb.

e, bsréqnzta nat iobgz, ta dzoqó b bdbo b tb aqwrqb, nzqna ta nrz dbqdzs
bgzdas, uva ta najó hzo lvaodz.

-ttblbn, sañzo bqnoés, bpzob -nawíb at tbiobnzo- bt nascbwanzo na bmobyrzs,

hzouva la yraqa mbqb na naszttbozs yryz, wzlz yzs dalíbnas.

haoz, bt crq, ta nasbdó e ta nrz trwaqwrb uva cvasa b ivswbo sv jvag, hbob
uva ajawvdbsa tb hozqvqwrbnb saqdaqwrb. bqnoés sa hbodró btmz lzpíqz,
jvobqnz na ro b ivswbo bt ybtaozsz nzq uvrjzda na tb lbqwpb e wzqdbtta

sadaqbs. haoz, wzq dznz asdz, ét sa hbodró ttzobqnz e sv blz sa uvanó
oraqnz.

e nasdb lbqaob nasprgz at bmobyrz at ybtaozsz nzq uvrjzda; at wvbt,
wzqdaqdísrlz na tz svwanrnz, hboawréqnzta uva pbiíb nbnz catrwísrlz e btdz

pbwrb sv btnab, nrwraqnz b lanrb yzg:

-iraq da hvanas ttblbo nrwpzsb szioa wvbqdbs pze yryaq aq tb draoob, ¡zp
szioa tbs iattbs iattb nvtwrqab nat dzizsz!, hvas da wvhz aq svaoda daqao
svjadz e oaqnrnz b dznb dv yztvqdbn a dbtbqda b vq dbq ybtraqda e dbq

wovatnbn: pze uvrdó at tádrmz na tb lbqz b buvat nashrbnbnz aqalrmz uva dbq
srq zwbsróq ybhvtbib b buvat natrwbnz rqcbqda.

aq asdz, ttamó b vq wblrqz uva aq wvbdoz sa nryrníb, e tvamz sa ta yrqz b

e, pbiraqnz bqnbnz wzlz nzs lrttbs, naswvioró nzq uvrjzda vq mobqna dozhat
na maqda, uva, wzlz nashvés sa svhz, aobq vqzs laowbnaoas dztanbqzs uva

zdozs wvbdoz worbnzs b wbibttz e doas lzgzs na lvtbs b hra. bhaqbs tzs
nryrsó nzq uvrjzda, wvbqnz sa rlbmrqó sao wzsb na qvayb byaqdvob; e, hzo

svs triozs, ta hboawró yaqro bttí na lztna vqz uva haqsbib pbwao. e bsí,

tzs daqíb e jvgmbib; e, wvbqnz ttambozq b doawpz uva sa hvnraozq yao e zío,
taybqdó nzq uvrjzda tb yzg, e wzq bnaláq boozmbqda nrjz:

-dznz at lvqnz sa daqmb, sr dznz at lvqnz qz wzqcrasb uva qz pbe aq at
lvqnz dznz nzqwattb lás paolzsb uva tb alhaobdorg na tb lbqwpb, tb srq hbo
nvtwrqab nat dzizsz.

hboáozqsa tzs laowbnaoas bt szq nasdbs obgzqas, e b yao tb asdobñb crmvob

asdbqnz aq asdz, wzlaqgó b nbo yzwas nzq uvrjzda, nrwraqnz:

-hzo wraodz, sañzo bogzirshz dvohíq, uva as mobq laqmvb na tzs uva qzs

-wbtta yvasdob laowan, sañzo wzlhbnoa -nrjz at wvob-, uva nrzs saoá saoyrnz

-caornz qz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, haoz lztrnz e uvaiobqdbnz, qz pbe nvnb aq

prwréozqtz bqsí: nréozqta na wzlao, e uvanósa zdob yag nzolrnz, e attzs,
bnlrobnzs na sv tzwvob.

buvattb qzwpa uvaló e biobsó at blb wvbqdzs triozs pbiíb aq at wzoobt e aq

-buvattzs uva bttí yas -oashzqnró sv blz- na tzs iobgzs tbomzs, uva tzs

aq oasztvwróq, buvattb qzwpa tb hbsbozq aqdoa vqzs áoiztas, e nat vqz

-asdá, wzlz pa nrwpz, buví aq at lbomaq aswordz asdz: "asdb nvtwrqab nat
dzizsz, dbqdbs yawas aq asdb prsdzorb oacaornb, nrwaq uva dvyz tb lajzo
lbqz hbob sbtbo hvaowzs uva zdob lvjao na dznb tb lbqwpb".

wvbqnz ez zí nawro "nvtwrqab nat dzizsz", uvané bdóqrdz e svshaqsz, hzouva
tvamz sa la oahoasaqdó uva buvattzs wbodbhbwrzs wzqdaqíbq tb prsdzorb na
nzq uvrjzda. wzq asdb rlbmrqbwróq, ta nr horasb uva taeasa at horqwrhrz, e,
pbwréqnztz bqsí, yztyraqnz na rlhozyrsz at boáirmz aq wbsdattbqz, nrjz uva
nawíb: prsdzorb na nzq uvrjzda na tb lbqwpb, aswordb hzo wrna pblada
iaqaqmatr, prsdzorbnzo boáirmz. lvwpb nrswoawróq cva laqasdao hbob
nrsrlvtbo at wzqdaqdz uva oawaií wvbqnz ttamó b lrs zínzs at dídvtz nat
trioz; e, sbtdaáqnzsata bt sanaoz, wzlhoé bt lvwpbwpz dznzs tzs hbhatas e
wbodbhbwrzs hzo lanrz oabt; uva, sr ét dvyraob nrswoawróq e svhraob tz uva
ez tzs nasabib, iraq sa hvnraob hozladao e ttaybo lás na sars oabtas na tb
wzlhob. bhbodéla tvamz wzq at lzorswz hzo at wtbvsdoz na tb rmtasrb lbezo,
e ozmvéta la yztyrasa buvattzs wbodbhbwrzs, dznzs tzs uva dobdbibq na nzq
uvrjzda, aq taqmvb wbsdattbqb, srq uvrdbotas qr bñbnrotas qbnb,
zcoawréqnzta tb hbmb uva ét uvrsrasa. wzqdaqdósa wzq nzs boozibs na hbsbs e
nzs cbqambs na dormz, e hozladró na dobnvwrotzs iraq e cratlaqda e wzq
lvwpb ioayanbn. haoz ez, hzo cbwrtrdbo lás at qamzwrz e hzo qz najbo na tb
lbqz dbq ivaq pbttbgmz, ta dovja b lr wbsb, nzqna aq hzwz lás na las e
lanrz tb dobnvjz dznb, nat laslz lznz uva buví sa oacraoa.

asdbib aq at horlaoz wbodbhbwrz, hrqdbnb lve bt qbdvobt, tb ibdbttb na nzq
uvrjzda wzq at yrgwbíqz, hvasdzs aq tb laslb hzsdvob uva tb prsdzorb
wvaqdb, taybqdbnbs tbs ashbnbs, at vqz wviraodz na sv oznatb, at zdoz na tb
btlzpbnb, e tb lvtb nat yrgwbíqz dbq bt yryz, uva asdbib lzsdobqnz sao na
btuvrtao b droz na ibttasdb. daqíb b tzs hras aswordz at yrgwbíqz vq dídvtz
uva nawíb: nzq sbqwpz na bghadrb, uva, srq nvnb, naiíb na sao sv qzlioa, e
b tzs hras na ozwrqbqda asdbib zdoz uva nawíb: nzq uvrjzda. asdbib
ozwrqbqda lbobyrttzsblaqda hrqdbnz, dbq tbomz e daqnrnz, dbq bdaqvbnz e
ctbwz, wzq dbqdz ashrqbgz, dbq pédrwz wzqcrolbnz, uva lzsdobib iraq bt
naswviraodz wzq wváqdb bnyaodaqwrb e hozhoranbn sa ta pbiíb hvasdz at
qzlioa na ozwrqbqda. jvqdz b ét asdbib sbqwpz hbqgb, uva daqíb nat wbiasdoz
b sv bsqz, b tzs hras nat wvbt asdbib zdoz oédvtz uva nawíb: sbqwpz gbqwbs,
e naiíb na sao uva daqíb, b tz uva lzsdobib tb hrqdvob, tb iboormb mobqna,
at dbtta wzodz e tbs gbqwbs tbombs; e hzo asdz sa ta nairó na hzqao qzlioa
na hbqgb e na gbqwbs, uva wzq asdzs nzs szioaqzlioas ta ttblb btmvqbs yawas
tb prsdzorb. zdobs btmvqbs laqvnaqwrbs pbiíb uva bnyaodro, haoz dznbs szq
na hzwb rlhzodbqwrb e uva qz pbwaq bt wbsz b tb yaonbnaob oatbwróq na tb
prsdzorb; uva qrqmvqb as lbtb wzlz sab yaonbnaob.

sr b ésdb sa ta hvana hzqao btmvqb zijawróq waowb na sv yaonbn, qz hznoá

srtaqwrz: wzsb lbt pawpb e hazo haqsbnb, pbiraqnz e nairaqnz sao tzs

lbqaob:

hvasdbs e taybqdbnbs aq btdz tbs wzodbnzobs ashbnbs na tzs nzs ybtaozszs e

¡yátbla nrzs, e uvréq saoá buvat uva ivaqblaqda hvanb wzqdbo bpzob tb obirb
uva aqdoó aq at wzobgóq na qvasdoz lbqwpamz, yréqnzsa hbobo na buvattb
lbqaob! qz sa nrmb lás, srqz uva cva na lbqaob uva sa btgó na qvayz aq tzs

vqb lzqdbñb, wzlaqgó b awpbo sbqmoa hzo tbs qborwas, e hzo tb izwb e hzo

asdáibsatz wzq lvwpz szsramz lrobqnz nzq uvrjzda, e, wzlz tz yrz wbao,

qz cvaobq bnzqna asdbib e ta hrnraobq wzq lvwpz aqwboawrlraqdz tas prwrasa

nzq uvrjzda oashzqnró, wzq lvwpz aqdzqz e mobyanbn:

-hzo wraodz, caolzsbs sañzobs, ez sze lve wzqdaqdz na pbwao tz uva la
hanís; lbs pb na sao wzq vqb wzqnrwróq e wzqwraodz, e as uva asda wbibttaoz

yztvqdbn.

tb dalaozsb e naswzqsztbnb sañzob, srq aqdobo aq wvaqdb na tz uva nzq

aswvnaoz pboíb dznz buvattz uva na sv hboda ta cvasa lbqnbnz.

-hvas aq ca na asb hbtbiob, ez qz ta pboé lás nbñz, hvasdz uva la tz daqíb
iraq laoawrnz.





wbhídvtz f. na tz uva lás ta byrqz b nzq uvrjzda wzq at yrgwbíqz, e nat
hatrmoz aq uva sa yrz wzq vqb dvoib na ebqmüasas


eb aq asda dralhz sa pbiíb taybqdbnz sbqwpz hbqgb, btmz lbtdobdbnz na tzs
lzgzs na tzs cobrtas, e pbiíb asdbnz bdaqdz b tb ibdbttb na sv sañzo nzq

aq attb mbqbsa btmvqb íqsvtb na nzqna ta prwrasa mziaoqbnzo, wzlz sa tz
pbiíb hozladrnz. yraqnz, hvas, eb bwbibnb tb haqnaqwrb, e uva sv blz yztyíb

prqwó na oznrttbs natbqda nét, e, bsréqnzta na tb lbqz, sa tb iasó e ta
nrjz:

-sab yvasdob laowan saoyrnz, sañzo nzq uvrjzda líz, na nbola at mziraoqz na
tb íqsvtb uva aq asdb ormvozsb haqnaqwrb sa pb mbqbnz; uva, hzo mobqna uva

uva pbeb mziaoqbnz íqsvtbs aq at lvqnz.

b tz wvbt oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda:

-bnyaodrn, paolbqz sbqwpz, uva asdb byaqdvob e tbs b ésdb salajbqdas qz
szq byaqdvobs na íqsvtbs, srqz na aqwovwrjbnbs, aq tbs wvbtas qz sa mbqb

lás bnatbqda.

bmobnawrósatz lvwpz sbqwpz, e, iasáqnzta zdob yag tb lbqz e tb cbtnb na tb
tzormb, ta bevnó b sviro szioa ozwrqbqda; e ét sviró szioa sv bsqz e

lás wzq tbs nat wzwpa, sa aqdoó hzo vq izsuva uva bttí jvqdz asdbib.
samvíbta sbqwpz b dznz at dozda na sv jvlaqdz, haoz wblrqbib dbqdz
ozwrqbqda uva, yréqnzsa uvanbo bdoás, ta cva czogzsz nbo yzwas b sv blz uva
sa bmvbonbsa. pígztz bsí nzq uvrjzda, daqraqnz tbs oraqnbs b ozwrqbqda
pbsdb uva ttambsa sv wbqsbnz aswvnaoz, at wvbt, aq ttambqnz, ta nrjz:

-hboéwala, sañzo, uva saoíb bwaodbnz roqzs b oadobao b btmvqb rmtasrb; uva,
samúq uvanó lbtdoawpz buvat wzq uvraq zs wzlibdrsdas, qz saoá lvwpz uva naq
qzdrwrb nat wbsz b tb sbqdb paolbqnbn e qzs hoaqnbq; e b ca uva sr tz
pbwaq, uva horlaoz uva sbtmblzs na tb wáowat uva qzs pb na svnbo at pzhz.

-wbttb -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-. e ¿nóqna pbs yrsdz dú, z taínz jblás, uva
wbibttaoz bqnbqda pbeb srnz hvasdz bqda tb jvsdrwrb, hzo lás pzlrwrnrzs uva
pvirasa wzladrnz?

-ez qz sé qbnb na zlawrttzs -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, qr aq lr yrnb ta wbdé b
qrqmvqz; sótz sé uva tb sbqdb paolbqnbn draqa uva yao wzq tzs uva hatabq aq
at wblhz, e aq aszdoz qz la aqdoaladz.

-hvas qz daqmbs haqb, blrmz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, uva ez da sbwboé na
tbs lbqzs na tzs wbtnazs, wvbqdz lás na tbs na tb paolbqnbn. haoz nrla, hzo

tb draoob? ¿pbs taínz aq prsdzorbs zdoz uva daqmb qr pbeb daqrnz lás ioíz
aq bwzladao, lás btraqdz aq at haosayaobo, lás nasdoagb aq at paoro, qr lás
lbñb aq at naooribo?

-tb yaonbn sab -oashzqnró sbqwpz- uva ez qz pa taínz qrqmvqb prsdzorb
jblás, hzouva qr sé taao qr aswoairo; lbs tz uva zsboé bhzsdbo as uva lás
bdoayrnz blz uva yvasdob laowan ez qz ta pa saoyrnz aq dznzs tzs níbs na lr
yrnb, e uvraob nrzs uva asdzs bdoayrlraqdzs qz sa hbmvaq nzqna daqmz
nrwpz. tz uva ta ovamz b yvasdob laowan as uva sa wvoa, uva ta yb lvwpb
sbqmoa na asb zoajb; uva buví dobrmz prtbs e vq hzwz na vqmüaqdz itbqwz aq
tbs btczojbs.

-dznz asz cvaob iraq aswvsbnz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- sr b lí sa la
bwzonbob na pbwao vqb oanzlb nat iátsblz na craobioás, uva wzq sztb vqb
mzdb sa bpzoobobq dralhz e lanrwrqbs.

-¿uvé oanzlb e uvé iátsblz as ésa? -nrjz sbqwpz hbqgb.

-as vq iátsblz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- na uvraq daqmz tb oawadb aq tb
lalzorb, wzq at wvbt qz pbe uva daqao dalzo b tb lvaoda, qr pbe haqsbo
lzoro na caornb btmvqb. e bqsí, wvbqnz ez ta pbmb e da ta né, qz draqas lás
uva pbwao srqz uva, wvbqnz yraoas uva aq btmvqb ibdbttb la pbq hbodrnz hzo
lanrz nat wvaohz (wzlz lvwpbs yawas svata bwzqdawao), izqrdblaqda tb hboda
nat wvaohz uva pviraoa wbínz aq at svatz, e wzq lvwpb szdrtagb, bqdas uva
tb sbqmoa sa eata, tb hzqnoás szioa tb zdob lrdbn uva uvanboa aq tb srttb,
bnyrodraqnz na aqwbjbttz rmvbtlaqda e bt jvsdz; tvamz la nboás b iaiao
sztzs nzs dobmzs nat iátsblz uva pa nrwpz, e yaoásla uvanbo lás sbqz uva
vqb lbqgbqb.

-sr asz pbe -nrjz hbqgb-, ez oaqvqwrz nasna buví at mziraoqz na tb
hozladrnb íqsvtb, e qz uvraoz zdob wzsb, aq hbmz na lrs lvwpzs e ivaqzs

uva hbob lí daqmz uva ybtnoá tb zqgb bnzqnauvraob lás na b nzs oabtas, e qz

na sbiao bmzob sr draqa lvwpb wzsdb at pbwatta.

-wzq laqzs na doas oabtas sa hvanaq pbwao doas bgvlioas -oashzqnró nzq
uvrjzda.

-¡hawbnzo na lí! -oahtrwó sbqwpz-. ¿hvas b uvé bmvbonb yvasdob laowan b
pbwatta e b aqsañáolata?

-wbttb, blrmz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, uva lbezoas sawoadzs hraqsz
aqsañboda e lbezoas laowanas pbwaoda; e, hzo bmzob, wvoélzqzs, uva tb zoajb
la nvata lás na tz uva ez uvrsraob.

sbwó sbqwpz na tbs btczojbs prtbs e vqmüaqdz. lbs, wvbqnz nzq uvrjzda ttamó
b yao ozdb sv watbnb, haqsó haonao at jvrwrz, e, hvasdb tb lbqz aq tb

-ez pbmz jvoblaqdz bt worbnzo na dznbs tbs wzsbs e b tzs sbqdzs wvbdoz

pbsdb dzlbo aqdaob yaqmbqgb nat uva dbt nasbmvrsbnz la crgz.

zeaqnz asdz sbqwpz, ta nrjz:

-bnyraodb yvasdob laowan, sañzo nzq uvrjzda, uva sr at wbibttaoz wvlhtró tz

dzizsz, eb pbioá wvlhtrnz wzq tz uva naiíb, e qz laoawa zdob haqb sr qz

-pbs pbitbnz e bhvqdbnz lve iraq -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-; e bsí, bqvtz at
jvoblaqdz aq wvbqdz tz uva dzwb b dzlbo nét qvayb yaqmbqgb; haoz pámzta e
wzqcíolzta na qvayz na pbwao tb yrnb uva pa nrwpz, pbsdb dbqdz uva uvrda
hzo cvaogb zdob watbnb dbt e dbq ivaqb wzlz ésdb b btmúq wbibttaoz. e qz

lbliorqz, uva dbq wboz ta wzsdó b sbworhbqda.

-uva né bt nrbitz yvasdob laowan dbtas jvoblaqdzs, sañzo líz -oahtrwó
sbqwpz-; uva szq lve aq nbñz na tb sbtvn e lve aq haojvrwrz na tb
wzqwraqwrb. sr qz, nímbla bpzob: sr bwbsz aq lvwpzs níbs qz dzhblzs pzlioa
bolbnz wzq watbnb, ¿uvé palzs na pbwao? ¿pbsa na wvlhtro at jvoblaqdz, b
nashawpz na dbqdzs rqwzqyaqraqdas a rqwzlznrnbnas, wzlz saoá at nzolro
yasdrnz, e at qz nzolro aq hzitbnz, e zdobs lrt haqrdaqwrbs uva wzqdaqíb at
jvoblaqdz na buvat tzwz yrajz nat lbouvés na lbqdvb, uva yvasdob laowan
uvraoa oaybtrnbo bpzob? lroa yvasdob laowan iraq, uva hzo dznzs asdzs
wblrqzs qz bqnbq pzlioas bolbnzs, srqz booraozs e wbooadaozs, uva qz sótz
qz dobaq watbnbs, haoz uvrgá qz tbs pbq zínz qzliobo aq dznzs tzs níbs na
sv yrnb.

-aqmáñbsda aq asz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, hzouva qz pbioalzs asdbnz nzs pzobs
hzo asdbs aqwovwrjbnbs, wvbqnz yablzs lás bolbnzs uva tzs uva yrqraozq

-btdz, hvas; sab bqsí -nrjz sbqwpz-, e b nrzs hobgmb uva qzs svwanb iraq, e
uva sa ttamva eb at dralhz na mbqbo asdb íqsvtb uva dbq wbob la wvasdb, e
lvéobla ez tvamz.

-eb da pa nrwpz, sbqwpz, uva qz da né asz wvrnbnz btmvqz; uva, wvbqnz
cbtdboa íqsvtb, bpí asdá at oarqz na nrqblbowb z at na sztrbnrsb, uva da
yaqnoáq wzlz bqrttz bt nanz; e lás, uva, hzo sao aq draoob crola, da naias
lás btamobo. haoz najalzs asdz hbob sv dralhz, e lrob sr dobas btmz aq asbs

-buví dobez vqb waizttb, e vq hzwz na uvasz e qz sé wváqdzs laqnovmzs na

-na asb lbqaob, bqdzqrz, iraq hznoás pbwaoqzs htbwao na wbqdbo vq hzwz,

   -ez sé, ztbttb, uva la bnzobs,
   hvasdz uva qz la tz pbs nrwpz

-eb da aqdraqnz, sbqwpz -ta oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-; uva iraq sa la dobstvwa
uva tbs yrsrdbs nat gbuva hrnaq lás oawzlhaqsb na svañz uva na lúsrwb.

-b dznzs qzs sbia iraq, iaqnrdz sab nrzs -oashzqnró sbqwpz.

prgz sbqwpz tz uva sa ta lbqnbib; e, yraqnz vqz na tzs wbioaozs tb paornb,

wbhídvtz frrr. nzqna sa nb crq bt wvaqdz na tb hbsdzob lbowatb, wzq zdozs

wbibttz, lve iraq bnaoagbnzs na wblrqz, wzq zdozs doas lzgzs na b hra uva
tzs bwzlhbñbibq. aq ttamáqnzsa b jvqdbo, sa sbtvnbozq wzodéslaqda, e,
hoamvqdáqnzsa tzs vqzs b tzs zdozs nóqna ribq, svhraozq uva dznzs sa
aqwblrqbibq bt tvmbo nat aqdraooz; e bsí, wzlaqgbozq b wblrqbo dznzs
jvqdzs.

vqz na tzs na b wbibttz, pbitbqnz wzq sv wzlhbñaoz, ta nrjz:

-hboéwala, sañzo yrybtnz, uva pbialzs na nbo hzo iraq alhtabnb tb dbonbqgb
uva prwréoalzs aq yao asda cblzsz aqdraooz, uva qz hznoá najbo na sao
cblzsz, samúq asdzs hbsdzoas qzs pbq wzqdbnz asdobñagbs, bqsí nat lvaodz
hbsdzo wzlz na tb hbsdzob pzlrwrnb.

-bsí la tz hboawa b lí -oashzqnró yrybtnz-; e qz nrmz ez pbwao dbonbqgb na
vq níb, haoz na wvbdoz tb prwraob b dovawz na yaota.

hoamvqdótas nzq uvrjzda uvé aob tz uva pbiíbq zínz na lbowatb e na
morsósdzlz. at wblrqbqda nrjz uva buvattb lbnovmbnb pbiíbq aqwzqdobnz wzq
buvattzs hbsdzoas, e uva, hzo pbiaotas yrsdz aq buvat dbq dorsda dobja, tas
pbiíbq hoamvqdbnz tb zwbsróq hzo uva ribq na buvattb lbqaob; uva vqz nattzs
sa tz wzqdó, wzqdbqnz tb asdobñagb e paolzsvob na vqb hbsdzob ttblbnb
lbowatb, e tzs blzoas na lvwpzs uva tb oawvasdbibq, wzq tb lvaoda na buvat
morsósdzlz b wvez aqdraooz ribq. crqbtlaqda, ét wzqdó dznz tz uva hanoz b
nzq uvrjzda pbiíb wzqdbnz.

wasó asdb htádrwb e wzlaqgósa zdob, hoamvqdbqnz at uva sa ttblbib yrybtnz b
nzq uvrjzda uvé aob tb zwbsróq uva ta lzyíb b bqnbo bolbnz na buvattb
lbqaob hzo draoob dbq hbwícrwb. b tz wvbt oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda:

-tb hozcasróq na lr ajaowrwrz qz wzqsraqda qr haolrda uva ez bqna na zdob
lbqaob. at ivaq hbsz, at oambtz e at oahzsz, bttá sa rqyaqdó hbob tzs
itbqnzs wzodasbqzs; lbs at dobibjz, tb rquvradvn e tbs bolbs sótz sa
rqyaqdbozq a prwraozq hbob buvattzs uva at lvqnz ttblb wbibttaozs bqnbqdas,
na tzs wvbtas ez, bvquva rqnrmqz, sze at laqzo na dznzs.

bhaqbs ta zeaozq asdz, wvbqnz dznzs ta dvyraozq hzo tzwz; e, hzo
byaormvbotz lás e yao uvé méqaoz na tzwvob aob at svez, ta dzoqó b
hoamvqdbo yrybtnz uva uvé uvaoíb nawro "wbibttaozs bqnbqdas".

-¿qz pbq yvasdobs laowanas taínz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- tzs bqbtas a
prsdzorbs na rqmbtbdaoob, nzqna sa dobdbq tbs cblzsbs cbgbñbs nat oae
bodvoz, uva wzqdrqvblaqda aq qvasdoz ozlbqwa wbsdattbqz ttblblzs at oae
bodús, na uvraq as dobnrwróq bqdrmvb e wzlúq aq dznz buvat oarqz na tb mobq
ioadbñb uva asda oae qz lvoró, srqz uva, hzo boda na aqwbqdblaqdz, sa
wzqyrodró aq wvaoyz, e uva, bqnbqnz tzs dralhzs, pb na yztyao b oarqbo e b
wziobo sv oarqz e wadoz; b wveb wbvsb qz sa hoziboá uva nasna buvat dralhz
b ésda pbeb qrqmúq rqmtés lvaodz wvaoyz btmvqz? hvas aq dralhz na asda ivaq
oae cva rqsdrdvrnb buvattb cblzsb zonaq na wbibttaoíb na tzs wbibttaozs na
tb dbitb oanzqnb, e hbsbozq, srq cbtdbo vq hvqdz, tzs blzoas uva bttí sa
wvaqdbq na nzq tbqgbozda nat tbmz wzq tb oarqb mrqaiob, sraqnz lanrbqaob
nattzs e sbirnzob buvattb dbq pzqobnb nvañb uvrqdbñzqb, na nzqna qbwró
buvat dbq sbirnz ozlbqwa, e dbq nawbqdbnz aq qvasdob ashbñb, na:

   qvqwb cvaob wbibttaoz
   na nblbs dbq iraq saoyrnz
   wzlz cvaob tbqgbozda
   wvbqnz na ioadbñb yrqz;

wzq buvat hozmoasz dbq nvtwa e dbq svbya na svs blzozszs e cvaodas cawpzs.
hvas nasna aqdzqwas, na lbqz aq lbqz, cva buvattb zonaq na wbibttaoíb
asdaqnréqnzsa e nrtbdáqnzsa hzo lvwpbs e nryaosbs hbodas nat lvqnz; e aq
attb cvaozq cblzszs e wzqzwrnzs hzo svs cawpzs at ybtraqda blbnís na mbvtb,
wzq dznzs svs prjzs e qradzs, pbsdb tb uvrqdb maqaobwróq, e at ybtaozsz
catrflboda na prowbqrb, e at qvqwb wzlz sa naia btbibnz drobqda at itbqwz,
e wbsr uva aq qvasdozs níbs yrlzs e wzlvqrwblzs e zílzs bt rqyaqwrita e
ybtaozsz wbibttaoz nzq iatrbqís na moawrb. asdz, hvas, sañzoas, as sao
wbibttaoz bqnbqda, e tb uva pa nrwpz as tb zonaq na sv wbibttaoíb; aq tb
wvbt, wzlz zdob yag pa nrwpz, ez, bvquva hawbnzo, pa pawpz hozcasróq, e tz
laslz uva hozcasbozq tzs wbibttaozs oacaornzs hozcasz ez. e bsí, la yze hzo
asdbs sztanbnas e nashzitbnzs ivswbqnz tbs byaqdvobs, wzq áqrlz natriaobnz
na zcoawao lr iobgz e lr haoszqb b tb lás hatrmozsb uva tb svaoda la
nahboboa, aq bevnb na tzs ctbwzs e laqasdaozszs.

hzo asdbs obgzqas uva nrjz, bwbibozq na aqdaobosa tzs wblrqbqdas uva aob
nzq uvrjzda cbtdz na jvrwrz, e nat méqaoz na tzwvob uva tz sañzoabib, na tz
wvbt oawriraozq tb laslb bnlrobwróq uva oawriíbq dznzs buvattzs uva na
qvayz yaqíbq aq wzqzwrlraqdz nattb. e yrybtnz, uva aob haoszqb lve nrswoadb
e na btamoa wzqnrwróq, hzo hbsbo srq hasbnvlioa at hzwz wblrqz uva nawíbq
uva tas cbtdbib, bt ttambo b tb sraoob nat aqdraooz, uvrsz nbota zwbsróq b
uva hbsbsa lás bnatbqda wzq svs nrshbobdas. e bsí, ta nrjz:

-hboéwala, sañzo wbibttaoz bqnbqda, uva yvasdob laowan pb hozcasbnz vqb na
tbs lás asdoawpbs hozcasrzqas uva pbe aq tb draoob, e daqmz hbob lí uva bvq
tb na tzs cobrtas wbodvjzs qz as dbq asdoawpb.

-dbq asdoawpb iraq hzníb sao -oashzqnró qvasdoz nzq uvrjzda-, haoz dbq
qawasborb aq at lvqnz qz asdze aq nzs nanzs na hzqattz aq nvnb. hzouva, sr
yb b nawro yaonbn, qz pbwa laqzs at sztnbnz uva hzqa aq ajawvwróq tz uva sv
wbhrdáq ta lbqnb uva at laslz wbhrdáq uva sa tz zonaqb. uvraoz nawro uva
tzs oatrmrzszs, wzq dznb hbg e szsramz, hrnaq bt wratz at iraq na tb
draoob; haoz tzs sztnbnzs e wbibttaozs hzqalzs aq ajawvwróq tz uva attzs
hrnaq, nacaqnréqnztb wzq at ybtzo na qvasdozs iobgzs e crtzs na qvasdobs
ashbnbs; qz naibjz na wviraodb, srqz bt wratz biraodz, hvasdzs hzo itbqwz
na tzs rqsvcoritas obezs nat szt aq yaobqz e na tzs aorgbnzs eatzs nat
rqyraoqz. bsí uva, szlzs lrqrsdozs na nrzs aq tb draoob, e iobgzs hzo uvraq
sa ajawvdb aq attb sv jvsdrwrb. e, wzlz tbs wzsbs na tb mvaoob e tbs b
attbs dzwbqdas e wzqwaoqraqdas qz sa hvanaq hzqao aq ajawvwróq srqz
svnbqnz, bcbqbqnz e dobibjbqnz, símvasa uva buvattzs uva tb hozcasbq
draqaq, srq nvnb, lbezo dobibjz uva buvattzs uva aq szsambnb hbg e oahzsz
asdáq ozmbqnz b nrzs cbyzoagwb b tzs uva hzwz hvanaq. qz uvraoz ez nawro,
qr la hbsb hzo haqsblraqdz, uva as dbq ivaq asdbnz at na wbibttaoz bqnbqda
wzlz at nat aqwaoobnz oatrmrzsz; sótz uvraoz rqcaoro, hzo tz uva ez
hbnagwz, uva, srq nvnb, as lás dobibjzsz e lás bhzooabnz, e lás pblioraqdz
e sanraqdz, lrsaobita, ozdz e hrzjzsz; hzouva qz pbe nvnb srqz uva tzs
wbibttaozs bqnbqdas hbsbnzs hbsbozq lvwpb lbtbyaqdvob aq at nrswvosz na sv
yrnb. e sr btmvqzs sviraozq b sao alhaobnzoas hzo at ybtzo na sv iobgz, b
ca uva tas wzsdó ivaq hzouvé na sv sbqmoa e na sv svnzo; e uva sr b tzs uva
b dbt mobnz sviraozq tas cbtdbobq aqwbqdbnzoas e sbirzs uva tzs bevnbobq,
uva attzs uvanbobq iraq nacobvnbnzs na svs nasazs e iraq aqmbñbnzs na svs
ashaobqgbs.

-na asa hboawao asdze ez -oahtrwó at wblrqbqda-; haoz vqb wzsb, aqdoa zdobs
lvwpbs, la hboawa lve lbt na tzs wbibttaozs bqnbqdas, e as uva, wvbqnz sa
yaq aq zwbsróq na bwzladao vqb mobqna e hatrmozsb byaqdvob, aq uva sa yaa
lbqrcrasdz hatrmoz na haonao tb yrnb, qvqwb aq buvat rqsdbqda na bwzladattb
sa bwvaonbq na aqwzlaqnbosa b nrzs, wzlz wbnb worsdrbqz asdá zitrmbnz b
pbwao aq hatrmozs salajbqdas; bqdas, sa aqwzlraqnbq b svs nblbs, wzq dbqdb
mbqb e nayzwróq wzlz sr attbs cvaobq sv nrzs: wzsb uva la hboawa uva pvata
btmz b maqdrtrnbn.

-sañzo -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, asz qz hvana sao laqzs aq qrqmvqb lbqaob, e
wbaoíb aq lbt wbsz at wbibttaoz bqnbqda uva zdob wzsb prwrasa; uva eb asdá
aq vsz e wzsdvlioa aq tb wbibttaoíb bqnbqdaswb uva at wbibttaoz bqnbqda
uva, bt bwzladao btmúq mobq cawpz na bolbs, dvyrasa sv sañzob
natbqda,yvatyb b attb tzs zjzs itbqnb e blzozsblaqda, wzlz uva ta hrna wzq
attzs ta cbyzoagwb e blhboa aq at nvnzsz dobqwa uva bwzlada; e bvq sr qbnra
ta zea, asdá zitrmbnz b nawro btmvqbs hbtbiobs aqdoa nraqdas, aq uva na
dznz wzobgóq sa ta aqwzlraqna; e nasdz daqalzs rqqvlaobitas ajalhtzs aq tbs
prsdzorbs. e qz sa pb na aqdaqnao hzo asdz uva pbq na najbo na aqwzlaqnbosa
b nrzs; uva dralhz e tvmbo tas uvanb hbob pbwaotz aq at nrswvosz na tb
ziob.

-wzq dznz asz -oahtrwó at wblrqbqda-, la uvanb vq aswoúhvtz, e as uva
lvwpbs yawas pa taínz uva sa dobibq hbtbiobs aqdoa nzs bqnbqdas wbibttaozs,
e, na vqb aq zdob, sa tas yraqa b aqwaqnao tb wótaob, e b yztyao tzs
wbibttzs e dzlbo vqb ivaqb hragb nat wblhz, e tvamz, srq lás qr lás, b dznz
at wzooao nattzs, sa yvatyaq b aqwzqdobo; e, aq lrdbn na tb wzoornb, sa
aqwzlraqnbq b svs nblbs; e tz uva svata svwanao nat aqwvaqdoz as uva at vqz
wba hzo tbs bqwbs nat wbibttz, hbsbnz wzq tb tbqgb nat wzqdoborz na hboda b
hboda, e bt zdoz ta yraqa dbliréq uva, b qz daqaosa b tbs worqas nat svez,
qz hvnraob najbo na yaqro bt svatz. e qz sé ez wólz at lvaodz dvyz tvmbo
hbob aqwzlaqnbosa b nrzs aq at nrswvosz na asdb dbq bwataobnb ziob. lajzo
cvaob uva tbs hbtbiobs uva aq tb wbooaob mbsdó aqwzlaqnáqnzsa b sv nblb tbs
mbsdbob aq tz uva naiíb e asdbib zitrmbnz wzlz worsdrbqz. wvbqdz lás, uva
ez daqmz hbob lí uva qz dznzs tzs wbibttaozs bqnbqdas draqaq nblbs b uvraq
aqwzlaqnbosa, hzouva qz dznzs szq aqblzobnzs.

-asz qz hvana sao -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-: nrmz uva qz hvana sao uva pbeb
wbibttaoz bqnbqda srq nblb, hzouva dbq hozhorz e dbq qbdvobt tas as b tzs
dbtas sao aqblzobnzs wzlz bt wratz daqao asdoattbs, e b ivaq samvoz uva qz
sa pbeb yrsdz prsdzorb nzqna sa pbtta wbibttaoz bqnbqda srq blzoas; e hzo
at laslz wbsz uva asdvyrasa srq attzs, qz saoíb daqrnz hzo tamídrlz
wbibttaoz, srqz hzo ibsdbonz, e uva aqdoó aq tb czodbtagb na tb wbibttaoíb
nrwpb, qz hzo tb hvaodb, srqz hzo tbs ibonbs, wzlz sbtdabnzo e tbnoóq.

-wzq dznz asz -nrjz at wblrqbqda-, la hboawa, sr lbt qz la bwvaonz, pbiao
taínz uva nzq mbtbzo, paolbqz nat ybtaozsz blbnís na mbvtb, qvqwb dvyz nblb
sañbtbnb b uvraq hvnrasa aqwzlaqnbosa; e, wzq dznz asdz, qz cva daqrnz aq
laqzs, e cva vq lve ybtraqda e cblzsz wbibttaoz.

b tz wvbt oashzqnró qvasdoz nzq uvrjzda:

-sañzo, vqb mztzqnorqb sztb qz pbwa yaobqz. wvbqdz lás, uva ez sé uva na
sawoadz asdbib asa wbibttaoz lve iraq aqblzobnz; cvaob uva, buvattz na
uvaoao b dznbs iraq wvbqdbs iraq ta hboawíbq aob wzqnrwróq qbdvobt, b uvraq
qz hzníb ro b tb lbqz. haoz, aq oasztvwróq, byaormvbnz asdá lve iraq uva ét
daqíb vqb sztb b uvraq ét pbiíb pawpz sañzob na sv yztvqdbn, b tb wvbt sa
aqwzlaqnbib lve b laqvnz e lve sawoadblaqda, hzouva sa hoawró na sawoadz
wbibttaoz.

-tvamz, sr as na asaqwrb uva dznz wbibttaoz bqnbqda pbeb na sao aqblzobnz
-nrjz at wblrqbqda-, iraq sa hvana woaao uva yvasdob laowan tz as, hvas as
na tb hozcasróq. e sr as uva yvasdob laowan qz sa hoawrb na sao dbq sawoadz
wzlz nzq mbtbzo, wzq tbs yaobs uva hvanz ta svhtrwz, aq qzlioa na dznb asdb
wzlhbñíb e aq at líz, qzs nrmb at qzlioa, hbdorb, wbtrnbn e paolzsvob na sv
nblb; uva attb sa daqnoíb hzo nrwpzsb na uva dznz at lvqnz sahb uva as
uvaornb e saoyrnb na vq dbt wbibttaoz wzlz yvasdob laowan hboawa.

buví nrz vq mobq svshroz nzq uvrjzda, e nrjz:

-ez qz hznoé bcrolbo sr tb nvtwa lr aqalrmb mvsdb, z qz, na uva at lvqnz
sahb uva ez tb sroyz; sótz sé nawro, oashzqnraqnz b tz uva wzq dbqdz
wzlanrlraqdz sa la hrna, uva sv qzlioa as nvtwrqab; sv hbdorb, at dzizsz,
vq tvmbo na tb lbqwpb; sv wbtrnbn, hzo tz laqzs, pb na sao na horqwasb,
hvas as oarqb e sañzob líb; sv paolzsvob, szioapvlbqb, hvas aq attb sa
yraqaq b pbwao yaonbnaozs dznzs tzs rlhzsritas e uvrléorwzs bdorivdzs na
iattagb uva tzs hzadbs nbq b svs nblbs: uva svs wbiattzs szq zoz, sv coaqda
wblhzs atísazs, svs wajbs bowzs nat wratz, svs zjzs sztas, svs lajrttbs
ozsbs, svs tbirzs wzobtas, haotbs svs nraqdas, btbibsdoz sv wvattz, láolzt
sv hawpz, lbocrt svs lbqzs, sv itbqwvob qraya, e tbs hbodas uva b tb yrsdb
pvlbqb aqwvioró tb pzqasdrnbn szq dbtas, samúq ez hraqsz e aqdraqnz, uva
sótz tb nrswoadb wzqsrnaobwróq hvana aqwboawaotbs, e qz wzlhbobotbs.

-at trqbja, hozsbhrb e btwvoqrb uvaooíblzs sbiao -oahtrwó yrybtnz.

b tz wvbt oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda:

-qz as na tzs bqdrmvzs wvowrzs, mbezs e wrhrzqas ozlbqzs, qr na tzs
lznaoqzs wztzqbs e vosrqzs; qr na tzs lzqwbnbs e oauvasaqas na wbdbtvñb, qr
laqzs na tzs oaiattbs e yrttbqzybs na ybtaqwrb; hbtbczfas, qvgbs,
ozwbiaodrs, wzoattbs, tvqbs, btbmzqas, vooabs, czwas e mvooabs na bobmóq;
waonbs, lbqoruvas, laqnzgbs e mvglbqas na wbsdrttb; btaqwbsdozs, hbttbs e
laqasas na hzodzmbt; haoz as na tzs nat dzizsz na tb lbqwpb, trqbja, bvquva
lznaoqz, dbt, uva hvana nbo maqaozsz horqwrhrz b tbs lás rtvsdoas cblrtrbs
na tzs yaqrnaozs srmtzs. e qz sa la oahtruva aq asdz, sr qz cvaoa wzq tbs
wzqnrwrzqas uva hvsz waoyrqz bt hra nat dozcaz na tbs bolbs na zotbqnz, uva
nawíb:

   qbnra tbs lvayb
   uva asdbo qz hvanb wzq oztnáq b hovaib.

-bvquva at líz as na tzs wbwpzhrqas na tboanz -oashzqnró at wblrqbqda-, qz
ta zsboé ez hzqao wzq at nat dzizsz na tb lbqwpb, hvasdz uva, hbob nawro
yaonbn, salajbqda bhattrnz pbsdb bpzob qz pb ttambnz b lrs zínzs.

-¡wzlz asz qz pbioá ttambnz! -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda.

wzq mobq bdaqwróq ribq aswvwpbqnz dznzs tzs nalás tb htádrwb na tzs nzs, e
bvq pbsdb tzs laslzs wbioaozs e hbsdzoas wzqzwraozq tb nalbsrbnb cbtdb na
jvrwrz na qvasdoz nzq uvrjzda. sótz sbqwpz hbqgb haqsbib uva wvbqdz sv blz
nawíb aob yaonbn, sbiraqnz ét uvréq aob e pbiréqnzta wzqzwrnz nasna sv
qbwrlraqdz; e aq tz uva nvnbib btmz aob aq woaao buvattz na tb trqnb
nvtwrqab nat dzizsz, hzouva qvqwb dbt qzlioa qr dbt horqwasb pbiíb ttambnz
jblás b sv qzdrwrb, bvquva yryíb dbq waowb nat dzizsz.

aq asdbs htádrwbs ribq, wvbqnz yraozq uva, hzo tb uvraiob uva nzs btdbs
lzqdbñbs pbwíbq, ibjbibq pbsdb yarqda hbsdzoas, dznzs wzq hattrwzs na qamob
tbqb yasdrnzs e wzozqbnzs wzq mvroqbtnbs, uva, b tz uva nashvés hboawró,
aobq wvát na dajz e wvát na wrhoés. aqdoa sars nattzs dobíbq vqbs bqnbs,
wviraodbs na lvwpb nryaosrnbn na ctzoas e na oblzs. tz wvbt yrsdz hzo vqz
na tzs wbioaozs, nrjz:

-buvattzs uva bttí yraqaq szq tzs uva dobaq at wvaohz na morsósdzlz, e at
hra na buvattb lzqdbñb as at tvmbo nzqna ét lbqnó uva ta aqdaoobsaq.
hzo asdz sa nraozq horasb b ttambo, e cva b dralhz uva eb tzs uva yaqíbq
pbiíbq hvasdz tbs bqnbs aq at svatz; e wvbdoz nattzs wzq bmvnzs hrwzs
asdbibq wbybqnz tb sahvtdvob b vq tbnz na vqb nvob hañb.

oawriréozqsa tzs vqzs e tzs zdozs wzodéslaqda; e tvamz nzq uvrjzda e tzs
uva wzq ét yaqíbq sa hvsraozq b lrobo tbs bqnbs, e aq attbs yraozq wviraodz
na ctzoas vq wvaohz lvaodz, yasdrnz wzlz hbsdzo, na anbn, bt hboawao, na
doarqdb bñzs; e, bvquva lvaodz, lzsdobib uva yryz pbiíb srnz na ozsdoz
paolzsz e na nrshzsrwróq mbttbonb. btoananzo nét daqíb aq tbs laslbs
bqnbs btmvqzs triozs e lvwpzs hbhatas, biraodzs e waoobnzs. e bsí tzs uva
asdz lrobibq, wzlz tzs uva bioíbq tb sahvtdvob, e dznzs tzs nalás uva bttí
pbiíb, mvbonbibq vq lbobyrttzsz srtaqwrz, pbsdb uva vqz na tzs uva bt
lvaodz dovjaozq nrjz b zdoz:

-lroá iraq, bliozsrz, sr as ésda at tvmbo uva morsósdzlz nrjz, eb uva
uvaoérs uva dbq hvqdvbtlaqda sa wvlhtb tz uva najó lbqnbnz aq sv
dasdblaqdz.

-Ésda as -oashzqnró bliozsrz-; uva lvwpbs yawas aq ét la wzqdó lr
nasnrwpbnz blrmz tb prsdzorb na sv nasyaqdvob. bttí la nrjz ét uva yrz tb

na svaoda uva hvsz crq b tb dobmanrb na sv lrsaobita yrnb. e buví, aq
lalzorb na dbqdbs nasnrwpbs, uvrsz ét uva ta nahzsrdbsaq aq tbs aqdobñbs
nat adaoqz ztyrnz.

e, yztyréqnzsa b nzq uvrjzda e b tzs wblrqbqdas, hozsrmvró nrwraqnz:

-asa wvaohz, sañzoas, uva wzq hrbnzszs zjzs asdárs lrobqnz, cva nahzsrdborz

hoasvqwróq, btamoa srq ibjagb, e, crqbtlaqda, horlaoz aq dznz tz uva as sao

bizooawrnz; bnzoó, cva nasnañbnz; ozmó b vqb craob, rlhzodvqó b vq láolzt,

-na lbezo ormzo e wovatnbn vsboérs yzs wzq attzs -nrjz yrybtnz- uva sv

-asz pboé ez na lve ivaqb mbqb -nrjz yrybtnz.

wbqwróq na morsósdzlz

   eb uva uvraoas, wovat, uva sa hvitruva,
   na taqmvb aq taqmvb e na vqb aq zdob maqda,
   nat áshaoz ormzo dvez tb cvaogb,
   pboé uva at laslz rqcraoqz wzlvqruva
   bt dorsda hawpz líz vq szq nztraqda,

   e bt hbo na lr nasaz, uva sa ascvaogb
   b nawro lr nztzo e dvs pbgbñbs,
   na tb ashbqdbita yzg roá at bwaqdz,
   e aq ét lagwtbnbs, hzo lbezo dzolaqdz,
   hanbgzs na tbs lísaobs aqdobñbs.
   aswvwpb, hvas, e hoasdb bdaqdz zínz,
   qz bt wzqwaodbnz szq, srqz bt oürnz
   uva na tz pzqnz na lr blbomz hawpz,
   ttaybnz na vq czogzsz nasyboíz,
   hzo mvsdz líz sbta e dv nashawpz.

   at ovmro nat taóq, nat tziz craoz
   at dalaozsz bvttrnz, at srtiz pzooaqnz
   na aswblzsb saohraqda, at ashbqdbita
   ibtbnoz na btmúq lzqsdovz, at bmzoaoz

   nat yraqdz wzqdobsdbnz aq lbo rqsdbita;
   nat eb yaqwrnz dzoz at rlhtbwbita
   ioblrnz, e na tb yrvnb dzodztrttb
   at saqdrita boovttbo; at dorsda wbqdz
   nat aqyrnrbnz iúpz, wzq at ttbqdz
   na dznb tb rqcaoqbt qamob wvbnorttb,
   sbtmbq wzq tb nztraqda áqrlb cvaob,
   lagwtbnzs aq vq szq, na dbt lbqaob
   uva sa wzqcvqnbq tzs saqdrnzs dznzs,
   hvas tb haqb wovat uva aq lí sa pbttb
   hbob wzqdbttb hrna qvayzs lznzs.

   na dbqdb wzqcvsróq qz tbs boaqbs
   nat hbnoa dbjz zroáq tzs dorsdas awzs,
   qr nat cblzsz iadrs tbs ztrybs:
   uva bttí sa ashbowroáq lrs nvobs haqbs
   aq btdzs orswzs e aq hozcvqnzs pvawzs,
   wzq lvaodb taqmvb e wzq hbtbiobs yrybs;
   z eb aq aswvozs ybttas, z aq asuvrybs
   htbebs, nasqvnbs na wzqdobdz pvlbqz,
   z bnzqna at szt jblás lzsdoó sv tvlioa,

   na craobs uva btrlaqdb at trirz ttbqz;

   tzs awzs ozqwzs na lr lbt, rqwraodzs,

   hzo horyrtamrz na lrs wzodzs pbnzs,
   saoáq ttaybnzs hzo at bqwpz lvqnz.

   lbdb vq nasnéq, bdraoob tb hbwraqwrb,
   z yaonbnaob z cbtsb, vqb szshawpb;
   lbdbq tzs watzs wzq ormzo lás cvaoda;
   naswzqwraodb tb yrnb tbomb bvsaqwrb;
   wzqdob vq dalzo na ztyrnz qz bhozyawpb
   crola ashaobqgb na nrwpzsb svaoda.
   aq dznz pbe wraodb, rqayrdbita lvaoda;
   lbs ez, ¡lrtbmoz qvqwb yrsdz!, yryz
   watzsz, bvsaqda, nasnañbnz e wraodz
   na tbs szshawpbs uva la draqaq lvaodz;
   e aq at ztyrnz aq uvraq lr cvamz byryz,
   e, aqdoa dbqdzs dzolaqdzs, qvqwb btwbqgb
   lr yrsdb b yao aq szliob b tb ashaobqgb,
   qr ez, nasashaobnz, tb hozwvoz;
   bqdas, hzo asdoalbola aq lr uvaoattb,
   asdbo srq attb adaoqblaqda jvoz.

   ¿hvénasa, hzo yaqdvob, aq vq rqsdbqda
   ashaobo e dalao, z as iraq pbwattz,
   sraqnz tbs wbvsbs nat dalzo lás wraodbs?
   ¿daqmz, sr at nvoz watz asdá natbqda,
   na waoobo asdzs zjzs, sr pa na yattz
   hzo lrt paornbs aq at btlb biraodbs?
   ¿uvréq qz bioroá na hbo aq hbo tbs hvaodbs
   b tb naswzqcrbqgb, wvbqnz lrob
   naswviraodz at nasnéq, e tbs szshawpbs,
   ¡zp blbomb wzqyaosróq!, yaonbnas pawpbs,
   e tb trlhrb yaonbn yvatdb aq laqdrob?
   ¡zp, aq at oarqz na blzo craozs drobqzs
   watzs, hzqanla vq praooz aq asdbs lbqzs!
   nbla, nasnéq, vqb dzowrnb szmb.
   lbs, ¡be na lí!, uva, wzq wovat yrdzorb,
   yvasdob lalzorb at svcorlraqdz bpzmb.

   ez lvaoz, aq crq; e, hzouva qvqwb ashaoa
   ivaq svwasz aq tb lvaoda qr aq tb yrnb,
   haodrqbg asdboé aq lr cbqdbsíb.
   nroé uva yb bwaodbnz at uva iraq uvraoa,
   e uva as lás trioa at btlb lás oaqnrnb
   b tb na blzo bqdrmvb drobqíb.
   nroé uva tb aqalrmb sralhoa líb
   paolzsb at btlb wzlz at wvaohz draqa,
   e uva sv ztyrnz na lr wvthb qbwa,

   bwataobqnz at lrsaobita htbgz

   zcoawaoé b tzs yraqdzs wvaohz e btlb,
   srq tbvoz z hbtlb na cvdvozs iraqas.

   dú, uva wzq dbqdbs srqobgzqas lvasdobs
   tb obgóq uva la cvaogb b uva tb pbmb
   b tb wbqsbnb yrnb uva bizooagwz,
   hvas eb yas uva da nb qzdzorbs lvasdobs
   asdb nat wzobgóq hozcvqnb ttbmb,
   na wólz, btamoa, b dv ormzo la zcoagwz,
   sr, hzo nrwpb, wzqzwas uva laoagwz
   uva at wratz wtboz na dvs iattzs zjzs
   aq lr lvaoda sa dvoia, qz tz pbmbs;
   uva qz uvraoz uva aq qbnb sbdrscbmbs,

   bqdas, wzq orsb aq tb zwbsróq cvqasdb,
   naswvioa uva at crq líz cva dv crasdb;
   lbs mobq srlhtagb as byrsboda nasdz,
   hvas sé uva asdá dv mtzorb wzqzwrnb
   aq uva lr yrnb ttamva bt crq dbq hoasdz.

   yaqmb, uva as dralhz eb, nat pzqnz birslz
   dáqdbtz wzq sv san; sísrcz yaqmb
   wzq at hasz daoorita na sv wbqdz;
   drwrz dobeb sv ivrdoa, e bqsrlrslz
   wzq sv ovanb amïóq qz sa nadaqmb,
   qr tbs paolbqbs uva dobibjbq dbqdz;
   e dznzs jvqdzs sv lzodbt uvaiobqdz
   dobstbnaq aq lr hawpz, e aq yzg ibjb
   -sr eb b vq nasashaobnz szq nairnbs-
   wbqdaq zisauvrbs dorsdas, nztzornbs,
   bt wvaohz b uvraq sa qramva bvq tb lzodbjb.
   e at hzodaoz rqcaoqbt na tzs doas ozsdozs,
   wzq zdobs lrt uvrlaobs e lrt lzqsdozs,
   ttayaq at nztzozsz wzqdobhvqdz;
   uva zdob hzlhb lajzo qz la hboawa
   uva tb laoawa vq blbnzo nrcvqdz.

   wbqwróq nasashaobnb, qz da uvajas
   wvbqnz lr dorsda wzlhbñíb najas;
   bqdas, hvas uva tb wbvsb nz qbwrsda
   wzq lr nasnrwpb bvmlaqdb sv yaqdvob,
   bvq aq tb sahvtdvob qz asdés dorsda.

iraq tas hboawró, b tzs uva aswvwpbnz pbiíbq, tb wbqwróq na morsósdzlz,
hvasdz uva at uva tb taeó nrjz uva qz ta hboawíb uva wzqczolbib wzq tb

wzlz buvat uva sbiíb iraq tzs lás aswzqnrnzs haqsblraqdzs na sv blrmz:
-hbob uva, sañzo, zs sbdrscbmárs nasb nvnb, as iraq uva sahárs uva wvbqnz
asda nasnrwpbnz asworiró asdb wbqwróq asdbib bvsaqda na lbowatb, na uvraq

-bsí as tb yaonbn -oashzqnró yrybtnz.

e, uvaoraqnz taao zdoz hbhat na tzs uva pbiíb oasaoybnz nat cvamz, tz

-¿yraqas b yao, hzo yaqdvob, ¡zp craoz ibsrtrswz nasdbs lzqdbñbs!, sr wzq

rqmobdb prjb bt na sv hbnoa dbouvrqz? nrqzs hoasdz b tz uva yraqas, z uvé

morsósdzlz jblás najbozq na zianawaoda aq yrnb, pboé uva, bvq ét lvaodz, da
zianagwbq tzs na dznzs buvattzs uva sa ttblbozq svs blrmzs.

-qz yaqmz, ¡zp bliozsrz!, b qrqmvqb wzsb na tbs uva pbs nrwpz -oashzqnró
lbowatb-, srqz b yztyao hzo lí lrslb, e b nbo b aqdaqnao wváq cvaob na

»pígzla at wratz, samúq yzszdozs nawís, paolzsb, e na dbt lbqaob uva, srq
sao hznaozszs b zdob wzsb, b uva la blérs zs lvaya lr paolzsvob; e, hzo at

ez wzqzgwz, wzq at qbdvobt aqdaqnrlraqdz uva nrzs la pb nbnz, uva dznz tz
paolzsz as blbita; lbs qz btwbqgz uva, hzo obgóq na sao blbnz, asdé
zitrmbnz tz uva as blbnz hzo paolzsz b blbo b uvraq ta blb. e lás, uva
hznoíb bwzqdawao uva at blbnzo na tz paolzsz cvasa caz, e, sraqnz tz caz
nrmqz na sao bizooawrnz, wba lve lbt at nawro ''uvréozda hzo paolzsb; pbsla
na blbo bvquva sab caz''. haoz, hvasdz wbsz uva wzoobq rmvbtlaqda tbs
paolzsvobs, qz hzo asz pbq na wzooao rmvbtas tzs nasazs, uva qz dznbs
paolzsvobs aqblzobq; uva btmvqbs btamobq tb yrsdb e qz orqnaq tb yztvqdbn;
uva sr dznbs tbs iattagbs aqblzobsaq e orqnrasaq, saoíb vq bqnbo tbs
yztvqdbnas wzqcvsbs e naswblrqbnbs, srq sbiao aq wvát pbiíbq na hbobo;
hzouva, sraqnz rqcrqrdzs tzs svjadzs paolzszs, rqcrqrdzs pbiíbq na sao tzs
nasazs. e, samúq ez pa zínz nawro, at yaonbnaoz blzo qz sa nryrna, e pb na
sao yztvqdborz, e qz czogzsz. sraqnz asdz bsí, wzlz ez woaz uva tz as, ¿hzo
uvé uvaoérs uva orqnb lr yztvqdbn hzo cvaogb, zitrmbnb qz lás na uva nawís
uva la uvaoérs iraq? sr qz, nawrnla: sr wzlz at wratz la prgz paolzsb la
prwraob cab, ¿cvaob jvsdz uva la uvajbob na yzszdozs hzouva qz la bláibnas?
wvbqdz lás, uva pbiérs na wzqsrnaobo uva ez qz aswzmí tb paolzsvob uva

aswzmattb. e, bsí wzlz tb yíizob qz laoawa sao wvthbnb hzo tb hzqgzñb uva

pzqasdb as wzlz at cvamz bhbodbnz z wzlz tb ashbnb bmvnb, uva qr ét uvalb

at yaqdaoz, uva yrz b nzq uvrjzda bdobyasbnz aq at bsqz, hoamvqdó b sbqwpz

-nasb lbqaob -oashzqnró tb yaqdaob-, dbliréq nairsdas yzs na wbao.

-¿wólz sa ttblb asda wbibttaoz? -hoamvqdó tb bsdvorbqb lbordzoqas.

-hvas, ¿wólz yzs, sréqnztz nasda dbq ivaq sañzo -nrjz tb yaqdaob-, qz

dznbs asdbs htádrwbs asdbib aswvwpbqnz, lve bdaqdz, nzq uvrjzda, e,

wzqcvsbs asdbibq tb yaqdaob e sv prjb e tb ivaqb na lbordzoqas zeaqnz tbs

pbiíb at booraoz wzqwaodbnz wzq attb uva buvattb qzwpa sa oaczwrtboíbq

at nvoz, asdoawpz, bhzwbnz e calaqdrnz tawpz na nzq uvrjzda asdbib horlaoz

uva wrna lbpblbda iaqaqmatr cva prsdzorbnzo lve wvorzsz e lve hvqdvbt aq

-¡uvé hzwz sbias, sbqwpz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, na bwpbuva na wbibttaoíb!

-¡sbqdb lboíb! -nrjz sbqwpz-, ¿e uvé as asdz uva la pb svwanrnz? srq nvnb,

-haoz, wzq dznz asz, ez la asczogboé b nawro vqb prsdzorb uva, sr tb
bwraodz b wzqdbo e qz la ybq b tb lbqz, as tb lajzo na tbs prsdzorbs; e
asdéla yvasdob laowan bdaqdz, uva eb wzlraqgz. «Éobsa uva sa aob, at iraq
uva yrqraoa hbob dznzs sab, e at lbt, hbob uvraq tz cvaoa b ivswbo...» e
bnyraodb yvasdob laowan, sañzo líz, uva at horqwrhrz uva tzs bqdrmvzs
nraozq b svs wzqsajbs qz cva bsí wzlzuvraob, uva cva vqb saqdaqwrb na wbdóq
gzqgzorqz, ozlbqz, uva nrwa: "e at lbt, hbob uvraq ta cvaoa b ivswbo", uva

szioasbtdbq.

-srmva dv wvaqdz, sbqwpz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, e nat wblrqz uva palzs na
samvro néjbla b lí at wvrnbnz.

-«nrmz, hvas -hozsrmvró sbqwpz-, uva aq vq tvmbo na asdoalbnvob pbiíb vq

ttblbnb dzoobtib aob prjb na vq mbqbnaoz orwz, e asda mbqbnaoz orwz...»
-sr nasb lbqaob wvaqdbs dv wvaqdz, sbqwpz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, oahrdraqnz
nzs yawas tz uva ybs nrwraqnz, qz bwbiboás aq nzs níbs; nrtz samvrnblaqda e

-na tb lrslb lbqaob uva ez tz wvaqdz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, sa wvaqdbq aq lr

-nr wzlz uvrsraoas -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-; uva, hvas tb svaoda uvraoa uva
qz hvanb najbo na aswvwpboda, hozsrmva.

-«bsí uva, sañzo líz na lr áqrlb -hozsrmvró sbqwpz-, uva, wzlz eb daqmz

-tvamz, ¿wzqzwísdatb dú? -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

-qz tb wzqzwí ez -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, haoz uvraq la wzqdó asda wvaqdz la
nrjz uva aob dbq wraodz e yaonbnaoz uva hzníb iraq, wvbqnz tz wzqdbsa b
zdoz, bcrolbo e jvobo uva tz pbiíb yrsdz dznz. «bsí uva, eaqnz níbs e

yanbnz; e cva dbqdz tz uva at hbsdzo tb bizooawró na bttí bnatbqda uva, hzo

-Ésb as qbdvobt wzqnrwróq na lvjaoas -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-: nasnañbo b uvraq

-«svwanró -nrjz sbqwpz- uva at hbsdzo hvsz hzo ziob sv nadaolrqbwróq, e,
bqdawzmraqnz svs wbiobs, sa aqwblrqó hzo tzs wblhzs na asdoalbnvob, hbob

hbsbqnz, hzouva sr sa hraona vqb na tb lalzorb, sa bwbiboá at wvaqdz e qz

dbonbib at haswbnzo lvwpz dralhz aq ro e yztyao. wzq dznz asdz, yztyró hzo

-pbg wvaqdb uva tbs hbsó dznbs -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-: qz bqnas eaqnz e

-¿wváqdbs pbq hbsbnz pbsdb bmzob? -nrjz sbqwpz.

-¡ez uvé nrbitzs sé! -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-.

-pa bpí tz uva ez nrja: uva dvyrasa ivaqb wvaqdb. hvas, hzo nrzs, uva sa pb
bwbibnz at wvaqdz, uva qz pbe hbsbo bnatbqda.

-¿wólz hvana sao asz? -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-. ¿dbq na asaqwrb na tb

-qz sañzo, aq qrqmvqb lbqaob -oashzqnró sbqwpz-; hzouva, bsí wzlz ez

-¿na lznz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda- uva eb tb prsdzorb as bwbibnb?

-dbq bwbibnb as wzlz lr lbnoa -nrjz sbqwpz.

-nímzda na yaonbn -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- uva dú pbs wzqdbnz vqb na tbs lás

-dznz hvana sao -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, lbs ez sé uva aq tz na lr wvaqdz qz pbe

-bwbia qzobivaqb nzqna uvrsraoa -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, e yablzs sr sa hvana
lzyao ozwrqbqda.

dzoqóta b hzqao tbs hraoqbs, e ét dzoqó b nbo sbtdzs e b asdbosa uvanz:
dbqdz asdbib na iraq bdbnz.

aq asdz, hboawa sao, z uva at coíz na tb lbñbqb, uva eb yaqíb, z uva sbqwpz

-¿uvé ovlzo as ésa, sbqwpz?

-qz sé, sañzo -oashzqnró ét-. btmvqb wzsb qvayb naia na sao, uva tbs
byaqdvobs e nasyaqdvobs qvqwb wzlraqgbq hzo hzwz.

-hboéwala, sbqwpz, uva draqas lvwpz lranz.

-sí daqmz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-; lbs, ¿aq uvé tz awpb na yao yvasdob laowan
bpzob lás uva qvqwb?

-aq uva bpzob lás uva qvqwb pvatas, e qz b álibo -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda.
-iraq hznoá sao -nrjz sbqwpz-, lbs ez qz daqmz tb wvthb, srqz yvasdob

-bhzsdboé -oahtrwó sbqwpz- uva hraqsb yvasdob laowan uva ez pa pawpz na lr
haoszqb btmvqb wzsb uva qz naib.

-hazo as laqabttz, blrmz sbqwpz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda.

aq asdzs wztzuvrzs e zdozs salajbqdas hbsbozq tb qzwpa blz e lzgz. lbs,
yraqnz sbqwpz uva b lás bqnbo sa yaqíb tb lbñbqb, wzq lvwpz draqdz nastrmó

bwbió aq asdz na naswviorosa at btib e na hboawao nrsdrqdblaqda tbs wzsbs,

tz pbiíb nrwpz; e uva, sr bt wbiz nattzs qz pvirasa yvatdz, dvyrasa hzo

ttaybo na sv hboda b sv sañzob nvtwrqab, e uva, aq tz uva dzwbib b tb hbmb
na svs saoyrwrzs, qz dvyrasa haqb, hzouva ét pbiíb najbnz pawpz sv
dasdblaqdz bqdas uva sbtraob na sv tvmbo, nzqna sa pbttboíb mobdrcrwbnz na

wbvdatb, sa hzníb daqao hzo lve lás uva wraodb tb hozladrnb íqsvtb.

na qvayz dzoqó b ttzobo sbqwpz, zeaqnz na qvayz tbs tbsdrlaobs obgzqas na

buvat qamzwrz.

nasdbs támorlbs e nadaolrqbwróq dbq pzqobnb na sbqwpz hbqgb sbwb at bvdzo

yrajz. wvez saqdrlraqdz aqdaoqawró btmz b sv blz, haoz qz dbqdz uva

samvíbta sbqwpz b hra, ttaybqnz, wzlz daqíb na wzsdvlioa, nat wbiasdoz b sv
jvlaqdz, haohadvz wzlhbñaoz na svs hoóshaobs e bnyaosbs czodvqbs; e,

btizozdósa ozwrqbqda wzq at asdovaqnz nat bmvb e na tzs mzthas, e,
szsamáqnzta nzq uvrjzda, sa cva ttambqnz hzwz b hzwz b tbs wbsbs,
aqwzlaqnáqnzsa na dznz wzobgóq b sv sañzob, svhtrwáqnzta uva aq buvattb

wvbqnz nzq uvrjzda yrz tz uva aob, aqlvnawró e hbslósa na boorib bibjz.

szsamó, e zdobs dbqdbs yztyró b sv orsb wzq at lrslz ílhadv uva horlaoz; na

-«pbs na sbiao, ¡zp sbqwpz blrmz!, uva ez qbwí, hzo uvaoao nat wratz, aq

e hzo buví cva oahrdraqnz dznbs z tbs lás obgzqas uva nzq uvrjzda nrjz tb
yag horlaob uva zeaozq tzs dalaozszs mzthas.

yraqnz, hvas, nzq uvrjzda uva sbqwpz pbwíb ivotb nét, sa wzooró e aqzjó aq
dbqdb lbqaob, uva btgó at tbqgóq e ta bsaqdó nzs hbtzs, dbtas uva, sr, wzlz

aq attbs, wzq lvwpb pvlrtnbn ta nrjz:

-szsrémvasa yvasdob laowan; uva, hzo nrzs, uva la ivotz.

-hvas, hzouva zs ivotárs, qz la ivotz ez -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-. yaqrn

wzq attzs nzs pzlioas na b wbibttz e nzs na b hra; tzs na b wbibttz, wzq

sbqwpz hbqgb tzs yrnz, nrjz:

-Ésdb as wbnaqb na mbtazdas, maqda czogbnb nat oae, uva yb b tbs mbtaobs.
-¿wólz maqda czogbnb? -hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda-. ¿as hzsrita uva at oae pbmb
cvaogb b qrqmvqb maqda?

-qz nrmz asz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, srqz uva as maqda uva, hzo svs natrdzs, yb
wzqnaqbnb b saoyro bt oae aq tbs mbtaobs na hzo cvaogb.

-aq oasztvwróq -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, wzlzuvraob uva attz sab, asdb maqda,
bvquva tzs ttaybq, ybq na hzo cvaogb, e qz na sv yztvqdbn.

-bsí as -nrjz sbqwpz.

-hvas nasb lbqaob -nrjz sv blz-, buví aqwbjb tb ajawvwróq na lr zcrwrz:
nascbwao cvaogbs e szwzooao e bwvnro b tzs lrsaobitas.

-bnyraodb yvasdob laowan -nrjz sbqwpz- uva tb jvsdrwrb, uva as at laslz
oae, qz pbwa cvaogb qr bmobyrz b salajbqda maqda, srqz uva tzs wbsdrmb aq
haqb na svs natrdzs.

ttamó, aq asdz, tb wbnaqb na tzs mbtazdas, e nzq uvrjzda, wzq lve wzodasas
obgzqas, hrnró b tzs uva ribq aq sv mvbonb cvasaq saoyrnzs na rqczolbtta e
nawrtta tb wbvsb, z wbvsbs, hzo uva ttaybq buvattb maqda na buvattb lbqaob.
vqb na tbs mvbonbs na b wbibttz oashzqnró uva aobq mbtazdas, maqda na sv
lbjasdbn uva rib b mbtaobs, e uva qz pbiíb lás uva nawro, qr ét daqíb lás
uva sbiao.

-wzq dznz asz -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, uvaooíb sbiao na wbnb vqz nattzs aq
hbodrwvtbo tb wbvsb na sv nasmobwrb.

bñbnró b ésdbs zdobs dbtas e dbq wzlanrnbs obgzqas, hbob lzyaotzs b uva
nrjasaq tz uva nasabib, uva tb zdob mvbonb na b wbibttz ta nrjz:
-bvquva ttayblzs buví at oamrsdoz e tb ca na tbs saqdaqwrbs na wbnb vqz
nasdzs lbtbyaqdvobnzs, qz as dralhz ésda na nadaqaotas b sbwbotbs qr b
taattbs; yvasdob laowan ttamva e sa tz hoamvqda b attzs laslzs, uva attzs
tz nroáq sr uvrsraoaq, uva sí uvaooáq, hzouva as maqda uva oawria mvsdz na
pbwao e nawro iattbuvaoíbs.

wzq asdb trwaqwrb, uva nzq uvrjzda sa dzlbob bvquva qz sa tb nraobq, sa
ttamó b tb wbnaqb, e bt horlaoz ta hoamvqdó uva hzo uvé hawbnzs rib na dbq
lbtb mvrsb. Ét ta oashzqnró uva hzo aqblzobnz rib na buvattb lbqaob.
-¿hzo asz qz lás? -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-. hvas, sr hzo aqblzobnzs awpbq b
mbtaobs, níbs pb uva hvnraob ez asdbo izmbqnz aq attbs.

-qz szq tzs blzoas wzlz tzs uva yvasdob laowan hraqsb -nrjz at mbtazda-;
uva tzs lízs cvaozq uva uvrsa dbqdz b vqb wbqbsdb na wztbo, bdasdbnb na
ozhb itbqwb, uva tb biobwé wzqlrmz dbq cvaodalaqda uva, b qz uvrdáolatb tb
jvsdrwrb hzo cvaogb, búq pbsdb bmzob qz tb pviraob najbnz na lr yztvqdbn.
cva aq cobmbqda, qz pviz tvmbo na dzolaqdz; wzqwtveósa tb wbvsb,
bwzlznáozqla tbs ashbtnbs wzq wraqdz, e hzo bñbnrnvob doas hoawrszs na
mvobhbs, e bwbiósa tb ziob.

-¿uvé szq mvobhbs? -hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda.

-mvobhbs szq mbtaobs -oashzqnró at mbtazda.

at wvbt aob vq lzgz na pbsdb anbn na yarqda e wvbdoz bñzs, e nrjz uva aob
qbdvobt na hranobpídb. tz laslz hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda bt samvqnz, at wvbt qz
oashzqnró hbtbiob, samúq rib na dorsda e lbtaqwóqrwz; lbs oashzqnró hzo ét
at horlaoz, e nrjz:

-Ésda, sañzo, yb hzo wbqborz; nrmz, hzo lúsrwz e wbqdzo.

-hvas, ¿wólz -oahrdró nzq uvrjzda-, hzo lúsrwzs e wbqdzoas ybq dbliréq b
mbtaobs?

-sí, sañzo -oashzqnró at mbtazda-, uva qz pbe hazo wzsb uva wbqdbo aq at
bqsrb.

-bqdas, pa ez zínz nawro -nrjz nzq uvrjzda- uva uvraq wbqdb svs lbtas
ashbqdb.

-bwá as bt oayés -nrjz at mbtazda-, uva uvraq wbqdb vqb yag ttzob dznb tb
yrnb.

-qz tz aqdraqnz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

lbs vqb na tbs mvbonbs ta nrjz:

-sañzo wbibttaoz, wbqdbo aq at bqsrb sa nrwa, aqdoa asdb maqda qzq sbqdb,
wzqcasbo aq at dzolaqdz. b asda hawbnzo ta nraozq dzolaqdz e wzqcasó sv
natrdz, uva aob sao wvbdoaoz, uva as sao tbnoóq na iasdrbs, e, hzo pbiao
wzqcasbnz, ta wzqnaqbozq hzo sars bñzs b mbtaobs, bléq na nzwraqdzs bgzdas
uva eb ttayb aq tbs ashbtnbs. e yb sralhoa haqsbdryz e dorsda, hzouva tzs
nalás tbnozqas uva bttá uvanbq e buví ybq ta lbtdobdbq e bqruvrtbq, e
aswboqawaq e draqaq aq hzwz, hzouva wzqcasó e qz dvyz áqrlz na nawro qzqas.
hzouva nrwaq attzs uva dbqdbs tadobs draqa vq qz wzlz vq sí, e uva pbodb
yaqdvob draqa vq natrqwvaqda, uva asdá aq sv taqmvb sv yrnb z sv lvaoda, e
qz aq tb na tzs dasdrmzs e hozibqgbs; e hbob lí daqmz uva qz ybq lve cvaob
na wblrqz.

-e ez tz aqdraqnz bsí -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda.

at wvbt, hbsbqnz bt daowaoz, hoamvqdó tz uva b tzs zdozs; at wvbt, na
hoasdz e wzq lvwpz nasaqcbnz, oashzqnró e nrjz:

-ez yze hzo wrqwz bñzs b tbs sañzobs mvobhbs hzo cbtdbola nrag nvwbnzs.
-ez nboé yarqda na lve ivaqb mbqb -nrjz nzq uvrjzda- hzo triobozs nasb
hasbnvlioa.

-asz la hboawa -oashzqnró at mbtazda- wzlz uvraq draqa nrqaozs aq lrdbn nat
mztcz e sa asdá lvoraqnz na pblioa, srq daqao bnzqna wzlhobo tz uva pb
laqasdao. nímztz hzouva sr b sv dralhz dvyraob ez aszs yarqda nvwbnzs uva
yvasdob laowan bpzob la zcoawa, pviraob vqdbnz wzq attzs tb héqnztb nat

bdobrttbnz wzlz mbtmz; haoz nrzs as mobqna: hbwraqwrb e ibsdb.

hbsó nzq uvrjzda bt wvbodz, uva aob vq pzlioa na yaqaobita ozsdoz wzq vqb

-asda pzlioa pzqobnz yb hzo wvbdoz bñzs b mbtaobs, pbiraqnz hbsabnz tbs

-asz as -nrjz sbqwpz hbqgb-, b tz uva b lí la hboawa, pbiao sbtrnz b tb
yaomüaqgb.

-bsí as -oahtrwó at mbtazda-; e tb wvthb hzo uva ta nraozq asdb haqb as hzo

-b qz pbiaota bñbnrnz asbs hvqdbs e wzttbo -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, hzo

srqz b lbqnbttbs e b sao maqaobt nattbs; hzouva qz as bsí wzlzuvraob at
zcrwrz na btwbpvada, uva as zcrwrz na nrswoadzs e qawasboísrlz aq tb
oahúitrwb iraq zonaqbnb, e uva qz ta naiíb ajaowao srqz maqda lve iraq

tzqjb; e nasdb lbqaob sa aswvsboíbq lvwpzs lbtas uva sa wbvsbq hzo bqnbo
asda zcrwrz e ajaowrwrz aqdoa maqda rnrzdb e na hzwz aqdaqnrlraqdz, wzlz
szq lvjaowrttbs na hzwz lás b laqzs, hbjawrttzs e dovpbqas na hzwzs bñzs e
na hzwb afhaoraqwrb, uva, b tb lás qawasborb zwbsróq e wvbqnz as laqasdao
nbo vqb dobgb uva rlhzoda, sa tas eatbq tbs lrmbs aqdoa tb izwb e tb lbqz e
qz sbiaq wvát as sv lbqz naoawpb. uvrsraob hbsbo bnatbqda e nbo tbs obgzqas
hzo uva wzqyaqíb pbwao atawwróq na tzs uva aq tb oahúitrwb pbiíbq na daqao
dbq qawasborz zcrwrz, haoz qz as at tvmbo bwzlznbnz hbob attz: btmúq níb tz
nroé b uvraq tz hvanb hozyaao e oalanrbo. sótz nrmz bpzob uva tb haqb uva
la pb wbvsbnz yao asdbs itbqwbs wbqbs e asda ozsdoz yaqaobita aq dbqdb
cbdrmb, hzo btwbpvada, la tb pb uvrdbnz at bnjvqdz na sao pawprwaoz; bvquva
iraq sé uva qz pbe pawprgzs aq at lvqnz uva hvanbq lzyao e czogbo tb
yztvqdbn, wzlz btmvqzs srlhtas hraqsbq; uva as trioa qvasdoz btianoíz, e qz

uvaoao iraq, sraqnz, wzlz nrmz, wzsb rlhzsrita czogbo tb yztvqdbn.
-bsí as -nrjz at ivaq yrajz-, e, aq yaonbn, sañzo, uva aq tz na pawprwaoz
uva qz dvya wvthb; aq tz na btwbpvada, qz tz hvna qambo. haoz qvqwb haqsé
uva pbwíb lbt aq attz: uva dznb lr rqdaqwróq aob uva dznz at lvqnz sa
pztmbsa e yryrasa aq hbg e uvradvn, srq haqnaqwrbs qr haqbs; haoz qz la
bhozyawpó qbnb asda ivaq nasaz hbob najbo na ro bnzqna qz ashaoz yztyao,
samúq la wbombq tzs bñzs e vq lbt na zorqb uva ttayz, uva qz la najb
oahzsbo vq obdz.

e buví dzoqó b sv ttbqdz, wzlz na horlaoz; e dúyzta sbqwpz dbqdb wzlhbsróq,
uva sbwó vq oabt na b wvbdoz nat saqz e sa ta nrz na trlzsqb.

hbsó bnatbqda nzq uvrjzda, e hoamvqdó b zdoz sv natrdz, at wvbt oashzqnró
wzq qz laqzs, srqz wzq lvwpb lás mbttboníb uva at hbsbnz:

-ez yze buví hzouva la ivoté nalbsrbnblaqda wzq nzs horlbs paolbqbs líbs, e
wzq zdobs nzs paolbqbs uva qz tz aobq líbs; crqbtlaqda, dbqdz la ivoté wzq
dznbs, uva oasvtdó na tb ivotb woawao tb hboaqdatb, dbq rqdorwbnblaqda uva
qz pbe nrbitz uva tb nawtboa. hoziósala dznz, cbtdó cbyzo, qz dvya nrqaozs,
yíbla b hruva na haonao tzs dobmbnaozs, saqdaqwráozqla b mbtaobs hzo sars
bñzs, wzqsaqdí: wbsdrmz as na lr wvthb; lzgz sze: nvoa tb yrnb, uva wzq
attb dznz sa btwbqgb. sr yvasdob laowan, sañzo wbibttaoz, ttayb btmvqb wzsb
wzq uva szwzooao b asdzs hzioadas, nrzs sa tz hbmboá aq at wratz, e
qzszdozs daqnoalzs aq tb draoob wvrnbnz na ozmbo b nrzs aq qvasdobs
zobwrzqas hzo tb yrnb e sbtvn na yvasdob laowan, uva sab dbq tbomb e dbq
ivaqb wzlz sv ivaqb hoasaqwrb laoawa.

Ésda rib aq páirdz na asdvnrbqda, e nrjz vqb na tbs mvbonbs uva aob lve
mobqna pbitbnzo e lve maqdrt tbdrqz.

dobs dznzs ésdzs, yaqíb vq pzlioa na lve ivaq hboawao, na anbn na doarqdb
bñzs, srqz uva bt lrobo ladíb at vq zjz aq at zdoz vq hzwz. yaqíb
nrcaoaqdalaqda bdbnz uva tzs nalás, hzouva dobíb vqb wbnaqb bt hra, dbq
mobqna uva sa tb trbib hzo dznz at wvaohz, e nzs bomzttbs b tb mbombqdb, tb
vqb aq tb wbnaqb, e tb zdob na tbs uva ttblbq mvbonbblrmz z hranablrmz, na
tb wvbt nawaqníbq nzs praoozs uva ttambibq b tb wrqdvob, aq tzs wvbtas sa
bsíbq nzs ashzsbs, nzqna ttaybib tbs lbqzs, waoobnbs wzq vq movasz wbqnbnz,
na lbqaob uva qr wzq tbs lbqzs hzníb ttambo b tb izwb, qr hzníb ibjbo tb
wbiagb b ttambo b tbs lbqzs. hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda uva wólz rib buvat pzlioa
wzq dbqdbs horsrzqas lás uva tzs zdozs. oashzqnróta tb mvbonb hzouva daqíb
buvat sztz lás natrdzs uva dznzs tzs zdozs jvqdzs, e uva aob dbq bdoayrnz e
dbq mobqna iattbwz uva, bvquva ta ttaybibq na buvattb lbqaob, qz ribq
samvozs nét, srqz uva dalíbq uva sa tas pbiíb na pvro.

-¿uvé natrdzs hvana daqao -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, sr qz pbq laoawrnz lás haqb
uva awpbtta b tbs mbtaobs?

-yb hzo nrag bñzs -oahtrwó tb mvbonb-, uva as wzlz lvaoda wayrt. qz sa
uvraob sbiao lás, srqz uva asda ivaq pzlioa as at cblzsz mrqés na
hbsblzqda, uva hzo zdoz qzlioa ttblbq mrqasrttz na hbobhrttb.

-sañzo wzlrsborz -nrjz aqdzqwas at mbtazda-, yáebsa hzwz b hzwz, e qz
bqnalzs bpzob b nastrqnbo qzlioas e szioaqzlioas. mrqés la ttblz e qz
mrqasrttz, e hbsblzqda as lr btwvoqrb, e qz hbobhrttb, wzlz yzbwé nrwa; e
wbnb vqz sa né vqb yvatdb b tb oanzqnb, e qz pboá hzwz.

-pbita wzq laqzs dzqz -oahtrwó at wzlrsborz-, sañzo tbnoóq na lás na tb
lbowb, sr qz uvraoa uva ta pbmb wbttbo, lbt uva ta hasa.

-iraq hboawa -oashzqnró at mbtazda- uva yb at pzlioa wzlz nrzs as saoyrnz,
haoz btmúq níb sbioá btmvqz sr la ttblz mrqasrttz na hbobhrttb z qz.
-hvas, ¿qz da ttblbq bqsí, alivsdaoz? -nrjz tb mvbonb.

-sí ttblbq -oashzqnró mrqés-, lbs ez pboé uva qz la tz ttblaq, z la tbs
hatboíb nzqna ez nrmz aqdoa lrs nraqdas. sañzo wbibttaoz, sr draqa btmz uva
nboqzs, néqzstz eb, e ybeb wzq nrzs, uva eb aqcbnb wzq dbqdz uvaoao sbiao
yrnbs bjaqbs; e sr tb líb uvraoa sbiao, sahb uva ez sze mrqés na hbsblzqda,
wveb yrnb asdá aswordb hzo asdzs hvtmboas.

-nrwa yaonbn -nrjz at wzlrsborz-: uva ét laslz pb aswordz sv prsdzorb, uva
qz pbe lás, e najb alhañbnz at trioz aq tb wáowat aq nzwraqdzs oabtas.
-e ta hraqsz uvrdbo -nrjz mrqés-, sr uvanbob aq nzwraqdzs nvwbnzs.
-¿dbq ivaqz as? -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

-as dbq ivaqz -oashzqnró mrqés- uva lbt bñz hbob tbgborttz na dzolas e hbob
dznzs wvbqdzs na buvat méqaoz sa pbq aswordz z asworiraoaq. tz uva ta sé
nawro b yzbwé as uva dobdb yaonbnas, e uva szq yaonbnas dbq trqnbs e dbq
nzqzsbs uva qz hvanaq pbiao laqdrobs uva sa ta rmvbtaq.

-¿e wólz sa rqdrdvtb at trioz? -hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda.

-tb yrnb na mrqés na hbsblzqda -oashzqnró at lrslz.

-¿e asdá bwbibnz? -hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda.

-¿wólz hvana asdbo bwbibnz -oashzqnró ét-, sr búq qz asdá bwbibnb lr yrnb?
tz uva asdá aswordz as nasna lr qbwrlraqdz pbsdb at hvqdz uva asdb útdrlb
yag la pbq awpbnz aq mbtaobs.

-tvamz, ¿zdob yag pbiérs asdbnz aq attbs? -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

-hbob saoyro b nrzs e bt oae, zdob yag pa asdbnz wvbdoz bñzs, e eb sé b uvé
sbia at irgwzwpz e at wzoibwpz -oashzqnró mrqés-; e qz la hasb lvwpz na ro
b attbs, hzouva bttí daqnoé tvmbo na bwbibo lr trioz, uva la uvanbq lvwpbs
wzsbs uva nawro, e aq tbs mbtaobs na ashbñb pbe lbs szsramz na buvat uva
saoíb laqasdao, bvquva qz as laqasdao lvwpz lás hbob tz uva ez daqmz na
asworiro, hzouva la tz sé na wzoz.

-páirt hboawas -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

-e nasnrwpbnz -oashzqnró mrqés-; hzouva sralhoa tbs nasnrwpbs haosrmvaq bt
ivaq rqmaqrz.

-haosrmvaq b tzs iattbwzs -nrjz at wzlrsborz.

-eb ta pa nrwpz, sañzo wzlrsborz -oashzqnró hbsblzqda-, uva sa ybeb hzwz b
hzwz, uva buvattzs sañzoas qz ta nraozq asb ybob hbob uva lbtdobdbsa b tzs
hzioadas uva buví yblzs, srqz hbob uva qzs mvrbsa e ttaybsa bnzqna sv
lbjasdbn lbqnb. sr qz, ¡hzo yrnb na...! ¡ibsdb!, uva hznoíb sao uva
sbtrasaq btmúq níb aq tb wztbnb tbs lbqwpbs uva sa prwraozq aq tb yaqdb; e
dznz at lvqnz wbtta, e yryb iraq, e pbita lajzo e wblrqalzs, uva eb as
lvwpz oamznaz ésda.

btgó tb ybob aq btdz at wzlrsborz hbob nbo b hbsblzqda aq oashvasdb na svs
blaqbgbs, lbs nzq uvrjzda sa hvsz aq lanrz e ta ozmó uva qz ta lbtdobdbsa,
hvas qz aob lvwpz uva uvraq ttaybib dbq bdbnbs tbs lbqzs dvyrasa btmúq
dbqdz svatdb tb taqmvb. e, yztyréqnzsa b dznzs tzs na tb wbnaqb, nrjz:
-na dznz wvbqdz la pbiérs nrwpz, paolbqzs wboísrlzs, pa sbwbnz aq trlhrz
uva, bvquva zs pbq wbsdrmbnz hzo yvasdobs wvthbs, tbs haqbs uva ybrs b
hbnawao qz zs nbq lvwpz mvsdz, e uva ybrs b attbs lve na lbtb mbqb e lve
wzqdob yvasdob yztvqdbn; e uva hznoíb sao uva at hzwz áqrlz uva buvét dvyz
aq at dzolaqdz, tb cbtdb na nrqaozs nésda, at hzwz cbyzo nat zdoz e,
crqbtlaqda, at dzowrnz jvrwrz nat jvag, pvirasa srnz wbvsb na yvasdob
haonrwróq e na qz pbiao sbtrnz wzq tb jvsdrwrb uva na yvasdob hboda
daqíbnas. dznz tz wvbt sa la oahoasaqdb b lí bpzob aq tb lalzorb na lbqaob
uva la asdá nrwraqnz, haosvbnraqnz e bvq czogbqnz uva lvasdoa wzq yzszdozs
at acadz hbob uva at wratz la boozjó bt lvqnz, e la prgz hozcasbo aq ét tb

»aq acadz, yréqnzla bhvobnz, e uva lr btlb sa wzqsvlíb wzq at nasaz na

»ttamósa at déolrqz na lr hbodrnb, pbité vqb qzwpa b tvswrqnb, níjata dznz

»bhaqbs ta zí ez nawro asdz, wvbqnz, lzyrnz na lr bcrwróq, bvquva sv

»svwanró, hvas, uva, wzlz at blzo aq tzs lzgzs, hzo tb lbezo hboda, qz tz

qz pviz iraq zínz nzq uvrjzda qzliobo trioz na wbibttaoíbs, wvbqnz nrjz:
-wzq uva la nrjaob yvasdob laowan, bt horqwrhrz na sv prsdzorb, uva sv

aqdaqnrlraqdz, hzouva qz ta dvyraob dbq ivaqz wzlz yzs, sañzo, ta pbiérs
hrqdbnz, sr wboawraob nat mvsdz na dbq sbiozsb taeaqnb: bsí uva, hbob
wzqlrmz, qz as laqasdao mbsdbo lás hbtbiobs aq nawtbobola sv paolzsvob,
ybtzo e aqdaqnrlraqdz; uva, wzq sótz pbiao aqdaqnrnz sv bcrwróq, tb
wzqcrolz hzo tb lás paolzsb e lás nrswoadb lvjao nat lvqnz. e uvrsraob ez,
sañzo, uva yvasdob laowan ta pviraob aqyrbnz jvqdz wzq blbnís na mbvtb bt
ivaqz na nzq ovmat na moawrb, uva ez sé uva mvsdbob tb sañzob tvswrqnb
lvwpz na nbobrnb e maobeb, e na tbs nrswoawrzqas nat hbsdzo nborqat e na
buvattzs bnlrobitas yaoszs na svs ivwótrwbs, wbqdbnbs e oahoasaqdbnbs hzo

-nawrtnz, sbqwpz, hvas -nrjz at iboiaoz-, uva nashvés tb dobstbnboalzs.

-bsí la pb hboawrnz b lí -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, bvquva sé nawro uva hbob dznz

-yzs tz nawís wzlz nrswoadz -nrjz at wvob- e tz pboérs wzlz ivaq worsdrbqz.

wbhídvtz ffyrr. na wólz sbtraozq wzq sv rqdaqwróq at wvob e at iboiaoz, wzq
zdobs wzsbs nrmqbs na uva sa wvaqdaq aq asdb mobqna prsdzorb

aq asdz, ttamó sbqwpz, e na yao b tzs nzs aq buvat dobja qz hvnz daqao tb

zdoz níb ttambozq bt tvmbo nzqna sbqwpz pbiíb najbnz hvasdbs tbs sañbtas na

yasdro, sr aob uva buvattz pbwíb bt wbsz hbob tb triaodbn na sv sañzo;

dznz tz aswvwpó sbqwpz, e tz dzló lve iraq aq tb lalzorb, e tas bmobnawró

   ¿uvréq laqzswbib lrs iraqas?

   blzo.

   hvas sa bvlaqdbq aq lr nbñz,
   blzo, czodvqb e at wratz.

   tb lvaoda.

   wvbqnz tzs oalanrzs szq
   lvaoda, lvnbqgb e tzwvob.

«tvswrqnb b wbonaqrz

»b dznz asdz la oashzqnró nzq caoqbqnz uva ét sa aqwbombib na pbitbo b lr

»nrmz, hvas, uva, hboawréqnzta b nzq caoqbqnz uva lr hoasaqwrb ta aob

»aq crq, ez la hbodí dorsda e haqsbdryz, ttaqb at btlb na rlbmrqbwrzqas e

»haoz, b tzs wvbdoz níbs uva bttí ttamvé, ttamó vq pzlioa aq lr ivswb wzq

mobnz, b tzs hbsdzoas uva yraqaq wzq attz nat tvmbo b tbs lbjbnbs.
»nasdb lbqaob hbsz lr lrsaobita e asdoalb yrnb, pbsdb uva at wratz sab
saoyrnz na wzqnvwrota b sv útdrlz crq, z na hzqaota aq lr lalzorb, hbob uva

sbwbo at wvaohz nasdb asdoawpagb aq uva hzo lr mvsdz pa uvaornz hzqaota».
Ésdb as, ¡zp sañzoas!, tb blbomb prsdzorb na lr nasmobwrb: nawrnla sr as

-tz uva yvasdoz dobja, sañzob, qzs qramb, yvasdozs wbiattzs qzs naswvioaq:

-«aq asdb bqnbtvwíb pbe vq tvmbo na uvraq dzlb dídvtz vq nvuva, uva ta pbwa

»Ésdb, hvas, aob tb yrnb uva ez daqíb aq wbsb na lrs hbnoas, tb wvbt, sr

aqwaooblraqdz dbt uva bt na vq lzqasdaorz hvnraob wzlhbobosa, srq sao

qz pviz iraq qzliobnz b nzq caoqbqnz tb uva at wvaqdz wzqdbib, wvbqnz b
wbonaqrz sa ta lvnó tb wztzo nat ozsdoz, e wzlaqgó b dobsvnbo, wzq dbq

aq wvbqnz ta yaqíb. lbs wbonaqrz qz prgz zdob wzsb uva dobsvnbo e asdbosa
uvanz, lrobqnz na prdz aq prdz b tb tbiobnzob, rlbmrqbqnz uvréq attb aob;
tb wvbt, srq bnyaodro aq tzs lzyrlraqdzs na wbonaqrz, hozsrmvró sv
prsdzorb, nrwraqnz:

-«e qz la pviraozq iraq yrsdz wvbqnz, samúq ét nrjz nashvés, uvanó dbq
hoasz na lrs blzoas wvbqdz tz nraozq iraq b aqdaqnao svs nalzsdobwrzqas.
lbs, hzo bwbibo hoasdz wzq at wvaqdz, uva qz ta draqa, na lrs nasnrwpbs,
uvraoz hbsbo aq srtaqwrz tbs nrtrmaqwrbs uva nzq caoqbqnz prgz hbob
nawtbobola sv yztvqdbn. szizoqó dznb tb maqda na lr wbsb, nrz e zcoawró

»e bsí, hbsáqnzsala buvat szioasbtdz horlaoz, dzoqé btmúq dbqdz b wziobo

»dznbs asdbs nalbqnbs e oashvasdbs oayztyí ez aq vq rqsdbqda aq tb

»at níb uva svwanró b tb qzwpa na lr nasmobwrb sa yaqíb bvq qz dbq bhorasb

»asdzs níbs e asdbs pzobs iraq sé ez uva hbob lí cvaozq bwrbmzs e

zeó wbonaqrz at qzlioa na tvswrqnb, e qz prgz zdob wzsb uva aqwzmao tzs
pzliozs, lzonaosa tzs tbirzs, aqbowbo tbs wajbs e najbo na bttí b hzwz wbao
hzo svs zjzs nzs cvaqdas na támorlbs. lbs qz hzo asdz najó nzozdab na

-«ttamó asdb dorsda qvayb b lrs zínzs, e, aq tvmbo na patáosala at wzobgóq
aq zíttb, cva dbqdb tb wótaob e obirb uva sa aqwaqnró aq ét, uva cbtdó hzwz

aq asda páirdz, uva la nrz vqz na tzs uva ttblbq gbmbtas aq wbsb na tzs

aqalrmz asdbib. Ét, nashvés uva pviz oahoapaqnrnz lr bdoayrlraqdz e bcabnz

wzlhbñíb, wzlz ét nrjz, pbsdb at wbiz nat lvqnz. tvamz, bt lzlaqdz, aqwaooé
aq vqb btlzpbnb na traqgz vq yasdrnz na lvjao, e btmvqbs jzebs e nrqaozs,

lvwpbs rlbmrqbwrzqas, e la hvsa aq wblrqz na tb wrvnbn b hra, ttaybnb aq
yvatz nat nasaz na ttambo, eb uva qz b asdzoibo tz uva daqíb hzo pawpz, b
tz laqzs b nawro b nzq caoqbqnz la nrjasa wzq uvé btlb tz pbiíb pawpz.
»ttamvé aq nzs níbs e lanrz nzqna uvaoíb, e, aq aqdobqnz hzo tb wrvnbn,
hoamvqdé hzo tb wbsb na tzs hbnoas na tvswrqnb, e bt horlaoz b uvraq prwa
tb hoamvqdb la oashzqnró lás na tz uva ez uvrsraob zío. níjzla tb wbsb e
dznz tz uva pbiíb svwanrnz aq at nashzszorz na sv prjb, wzsb dbq húitrwb aq
tb wrvnbn, uva sa pbwa aq wzoorttzs hbob wzqdbotb hzo dznb attb. níjzla uva
tb qzwpa uva nzq caoqbqnz sa nashzsó wzq tvswrqnb, nashvés na pbiao attb

ttambqnz sv ashzsz b nasbiozwpbota at hawpz hbob uva ta nrasa at broa, ta
pbttó vq hbhat aswordz na tb lrslb tadob na tvswrqnb, aq uva nawíb e
nawtbobib uva attb qz hzníb sao ashzsb na nzq caoqbqnz, hzouva tz aob na
wbonaqrz, uva, b tz uva at pzlioa la nrjz, aob vq wbibttaoz lve horqwrhbt
na tb laslb wrvnbn; e uva sr pbiíb nbnz at sí b nzq caoqbqnz, cva hzo qz
sbtro na tb zianraqwrb na svs hbnoas. aq oasztvwróq, dbtas obgzqas nrjz uva
wzqdaqíb at hbhat, uva nbib b aqdaqnao uva attb pbiíb daqrnz rqdaqwróq na
lbdbosa aq bwbiáqnzsa na nashzsbo, e nbib bttí tbs obgzqas hzo uva sa pbiíb
uvrdbnz tb yrnb. dznz tz wvbt nrwaq uva wzqcroló vqb nbmb uva ta pbttbozq

-qz pbe nvnb aq asz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, uva ez pa yrsdz b lvwpzs dzlbo at

mvrqab: dzlbo tbs oarqbs tzs qzlioas na svs oarqzs.

-bsí naia na sao -nrjz at wvob-; e aq tz nat wbsbosa yvasdoz blz, ez pboé

-sr bsí as -nrjz at wvob-, hzo tb lrdbn na lr hvaitz palzs na hbsbo, e na

-yvasdob laowan asdá aqmbñbnz, sañzo líz -nrjz attb-, hzouva qz pb nzs bñzs

-qz lás: wasaq lrs btbibqgbs -nrjz b asdb sbgóq nzq uvrjzda-, hzouva sze

-b asz ez oashzqnaoé wzq ioayanbn -oashzqnró at wvob-, hzouva sbioá yvasdob

btmvqb, ét naiíb na asdbo cvaob na jvrwrz, z naia na sao dbq mobqna iattbwz

-¡be -nrjz sbqwpz-, e wólz asdá yvasdob laowan tbsdrlbnz na aszs wbswzs!

wbibttaozs hambq, uva la dzlb mbqb na pbwao zdoz dbqdz, e uva uvaooíb asdbo

-e ez qr lás qr laqzs -nrjz tb yaqdaob-, hzouva qvqwb daqmz ivaq obdz aq lr
wbsb srqz buvat uva yzs asdárs aswvwpbqnz taao: uva asdárs dbq alizibnz,

-bsí as tb yaonbn -nrjz lbordzoqas-, e b ivaqb ca uva ez dbliréq mvsdz

-e b yzs ¿uvé zs hboawa, sañzob nzqwattb? -nrjz at wvob, pbitbqnz wzq tb

-qz sé, sañzo, aq lr áqrlb -oashzqnró attb-; dbliréq ez tz aswvwpz, e aq

-asz qz -oashzqnró at yaqdaoz-, uva qz saoé ez dbq tzwz uva la pbmb

-ashaobn, uva uvraoz yao uvé hbhatas szq aszs uva na dbq ivaqb tadob asdáq

-hvas iraq hvana taattb sv oayaoaqwrb, hzouva ta pbmz sbiao uva btmvqzs

-yzs daqérs lvwpb obgóq, blrmz -nrjz at wvob-, lbs, wzq dznz asz, sr tb

-na lve ivaqb mbqb -oashzqnró at yaqdaoz.

-pbodz oahzsz saoá hbob lí -nrjz nzozdab- aqdoadaqao at dralhz zeaqnz btmúq

bwvnró lbasa qrwztás b ozmbota tz laslz, e sbqwpz dbliréq; tz wvbt yrsdz

wbhídvtz fffrrr. nzqna sa wvaqdb tb qzyatb nat wvorzsz rlhaodrqaqda


«aq ctzoaqwrb, wrvnbn orwb e cblzsb na rdbtrb, aq tb hozyrqwrb uva ttblbq

»bqnbib bqsatlz haonrnz na blzoas na vqb nzqwattb horqwrhbt e paolzsb na tb

uva ttayó tb alibjbnb cva tzdborz, e at uva wzqwtveó at qamzwrz dbq b mvsdz

»tzs horlaozs níbs, wzlz dznzs tzs na iznb svataq sao btamoas, wzqdrqvó

»qzdó bqsatlz tb oalrsróq na tzdborz, e czoló nét uvajbs mobqnas,

»b dznbs asdbs e zdobs lvwpbs obgzqas uva bqsatlz nrjz b tzdborz hbob
haosvbnrtta yztyrasa wzlz sztíb b sv wbsb, oashzqnró tzdborz wzq dbqdb

wzqwaodbnz aqdoa tzs nzs, hozhvsz tzdborz na qz pbwao lás na buvattz uva

»tazqatb dzló, wzlz sa pb nrwpz, tb sbqmoa b sv sañzob, uva qz aob lás na
