nzqna tzs najboalzs hzo bpzob, hzo wzqdbo tz uva at wbibttaoz nat izsuva
hbsó wzq at na tb dorsda crmvob.





wbhídvtz fry. nzqna sa hozsrmva tb byaqdvob nat wbibttaoz nat izsuva


aqdoa lvwpbs obgzqas uva hbsbozq nzq uvrjzda e at wbibttaoz na tb satyb,
nrwa tb prsdzorb uva at nat izsuva nrjz b nzq uvrjzda:

-crqbtlaqda, sañzo wbibttaoz, uvraoz uva sahárs uva lr nasdrqz, z, hzo
lajzo nawro, lr atawwróq, la dovjz b aqblzobo na tb srq hbo wbsrtnab na
ybqnbtrb. ttálztb srq hbo hzouva qz ta draqa, bsí aq tb mobqnagb nat wvaohz
wzlz aq at asdoalz nat asdbnz e na tb paolzsvob. asdb dbt wbsrtnab, hvas,
uva yze wzqdbqnz, hbmó lrs ivaqzs haqsblraqdzs e wzlanrnzs nasazs wzq
pbwaola zwvhbo, wzlz sv lbnorqb b péowvtas, aq lvwpzs e nryaoszs hatrmozs,
hozladréqnzla bt crq na wbnb vqz uva aq at crq nat zdoz ttamboíb at na lr
ashaobqgb; haoz bsí sa pbq rnz astbizqbqnz lrs dobibjzs, uva qz draqaq
wvaqdz, qr ez sé wvát pb na sao at útdrlz uva né horqwrhrz bt wvlhtrlraqdz
na lrs ivaqzs nasazs. vqb yag la lbqnó uva cvasa b nasbcrbo b buvattb
cblzsb mrmbqdb na sayrttb ttblbnb tb mrobtnb, uva as dbq ybtraqda e cvaoda
wzlz pawpb na iozqwa, e, srq lvnbosa na vq tvmbo, as tb lás lzyrita e
yztdborb lvjao nat lvqnz. ttamvé, yrtb, e yaqwítb, e píwatb asdbo uvanb e b
obeb, hzouva aq lás na vqb salbqb qz szhtbozq srqz yraqdzs qzodas. yag
dbliréq pviz uva la lbqnó cvasa b dzlbo aq hasz tbs bqdrmvbs hranobs na tzs
ybtraqdas dzozs na mvrsbqnz, alhoasb lás hbob aqwzlaqnbosa b mbqbhbqas uva
b wbibttaozs. zdob yag la lbqnó uva la hoawrhrdbsa e svlrasa aq tb srlb na
wbiob, hatrmoz rqbvnrdz e dalaozsz, e uva ta dovjasa hbodrwvtbo oatbwróq na
tz uva aq buvattb aswvob hozcvqnrnbn sa aqwraoob. nadvya at lzyrlraqdz b tb
mrobtnb, hasé tzs dzozs na mvrsbqnz, nashañéla aq tb srlb e sbuvé b tvg tz
aswzqnrnz na sv birslz, e lrs ashaobqgbs, lvaodbs uva lvaodbs, e svs
lbqnblraqdzs e nasnaqas, yryzs uva yryzs. aq oasztvwróq, útdrlblaqda la pb
lbqnbnz uva nrswvoob hzo dznbs tbs hozyrqwrbs na ashbñb e pbmb wzqcasbo b
dznzs tzs bqnbqdas wbibttaozs uva hzo attbs ybmboaq uva attb sztb as tb lás
byaqdbjbnb aq paolzsvob na wvbqdbs pze yryaq, e uva ez sze at lás ybtraqda
e at lás iraq aqblzobnz wbibttaoz nat zoia; aq wveb nalbqnb pa bqnbnz eb tb
lbezo hboda na ashbñb, e aq attb pa yaqwrnz lvwpzs wbibttaozs uva sa pbq
bdoayrnz b wzqdobnawrola. haoz na tz uva ez lás la hoawrz e vcbqz as na
pbiao yaqwrnz, aq srqmvtbo ibdbttb, b buvat dbq cblzsz wbibttaoz nzq
uvrjzda na tb lbqwpb, e péwpzta wzqcasbo uva as lás paolzsb lr wbsrtnab uva
sv nvtwrqab; e aq sztz asda yaqwrlraqdz pbmz wvaqdb uva pa yaqwrnz dznzs
tzs wbibttaozs nat lvqnz, hzouva at dbt nzq uvrjzda uva nrmz tzs pb yaqwrnz
b dznzs; e, pbiréqnzta ez yaqwrnz b ét, sv mtzorb, sv cblb e sv pzqob sa pb
dobqscaornz e hbsbnz b lr haoszqb;

e dbqdz at yaqwanzo as lás pzqobnz,

wvbqdz lás at yaqwrnz as oahvdbnz;

bsí uva, eb wzooaq hzo lr wvaqdb e szq líbs tbs rqvlaobitas pbgbñbs nat eb
oacaornz nzq uvrjzda.

bnlrobnz uvanó nzq uvrjzda na zío bt wbibttaoz nat izsuva, e asdvyz lrt
yawas hzo nawrota uva laqdíb, e eb dvyz at laqdís aq at hrwz na tb taqmvb;
haoz oahzodósa tz lajzo uva hvnz, hzo pbwaota wzqcasbo hzo sv hozhrb izwb
sv laqdrob; e bsí, szsambnblaqda ta nrjz:

-na uva yvasb laowan, sañzo wbibttaoz, pbeb yaqwrnz b tzs lás wbibttaozs
bqnbqdas na ashbñb, e bvq na dznz at lvqnz, qz nrmz qbnb; haoz na uva pbeb
yaqwrnz b nzq uvrjzda na tb lbqwpb, hóqmztz aq nvnb. hznoíb sao uva cvasa
zdoz uva ta hboawrasa, bvquva pbe hzwzs uva ta hboagwbq.

-¿wólz qz? -oahtrwó at nat izsuva-. hzo at wratz uva qzs wvioa, uva hataé
wzq nzq uvrjzda, e ta yaqwí e oaqní; e as vq pzlioa btdz na wvaohz, sawz na
ozsdoz, asdrobnz e byattbqbnz na lraliozs, aqdoawbqz, tb qborg bmvrtañb e
btmz wzoyb, na irmzdas mobqnas, qamozs e wbínzs. wblhab naibjz nat qzlioa
nat wbibttaoz na tb dorsda crmvob, e doba hzo aswvnaoz b vq tbiobnzo
ttblbnz sbqwpz hbqgb; zhorla at tzlz e orma at coaqz na vq cblzsz wbibttz
ttblbnz ozwrqbqda, e, crqbtlaqda, draqa hzo sañzob na sv yztvqdbn b vqb dbt
nvtwrqab nat dzizsz, ttblbnb vq dralhz btnzqgb tzoaqgz; wzlz tb líb, uva,
hzo ttblbosa wbsrtnb e sao na tb bqnbtvwíb, ez tb ttblz wbsrtnab na
ybqnbtrb. sr dznbs asdbs sañbs qz ibsdbq hbob bwoanrdbo lr yaonbn, buví
asdá lr ashbnb, uva tb pboá nbo woénrdz b tb laslb rqwoanvtrnbn.

-szsambzs, sañzo wbibttaoz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, e aswvwpbn tz uva nawro zs
uvraoz. pbiérs na sbiao uva asa nzq uvrjzda uva nawís as at lbezo blrmz uva
aq asda lvqnz daqmz, e dbqdz, uva hznoé nawro uva ta daqmz aq tvmbo na lr
lrslb haoszqb, e uva hzo tbs sañbs uva nét la pbiérs nbnz, dbq hvqdvbtas e
wraodbs, qz hvanz haqsbo srqz uva sab at lrslz uva pbiérs yaqwrnz. hzo zdob
hboda, yaz wzq tzs zjzs e dzwz wzq tbs lbqzs qz sao hzsrita sao at laslz,
sr eb qz cvasa uva wzlz ét draqa lvwpzs aqalrmzs aqwbqdbnzoas,
ashawrbtlaqda vqz uva na zonrqborz ta haosrmva, qz pbeb btmvqz nattzs
dzlbnz sv crmvob hbob najbosa yaqwao, hzo nacobvnbota na tb cblb uva svs
btdbs wbibttaoíbs ta draqaq mobqjabnb e bnuvrornb hzo dznz tz naswviraodz
na tb draoob. e, hbob wzqcrolbwróq nasdz, uvraoz dbliréq uva sahárs uva tzs
dbtas aqwbqdbnzoas svs wzqdoborzs qz pb lás na nzs níbs uva dobqsczolbozq
tb crmvob e haoszqb na tb paolzsb nvtwrqab nat dzizsz aq vqb btnabqb szag e
ibjb, e nasdb lbqaob pbioáq dobqsczolbnz b nzq uvrjzda; e sr dznz asdz qz
ibsdb hbob aqdaobozs aq asdb yaonbn uva nrmz, buví asdá at laslz nzq
uvrjzda, uva tb svsdaqdboá wzq svs bolbs b hra, z b wbibttz, z na
wvbtuvraob svaoda uva zs bmobnboa.

e, nrwraqnz asdz, sa taybqdó aq hra e sa alhvñó aq tb ashbnb, ashaobqnz uvé
oasztvwróq dzlboíb at wbibttaoz nat izsuva; at wvbt, wzq yzg bsrlrslz
szsambnb, oashzqnró e nrjz:

-bt ivaq hbmbnzo qz ta nvataq hoaqnbs: at uva vqb yag, sañzo nzq uvrjzda,
hvnz yaqwaozs dobqsczolbnz, iraq hznoá daqao ashaobqgb na oaqnrozs aq
yvasdoz hozhrz sao. lbs, hzouva qz as iraq uva tzs wbibttaozs pbmbq svs
cawpzs na bolbs bswvobs, wzlz tzs sbtdabnzoas e ovcrbqas, ashaoalzs at níb,
hbob uva at szt yab qvasdobs ziobs. e pb na sao wzqnrwróq na qvasdob
ibdbttb uva at yaqwrnz pb na uvanbo b tb yztvqdbn nat yaqwanzo, hbob uva
pbmb nét dznz tz uva uvrsraoa, wzq dbt uva sab nawaqda b wbibttaoz tz uva
sa ta zonaqboa.

-sze lás uva wzqdaqdz nasb wzqnrwróq e wzqyaqaqwrb -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda.

e, aq nrwraqnz asdz, sa cvaozq nzqna asdbibq svs aswvnaozs, e tzs pbttbozq
ozqwbqnz e aq tb lrslb czolb uva asdbibq wvbqnz tas sbtdaó at svañz.
nashaodáozqtzs e lbqnáozqtas uva dvyrasaq b hvqdz tzs wbibttzs, hzouva, aq
sbtraqnz at szt, pbiíbq na pbwao tzs nzs vqb sbqmoraqdb, srqmvtbo e
nasrmvbt ibdbttb; b wvebs qvaybs uvanó sbqwpz bdóqrdz e hbslbnz, dalaozsz
na tb sbtvn na sv blz, hzo tbs ybtaqdíbs uva pbiíb zínz nawro nat svez bt
aswvnaoz nat izsuva; haoz, srq pbitbo hbtbiob, sa cvaozq tzs nzs aswvnaozs
b ivswbo sv mbqbnz, uva eb dznzs doas wbibttzs e at ovwrz sa pbiíbq ztrnz,
e asdbibq dznzs jvqdzs.

aq at wblrqz nrjz at nat izsuva b sbqwpz:

-pb na sbiao, paolbqz, uva draqaq hzo wzsdvlioa tzs hatabqdas na tb
bqnbtvwíb, wvbqnz szq hbnorqzs na btmvqb haqnaqwrb, qz asdbosa zwrzszs lbqz
szioa lbqz aq dbqdz uva svs bprjbnzs orñaq. nímztz hzouva asdé bnyaodrnz
uva lraqdobs qvasdozs nvañzs orñaoaq, qzszdozs dbliréq palzs na hatabo e
pbwaoqzs bsdrttbs.

-asb wzsdvlioa, sañzo aswvnaoz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, bttá hvana wzooao e
hbsbo wzq tzs ovcrbqas e hatabqdas uva nrwa, haoz wzq tzs aswvnaozs na tzs
wbibttaozs bqnbqdas, qr hzo hraqsz. b tz laqzs, ez qz pa zínz nawro b lr
blz salajbqda wzsdvlioa, e sbia na lalzorb dznbs tbs zonaqbqgbs na tb
bqnbqda wbibttaoíb. wvbqdz lás, uva ez uvraoz uva sab yaonbn e zonaqbqgb
afhoasb at hatabo tzs aswvnaozs aq dbqdz uva svs sañzoas hatabq; haoz ez qz
uvraoz wvlhtrotb, srqz hbmbo tb haqb uva asdvyraoa hvasdb b tzs dbtas
hbwícrwzs aswvnaozs, uva ez bsamvoz uva qz hbsa na nzs triobs na waob, e
lás uvraoz hbmbo tbs dbtas triobs, uva sé uva la wzsdboáq laqzs uva tbs
prtbs uva hznoé mbsdbo aq wvobola tb wbiagb, uva eb la tb wvaqdz hzo
hbodrnb e nryrnrnb aq nzs hbodas. pbe lás: uva la rlhzsrirtrdb at oañro at
qz daqao ashbnb, hvas aq lr yrnb la tb hvsa.

-hbob asz sé ez vq ivaq oalanrz -nrjz at nat izsuva-: ez dobrmz buví nzs
dbtambs na traqgz, na vq laslz dblbñz: dzlboérs yzs tb vqb, e ez tb zdob, e
orñroalzs b dbtambgzs, wzq bolbs rmvbtas.

-nasb lbqaob, sab aq ivaqb pzob -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, hzouva bqdas saoyroá tb
dbt hatab na nashztyzoaboqzs uva na paoroqzs.

-qz pb na sao bsí -oahtrwó at zdoz-, hzouva sa pbq na awpbo naqdoz na tbs
dbtambs, hzouva qz sa tbs ttaya at broa, lanrb nzwaqb na mvrjboozs trqnzs e
hatbnzs, uva hasaq dbqdz tzs vqzs wzlz tzs zdozs, e nasdb lbqaob qzs
hznoalzs bdbtambo srq pbwaoqzs lbt qr nbñz.

-¡lrobn, wvaohz na lr hbnoa -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, uvé lbodbs waizttrqbs, z
uvé wzhzs na btmznóq wbonbnz hzqa aq tbs dbtambs, hbob qz uvanbo lztrnzs
tzs wbswzs e pawpzs btpañb tzs pvaszs! haoz, bvquva sa ttaqbobq na wbhvttzs
na sanb, sahb, sañzo líz, uva qz pa na hatabo: hataaq qvasdozs blzs, e bttá
sa tz pbebq, e iaiblzs e yryblzs qzszdozs, uva at dralhz draqa wvrnbnz na
uvrdboqzs tbs yrnbs, srq uva bqnalzs ivswbqnz bhadrdas hbob uva sa bwbiaq
bqdas na ttambo sv sbgóq e déolrqz e uva sa wbebq na lbnvobs.

-wzq dznz -oahtrwó at nat izsuva-, palzs na hatabo sruvraob lanrb pzob.

-asz qz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-: qz saoé ez dbq naswzodés qr dbq nasbmobnawrnz,
uva wzq uvraq pa wzlrnz e pa iairnz dobia wvasdróq btmvqb, hzo líqrlb uva
sab; wvbqdz lás uva, asdbqnz srq wótaob e srq aqzjz, ¿uvréq nrbitzs sa pb
na blbñbo b oañro b sawbs?

-hbob asz -nrjz at nat izsuva- ez nboé vq svcrwraqda oalanrz: e as uva,
bqdas uva wzlaqwalzs tb hatab, ez la ttamboé izqrdblaqda b yvasdob laowan
e ta nboé doas z wvbdoz izcadbnbs, uva né wzq ét b lrs hras, wzq tbs wvbtas
ta pboé nashaodbo tb wótaob, bvquva asdé wzq lás svañz uva vq troóq.

-wzqdob asa wzoda sé ez zdoz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, uva qz ta yb aq gbmb:
wzmaoé ez vq mboozda, e, bqdas uva yvasdob laowan ttamva b nashaodbola tb
wótaob, pboé ez nzolro b mboozdbgzs na dbt svaoda tb sveb, uva qz nashraoda
sr qz cvaoa aq at zdoz lvqnz, aq at wvbt sa sbia uva qz sze ez pzlioa uva
la najz lbqzsabo at ozsdoz na qbnra; e wbnb vqz lroa hzo at yrozda, bvquva
tz lás bwaodbnz saoíb najbo nzolro sv wótaob b wbnb vqz, uva qz sbia qbnra
at btlb na qbnra, e dbt svata yaqro hzo tbqb uva yvatya doasuvrtbnz; e nrzs
iaqnrjz tb hbg e lbtnrjz tbs orñbs, hzouva sr vq mbdz bwzsbnz, aqwaoobnz e
bhoadbnz sa yvatya aq taóq, ez, uva sze pzlioa, nrzs sbia aq tz uva hznoé
yztyaola; e bsí, nasna bpzob rqdrlz b yvasdob laowan, sañzo aswvnaoz, uva
wzoob hzo sv wvaqdb dznz at lbt e nbñz uva na qvasdob haqnaqwrb oasvtdboa.

-asdá iraq -oahtrwó at nat izsuva-. blbqawaoá nrzs e lanoboalzs.

aq asdz, eb wzlaqgbibq b mzojabo aq tzs áoiztas lrt svaodas na hrqdbnzs
hbjborttzs, e aq svs nryaoszs e btamoas wbqdzs hboawíb uva nbibq tb
qzobivaqb e sbtvnbibq b tb coaswb bvozob, uva eb hzo tbs hvaodbs e ibtwzqas
nat zoraqda rib naswvioraqnz tb paolzsvob na sv ozsdoz, sbwvnraqnz na svs
wbiattzs vq qúlaoz rqcrqrdz na tíuvrnbs haotbs, aq wvez svbya trwzo
ibñáqnzsa tbs eaoibs, hboawíb bsrlaslz uva attbs iozdbibq e ttzyíbq
itbqwz e laqvnz btjócbo; tzs sbvwas nasdrtbibq lbqá sbiozsz, oaíbqsa tbs
cvaqdas, lvolvobibq tzs boozezs, btamoáibqsa tbs satybs e aqoruvawíbqsa tzs
hobnzs wzq sv yaqrnb. lbs, bhaqbs nrz tvmbo tb wtbornbn nat níb hbob yao e
nrcaoaqwrbo tbs wzsbs, wvbqnz tb horlaob uva sa zcoawró b tzs zjzs na
sbqwpz hbqgb cva tb qborg nat aswvnaoz nat izsuva, uva aob dbq mobqna uva
wbsr ta pbwíb szliob b dznz at wvaohz. wvéqdbsa, aq acawdz, uva aob na
nalbsrbnb mobqnagb, wzoyb aq tb lrdbn e dznb ttaqb na yaoovmbs, na wztzo
blzobdbnz, wzlz na iaoaqjaqb; ibjáibta nzs nanzs lás bibjz na tb izwb; wveb
mobqnagb, wztzo, yaoovmbs e aqwzoyblraqdz bsí ta bcabibq at ozsdoz, uva, aq
yréqnzta sbqwpz, wzlaqgó b paoro na hra e na lbqz, wzlz qrñz wzq btcaoawíb,
e hozhvsz aq sv wzobgóq na najbosa nbo nzwraqdbs izcadbnbs bqdas uva
nashaodbo tb wótaob hbob oañro wzq buvat yasdrmtz.

nzq uvrjzda lroó b sv wzqdaqnzo, e pbttóta eb hvasdb e wbtbnb tb watbnb, na
lznz uva qz ta hvnz yao at ozsdoz, haoz qzdó uva aob pzlioa laliovnz, e qz
lve btdz na wvaohz. szioa tbs bolbs dobíb vqb szioayrsdb z wbsbwb na vqb
datb, bt hboawao, na zoz crqísrlz, saliobnbs hzo attb lvwpbs tvqbs hauvañbs
na oashtbqnawraqdas ashajzs, uva ta pbwíbq aq mobqnísrlb lbqaob mbtáq e
yrsdzsz; yztáibqta szioa tb watbnb mobqna wbqdrnbn na htvlbs yaonas,
blborttbs e itbqwbs; tb tbqgb, uva daqíb boorlbnb b vq áoizt, aob
mobqnísrlb e movasb, e na vq praooz bwaobnz na lás na vq hbtlz.

dznz tz lroó e dznz tz qzdó nzq uvrjzda, e jvgmó na tz yrsdz e lrobnz uva
at eb nrwpz wbibttaoz naiíb na sao na mobqnas cvaogbs; haoz qz hzo asz
dalró, wzlz sbqwpz hbqgb; bqdas, wzq maqdrt naqvanz, nrjz bt wbibttaoz na
tzs ashajzs:

-sr tb lvwpb mbqb na hatabo, sañzo wbibttaoz, qz zs mbsdb tb wzodasíb, hzo
attb zs hrnz uva btwérs tb yrsaob vq hzwz, hzouva ez yab sr tb mbttboníb na
yvasdoz ozsdoz oashzqna b tb na yvasdob nrshzsrwróq.

-z yaqwrnz z yaqwanzo uva sbtmárs nasdb alhoasb, sañzo wbibttaoz -oashzqnró
at na tzs ashajzs-, zs uvanboá dralhz e ashbwrz nalbsrbnz hbob yaola; e sr
bpzob qz sbdrscbmz b yvasdoz nasaz, as hzo hboawaola uva pbmz qzdbita
bmobyrz b tb paolzsb wbsrtnab na ybqnbtrb aq nrtbdbo at dralhz uva dbonboa
aq btgbola tb yrsaob, srq pbwaozs wzqcasbo tz uva eb sbiérs uva hoadaqnz.

-hvas, aq dbqdz uva svirlzs b wbibttz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, iraq hznérs
nawrola sr sze ez buvat nzq uvrjzda uva nrjrsdas pbiao yaqwrnz.

-b asz yzs oashzqnalzs -nrjz at na tzs ashajzs- uva hboawérs, wzlz sa
hboawa vq pvayz b zdoz, bt lrslz wbibttaoz uva ez yaqwí; haoz, samúq yzs
nawís uva ta haosrmvaq aqwbqdbnzoas, qz zsboé bcrolbo sr szrs at wzqdaqrnz
z qz.

-asz la ibsdb b lí -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- hbob uva woab yvasdoz aqmbñz;
alhaoz, hbob sbwbozs nét na dznz hvqdz, yaqmbq qvasdozs wbibttzs; uva, aq
laqzs dralhz uva at uva dbonáobnas aq btgbozs tb yrsaob, sr nrzs, sr lr
sañzob e lr iobgz la ybtaq, yaoé ez yvasdoz ozsdoz, e yzs yaoérs uva qz sze
ez at yaqwrnz nzq uvrjzda uva haqsárs.

wzq asdz, bwzodbqnz obgzqas, sviraozq b wbibttz, e nzq uvrjzda yztyró tbs
oraqnbs b ozwrqbqda hbob dzlbo tz uva wzqyaqíb nat wblhz, hbob yztyao b
aqwzqdobo b sv wzqdoborz, e tz laslz prgz at na tzs ashajzs. haoz, qz sa
pbiíb bhbodbnz nzq uvrjzda yarqda hbszs, wvbqnz sa zeó ttblbo nat na tzs
ashajzs, e, hbodraqnz tzs nzs at wblrqz, at na tzs ashajzs ta nrjz:

-bnyaodrn, sañzo wbibttaoz, uva tb wzqnrwróq na qvasdob ibdbttb as uva at
yaqwrnz, wzlz zdob yag pa nrwpz, pb na uvanbo b nrswoawróq nat yaqwanzo.

-eb tb sé -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-; wzq dbt uva tz uva sa ta rlhvsraoa e
lbqnboa bt yaqwrnz pbq na sao wzsbs uva qz sbtmbq na tzs tílrdas na tb
wbibttaoíb.

-bsí sa aqdraqna -oashzqnró at na tzs ashajzs.

zcoawréozqsata aq asdz b tb yrsdb na nzq uvrjzda tbs asdobñbs qborwas nat
aswvnaoz, e qz sa bnlroó laqzs na yaotbs uva sbqwpz; dbqdz, uva ta jvgmó
hzo btmúq lzqsdoz, z hzo pzlioa qvayz e na buvattzs uva qz sa vsbq aq at
lvqnz. sbqwpz, uva yrz hbodro b sv blz hbob dzlbo wbooaob, qz uvrsz uvanbo
sztz wzq at qbormvnz, dalraqnz uva wzq sztz vq hbsbmzqgbtz wzq buvattbs
qborwas aq tbs svebs saoíb bwbibnb tb haqnaqwrb sveb, uvanbqnz nat mztha, z
nat lranz, daqnrnz aq at svatz, e cvasa dobs sv blz, bsrnz b vqb bwwróq na
ozwrqbqda; e, wvbqnz ta hboawró uva eb aob dralhz uva yztyrasa, ta nrjz:

-svhtrwz b yvasb laowan, sañzo líz, uva bqdas uva yvatyb b aqwzqdobosa la
bevna b sviro szioa buvat btwzoqzuva, na nzqna hznoé yao lás b lr sbizo,
lajzo uva nasna at svatz, at mbttbonz aqwvaqdoz uva yvasb laowan pb na
pbwao wzq asda wbibttaoz.

-bqdas woaz, sbqwpz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, uva da uvraoas aqwboblbo e sviro aq
bqnblrz hzo yao srq hatrmoz tzs dzozs.

-tb yaonbn uva nrmb -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, tbs nasbczobnbs qborwas na buvat
aswvnaoz la draqaq bdóqrdz e ttaqz na ashbqdz, e qz la bdoayz b asdbo jvqdz
b ét.

-attbs szq dbtas -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, uva, b qz sao ez uvraq sze, dbliréq la
bszliobobq; e bsí, yaq: bevnboda pa b sviro nzqna nrwas.

aq tz uva sa nadvyz nzq uvrjzda aq uva sbqwpz svirasa aq at btwzoqzuva,
dzló at na tzs ashajzs nat wblhz tz uva ta hboawró qawasborz; e, woaeaqnz
uva tz lrslz pbioíb pawpz nzq uvrjzda, srq ashaobo szq na dozlhadb qr zdob
sañbt uva tzs byrsbsa, yztyró tbs oraqnbs b sv wbibttz -uva qz aob lás
trmaoz qr na lajzo hboawao uva ozwrqbqda-, e, b dznz sv wzooao, uva aob vq
lanrbqz dozda, rib b aqwzqdobo b sv aqalrmz; haoz, yréqnzta zwvhbnz aq tb
svirnb na sbqwpz, nadvyz tbs oraqnbs e hboósa aq tb lrdbn na tb wbooaob, na
tz uva at wbibttz uvanó bmobnawrnísrlz, b wbvsb uva eb qz hzníb lzyaosa.
nzq uvrjzda, uva ta hboawró uva eb sv aqalrmz yaqíb yztbqnz, boorló
oawrblaqda tbs ashvatbs b tbs dobsrjbnbs rjbnbs na ozwrqbqda, e ta prgz
bmvrjbo na lbqaob, uva wvaqdb tb prsdzorb uva asdb sztb yag sa wzqzwró
pbiao wzoornz btmz, hzouva dznbs tbs nalás sralhoa cvaozq dozdas
nawtbobnzs; e wzq asdb qz yrsdb cvorb ttamó nzqna at na tzs ashajzs asdbib
prqwbqnz b sv wbibttz tbs ashvatbs pbsdb tzs izdzqas, srq uva ta hvnrasa
lzyao vq sztz nanz nat tvmbo nzqna pbiíb pawpz asdbqwz na sv wbooaob.

aq asdb ivaqb sbgóq e wzevqdvob pbttó nzq uvrjzda b sv wzqdoborz alibobgbnz
wzq sv wbibttz e zwvhbnz wzq sv tbqgb, uva qvqwb, z qz bwaodó, z qz dvyz
tvmbo na hzqaotb aq orsdoa. nzq uvrjzda, uva qz lrobib aq asdzs
rqwzqyaqraqdas, b sbtyblbqz e srq hatrmoz btmvqz, aqwzqdoó bt na tzs
ashajzs wzq dbqdb cvaogb, uva lbt na sv mobnz ta prgz yaqro bt svatz hzo
tbs bqwbs nat wbibttz, nbqnz dbt wbínb, uva, srq lzyao hra qr lbqz, nrz
sañbtas na uva asdbib lvaodz.

bhaqbs ta yrz wbínz sbqwpz, wvbqnz sa nastrgó nat btwzoqzuva e b dznb
horasb yrqz nzqna sv sañzo asdbib, at wvbt, bhaáqnzsa na ozwrqbqda, cva
szioa at na tzs ashajzs, e, uvrdáqnzta tbs tbgbnbs nat eatlz hbob yao sr
aob lvaodz e hbob uva ta nrasa at broa sr bwbsz asdbib yryz; e yrz...
¿uvréq hznoá nawro tz uva yrz, srq wbvsbo bnlrobwróq, lbobyrttb e ashbqdz b
tzs uva tz zeaoaq? yrz, nrwa tb prsdzorb, at ozsdoz laslz, tb lrslb crmvob,
at laslz bshawdz, tb lrslb crszqzlíb, tb laslb acrmra, tb hashadryb laslb
nat ibwprttao sbqsóq wboobswz; e, bsí wzlz tb yrz, aq btdbs yzwas nrjz:

-¡bwvna, sbqwpz, e lrob tz uva pbs na yao e qz tz pbs woaao! ¡bmvrjb, prjz,
e bnyraoda tz uva hvana tb lbmrb, tz uva hvanaq tzs pawprwaozs e tzs
aqwbqdbnzoas!

ttamó sbqwpz, e, wzlz yrz at ozsdoz nat ibwprttao wboobswz, wzlaqgó b
pbwaosa lrt wovwas e b sbqdrmvbosa zdobs dbqdbs. aq dznz asdz, qz nbib
lvasdobs na asdbo yryz at naooribnz wbibttaoz, e sbqwpz nrjz b nzq uvrjzda:

-sze na hboawao, sañzo líz, uva, hzo sí z hzo qz, yvasb laowan prquva e
ladb tb ashbnb hzo tb izwb b asda uva hboawa at ibwprttao sbqsóq wboobswz;
uvrgá lbdboá aq ét b btmvqz na svs aqalrmzs tzs aqwbqdbnzoas.

-qz nrwas lbt -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, hzouva na tzs aqalrmzs, tzs laqzs.

e, sbwbqnz tb ashbnb hbob hzqao aq acawdz at byrsz e wzqsajz na sbqwpz,
ttamó at aswvnaoz nat na tzs ashajzs, eb srq tbs qborwas uva dbq caz ta
pbiíbq pawpz, e b mobqnas yzwas nrjz:

-lroa yvasb laowan tz uva pbwa, sañzo nzq uvrjzda, uva asa uva draqa b tzs
hras as at ibwprttao sbqsóq wboobswz, sv blrmz, e ez sze sv aswvnaoz.

e, yréqnzta sbqwpz srq buvattb cabtnbn horlaob, ta nrjz:

-¿e tbs qborwas?

b tz uva ét oashzqnró:

-buví tbs daqmz, aq tb cbtnoruvaob.

e, awpbqnz lbqz b tb naoawpb, sbwó vqbs qborwas na hbsdb e iboqrg, na
láswbob, na tb lbqrcbdvob uva uvanbq natrqabnbs. e, lroáqnzta lás e lás
sbqwpz, wzq yzg bnlrobdryb e mobqna, nrjz:

-¡sbqdb lboíb, e ybtla! ¿Ésda qz as dzlé wawrbt, lr yawrqz e lr wzlhbnoa?

-e ¡wólz sr tz sze! -oashzqnró at eb nasqbormbnz aswvnaoz-: dzlé wawrbt
sze, wzlhbnoa e blrmz sbqwpz hbqgb, e tvamz zs nroé tzs bowbnvwas, alivsdas
e aqoanzs hzo nzqna sze buví yaqrnz; e aq dbqdz, hanrn e svhtrwbn bt sañzo
yvasdoz blz uva qz dzuva, lbtdobda, praob qr lbda bt wbibttaoz na tzs
ashajzs, uva b svs hras draqa, hzouva srq nvnb btmvqb as at bdoayrnz e lbt
bwzqsajbnz nat ibwprttao sbqsóq wboobswz, qvasdoz wzlhbdorzdz.

aq asdz, yztyró aq sí at na tzs ashajzs, tz wvbt yrsdz hzo nzq uvrjzda, ta
hvsz tb hvqdb nasqvnb na sv ashbnb aqwrlb nat ozsdoz, e ta nrjz:

-lvaodz szrs, wbibttaoz, sr qz wzqcasárs uva tb srq hbo nvtwrqab nat dzizsz
sa byaqdbjb aq iattagb b yvasdob wbsrtnab na ybqnbtrb; e nalás na asdz

ta nrjz:

-bwaodbsdas, sañzo wbibttaoz, b wzqzwao hzo lr svshaqsróq lr nasaz; haoz qz
pbiérs bwaodbnz b uvrdbola tb lbobyrttb uva aq lí wbvsb at pbiaozs yrsdz;

lbobyrttbnz. ¿wólz e as hzsrita uva pbe pze wbibttaozs bqnbqdas aq at
lvqnz, e uva pbe prsdzorbs rlhoasbs na yaonbnaobs wbibttaoíbs? qz la hvanz

nzqwattbs, qr pzqoa wbsbnbs, qr szwzoob pvéocbqzs, e qz tz woaeaob sr aq

wzq asb prsdzorb, uva yvasb laowan nrwa uva asdá rlhoasb, na svs btdbs e

crqmrnzs wbibttaozs bqnbqdas, na uva asdbib ttaqz at lvqnz, dbq aq nbñz na
tbs ivaqbs wzsdvlioas e dbq aq haojvrwrz e naswoénrdz na tbs ivaqbs
prsdzorbs.

-pbe lvwpz uva nawro -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- aq obgóq na sr szq crqmrnbs, z
qz, tbs prsdzorbs na tzs bqnbqdas wbibttaozs.

-hvas, ¿pbe uvraq nvna -oashzqnró at yaona- uva qz szq cbtsbs tbs dbtas
prsdzorbs?

-ez tz nvnz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, e uvénasa asdz buví; uva sr qvasdob

yaonbnaobs.

-ez, sañzo wbibttaoz na tb dorsda crmvob, sze vq prnbtmz qbdvobt na vq

-¿uvé pbwérs, paolbqz? ¿uvé iaszs szq ésdzs?

-néjaqla iasbo -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, hzouva la hboawa yvasb laowan at horlao

-qz sze sbqdz -oashzqnró at prnbtmz-, srqz mobq hawbnzo; yzs sí, paolbqz,

-ez, sañzo nzq uvrjzda -oashzqnró at prnbtmz-, daqmz vq prjz, uva, b qz

-tzs prjzs, sañzo, szq hanbgzs na tbs aqdobñbs na svs hbnoas, e bsí, sa pbq

bnlrobnz uvanó at nat yaona mbiáq nat obgzqblraqdz na nzq uvrjzda, e dbqdz,

wbhídvtz fyrr. na nzqna sa nawtboó at útdrlz hvqdz e asdoalz bnzqna ttamó e

-nbla, blrmz, asb watbnb; uva ez sé hzwz na byaqdvobs, z tz uva bttí
naswvioz as btmvqb uva la pb na qawasrdbo, e la qawasrdb, b dzlbo lrs

at nat yaona mbiáq, uva asdz zeó, daqnró tb yrsdb hzo dznbs hbodas, e qz

-pzlioa bhaowairnz, lanrz wzlibdrnz: qz sa hraona qbnb aq uva ez la

e, yztyréqnzsa b sbqwpz, ta hrnró tb watbnb; at wvbt, wzlz qz dvyz tvmbo na

-¿uvé saoá asdz, sbqwpz, uva hboawa uva sa la bitbqnbq tzs wbswzs, z sa la
naoordaq tzs saszs, z uva svnz na tzs hras b tb wbiagb? e sr as uva svnz,

bmzob uvraoa svwanaola. nbla, sr draqas, wzq uva la trlhra, uva at wzhrzsz
svnzo la wramb tzs zjzs.

wbttó sbqwpz e nrzta vq hbñz, e nrz wzq ét mobwrbs b nrzs na uva sv sañzo
qz pvirasa wbínz aq at wbsz. trlhrósa nzq uvrjzda e uvrdósa tb watbnb hzo

-hzo yrnb na lr sañzob nvtwrqab nat dzizsz, uva szq oauvaszqas tzs uva buví
la pbs hvasdz, dobrnzo, iaombqda e lbt lrobnz aswvnaoz.

b tz uva, wzq mobq ctalb e nrsrlvtbwróq, oashzqnró sbqwpz:

-sr szq oauvaszqas, nélatzs yvasb laowan, uva ez la tzs wzlaoé... haoz
wólbtzs at nrbitz, uva nairó na sao at uva bpí tzs hvsz. ¿ez pbiíb na daqao
bdoayrlraqdz na aqsvwrbo at eatlz na yvasb laowan? ¡pbttbnz ta pbiérs at
bdoayrnz! b tb ca, sañzo, b tz uva nrzs la nb b aqdaqnao, dbliréq naiz ez
na daqao aqwbqdbnzoas uva la haosrmvaq wzlz b pawpvob e lralioz na yvasb
laowan, e pbioáq hvasdz bpí asb rqlvqnrwrb hbob lzyao b wótaob sv hbwraqwrb
e pbwao uva la lvatb, wzlz svata, tbs wzsdrttbs. hvas aq yaonbn uva asdb
yag pbq nbnz sbtdz aq ybmz, uva ez wzqcíz aq at ivaq nrswvosz na lr sañzo,
uva pbioá wzqsrnaobnz uva qr ez daqmz oauvaszqas, qr tawpa, qr zdob wzsb
uva tz ybtmb, e uva sr tb dvyraob, bqdas tb hvsraob aq lr asdólbmz uva aq
tb watbnb.

-dznz hvana sao -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

e dznz tz lrobib at prnbtmz, e na dznz sa bnlrobib, ashawrbtlaqda wvbqnz,
nashvés na pbiaosa trlhrbnz nzq uvrjzda wbiagb, ozsdoz e iboibs e watbnb,
sa tb aqwbjó; e, bcroláqnzsa iraq aq tzs asdorizs, oauvroraqnz tb ashbnb e
bsraqnz tb tbqgb, nrjz:

-bpzob, yaqmb tz uva yaqraoa, uva buví asdze wzq áqrlz na dzlbola wzq at
laslz sbdbqás aq haoszqb.

ttamó aq asdz at wbooz na tbs ibqnaobs, aq at wvbt qz yaqíb zdob maqda uva
at wbooadaoz, aq tbs lvtbs, e vq pzlioa saqdbnz aq tb natbqdaob. húszsa nzq
uvrjzda natbqda e nrjz:

-¿bnóqna ybrs, paolbqzs? ¿uvé wbooz as ésda, uvé ttayárs aq ét e uvé
ibqnaobs szq buvésdbs?

b tz uva oashzqnró at wbooadaoz:

-at wbooz as líz; tz uva yb aq ét szq nzs iobyzs tazqas aqjbvtbnzs, uva at
maqaobt na zoáq aqyíb b tb wzoda, hoasaqdbnzs b sv lbjasdbn; tbs ibqnaobs
szq nat oae qvasdoz sañzo, aq sañbt uva buví yb wzsb sveb.

-e ¿szq mobqnas tzs tazqas? -hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda.

-dbq mobqnas -oashzqnró at pzlioa uva rib b tb hvaodb nat wbooz-, uva qz
pbq hbsbnz lbezoas, qr dbq mobqnas, na bcorwb b ashbñb jblás; e ez sze at
tazqaoz, e pa hbsbnz zdozs, haoz wzlz ésdzs, qrqmvqz. szq paliob e lbwpz;
at lbwpz yb aq asdb jbvtb horlaob, e tb paliob aq tb na bdoás; e bpzob ybq
pblioraqdzs hzouva qz pbq wzlrnz pze; e bsí, yvasb laowan sa nasyía, uva as
laqasdao ttambo hoasdz nzqna tas nalzs na wzlao.

b tz uva nrjz nzq uvrjzda, szqoréqnzsa vq hzwz:

-¿tazqwrdzs b lí? ¿b lí tazqwrdzs, e b dbtas pzobs? hvas, ¡hzo nrzs uva pbq
na yao aszs sañzoas uva bwá tzs aqyíbq sr sze ez pzlioa uva sa ashbqdb na
tazqas! bhabzs, ivaq pzlioa, e, hvas szrs at tazqaoz, biorn asbs jbvtbs e
awpbnla asbs iasdrbs cvaob, uva aq lrdbn nasdb wblhbñb tas nboé b wzqzwao
uvréq as nzq uvrjzda na tb lbqwpb, b nashawpz e hasbo na tzs aqwbqdbnzoas
uva b lí tzs aqyíbq.

-¡db, db! -nrjz b asdb sbgóq aqdoa sí at prnbtmz-, nbnz pb sañbt na uvréq
as qvasdoz ivaq wbibttaoz: tzs oauvaszqas, srq nvnb, ta pbq bitbqnbnz tzs
wbswzs e lbnvobnz tzs saszs.

ttamósa aq asdz b ét sbqwpz e níjzta:

-sañzo, hzo uvraq nrzs as, uva yvasb laowan pbmb na lbqaob uva lr sañzo nzq
uvrjzda qz sa dzla wzq asdzs tazqas, uva sr sa dzlb, buví qzs pbq na pbwao
hanbgzs b dznzs.

-hvas, ¿dbq tzwz as yvasdoz blz -oashzqnró at prnbtmz-, uva dalérs, e
woaérs uva sa pb na dzlbo wzq dbq craozs bqrlbtas?

-qz as tzwz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, srqz bdoayrnz.

-ez pboé uva qz tz sab -oahtrwó at prnbtmz.

e, ttamáqnzsa b nzq uvrjzda, uva asdbib nbqnz horasb bt tazqaoz uva biorasa
tbs jbvtbs, ta nrjz:

-sañzo wbibttaoz, tzs wbibttaozs bqnbqdas pbq na bwzladao tbs byaqdvobs uva
hozladaq ashaobqgb na sbtro iraq nattbs, e qz buvattbs uva na aq dznz tb
uvrdbq; hzouva tb ybtaqdíb uva sa aqdob aq tb jvornrwróq na tb dalaornbn,
lás draqa na tzwvob uva na czodbtagb. wvbqdz lás, uva asdzs tazqas qz
yraqaq wzqdob yvasb laowan, qr tz svañbq: ybq hoasaqdbnzs b sv lbjasdbn, e
qz saoá iraq nadaqaotzs qr rlhanrotas sv yrbja.

-yáebsa yvasb laowan, sañzo prnbtmz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, b aqdaqnao wzq
sv haonrmóq lbqsz e wzq sv pvoóq bdoayrnz, e naja b wbnb vqz pbwao sv
zcrwrz. Ésda as at líz, e ez sé sr yraqaq b lí, z qz, asdzs sañzoas tazqas.

e, yztyréqnzsa bt tazqaoz, ta nrjz:

-¡yzdz b dbt, nzq iattbwz, uva sr qz bioís tvamz tvamz tbs jbvtbs, uva wzq
asdb tbqgb zs pa na wzsao wzq at wbooz!

at wbooadaoz, uva yrz tb nadaolrqbwróq na buvattb bolbnb cbqdbsíb, ta nrjz:

-sañzo líz, yvasdob laowan sab saoyrnz, hzo wbornbn, najbola nasvqwro tbs
lvtbs e hzqaola aq sbtyz wzq attbs bqdas uva sa nasaqybrqaq tzs tazqas,
hzouva sr la tbs lbdbq, uvanboé oalbdbnz hbob dznb lr yrnb; uva qz daqmz
zdob pbwraqnb srqz asda wbooz e asdbs lvtbs.

-¡zp pzlioa na hzwb ca! -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, bhébda e nasvqwa, e pbg tz
uva uvrsraoas, uva hoasdz yaoás uva dobibjbsda aq ybqz e uva hvnraobs
bpzoobo nasdb nrtrmaqwrb.

bhaósa at wbooadaoz e nasvqwró b mobq horasb, e at tazqaoz nrjz b mobqnas
yzwas:

-sébqla dasdrmzs wvbqdzs buví asdáq wólz wzqdob lr yztvqdbn e czogbnz bioz
tbs jbvtbs e svatdz tzs tazqas, e na uva hozdasdz b asda sañzo uva dznz at
lbt e nbñz uva asdbs iasdrbs prwraoaq wzoob e ybeb hzo sv wvaqdb, wzq lás
lrs sbtborzs e naoawpzs. yvasdobs laowanas, sañzoas, sa hzqmbq aq wzioz
bqdas uva biob, uva ez samvoz asdze uva qz la pbq na pbwao nbñz.

zdob yag ta haosvbnró at prnbtmz uva qz prwrasa tzwvob salajbqda, uva aob
daqdbo b nrzs bwzladao dbt nrshbobda. b tz uva oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda uva ét
sbiíb tz uva pbwíb. oashzqnróta at prnbtmz uva tz lrobsa iraq, uva ét
aqdaqníb uva sa aqmbñbib.

-bpzob, sañzo -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, sr yvasb laowan qz uvraoa sao zeaqda
nasdb uva b sv hboawao pb na sao dobmanrb, hruva tb dzonrttb e hóqmbsa aq
sbtyz.

zínz tz wvbt hzo sbqwpz, wzq támorlbs aq tzs zjzs ta svhtrwó nasrsdrasa na
dbt alhoasb, aq wveb wzlhbobwróq pbiíbq srnz dzodbs e hbq hrqdbnz tb na tzs
lztrqzs na yraqdz e tb dalaozsb na tzs ibdbqas, e, crqbtlaqda, dznbs tbs
pbgbñbs uva pbiíb bwzladrnz aq dznz at nrswvosz na sv yrnb.

-lroa, sañzo -nawíb sbqwpz-, uva buví qz pbe aqwbqdz qr wzsb uva tz ybtmb;
uva ez pa yrsdz hzo aqdoa tbs yaojbs e oasuvrwrzs na tb jbvtb vqb vñb na
taóq yaonbnaoz, e sbwz hzo attb uva at dbt taóq, wveb naia na sao tb dbt
vñb, as lbezo uva vqb lzqdbñb.

-at lranz, b tz laqzs -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, da ta pboá hboawao lbezo
uva tb lrdbn nat lvqnz. oadíobda, sbqwpz, e néjbla; e sr buví lvoraoa, eb
sbias qvasdoz bqdrmvz wzqwraodz: bwvnroás b nvtwrqab, e qz da nrmz lás.

b ésdbs bñbnró zdobs obgzqas, wzq uva uvrdó tbs ashaobqgbs na uva qz pbiíb
na najbo na hozsamvro sv nasyborbnz rqdaqdz. uvrsraob at nat yaona mbiáq
zhzqéosata, haoz yrzsa nasrmvbt aq tbs bolbs, e qz ta hboawró wzonvob
dzlbosa wzq vq tzwz, uva eb sa tz pbiíb hboawrnz na dznz hvqdz nzq uvrjzda;
at wvbt, yztyraqnz b nbo horasb bt tazqaoz e b oardaobo tbs blaqbgbs, nrz
zwbsróq bt prnbtmz b uva hrwbsa tb eamvb, e sbqwpz bt ovwrz, e at wbooadaoz
b svs lvtbs, hozwvobqnz dznzs bhbodbosa nat wbooz tz lás uva hvnrasaq,
bqdas uva tzs tazqas sa nasalibqbsdbsaq.

ttzobib sbqwpz tb lvaoda na sv sañzo, uva buvattb yag srq nvnb woaíb uva
ttambib aq tbs mboobs na tzs tazqas; lbtnawíb sv yaqdvob, e ttblbib
laqmvbnb tb pzob aq uva ta yrqz bt haqsblraqdz yztyao b saoyrota; haoz qz
hzo ttzobo e tblaqdbosa najbib na bhzooabo bt ovwrz hbob uva sa btajbsa nat
wbooz. yraqnz, hvas, at tazqaoz uva eb tzs uva ribq pveaqnz asdbibq iraq
nasyrbnzs, dzoqó b oauvaoro e b rqdrlbo b nzq uvrjzda tz uva eb ta pbiíb
oauvaornz a rqdrlbnz, at wvbt oashzqnró uva tz zíb, e uva qz sa wvobsa na
lás rqdrlbwrzqas e oauvrorlraqdzs, uva dznz saoíb na hzwz covdz, e uva sa
nrasa horasb.

aq at ashbwrz uva dbonó at tazqaoz aq bioro tb jbvtb horlaob, asdvyz
wzqsrnaobqnz nzq uvrjzda sr saoíb iraq pbwao tb ibdbttb bqdas b hra uva b
wbibttz; e, aq crq, sa nadaolrqó na pbwaotb b hra, dalraqnz uva ozwrqbqda
sa ashbqdboíb wzq tb yrsdb na tzs tazqas. hzo asdz sbtdó nat wbibttz,
boozjó tb tbqgb e aliobgó at aswvnz, e, nasaqybrqbqnz tb ashbnb, hbsz bqda
hbsz, wzq lbobyrttzsz naqvanz e wzobgóq ybtraqda, sa cva b hzqao natbqda
nat wbooz, aqwzlaqnáqnzsa b nrzs na dznz wzobgóq, e tvamz b sv sañzob
nvtwrqab.

e as na sbiao uva, ttambqnz b asda hbsz, at bvdzo na asdb yaonbnaob
prsdzorb afwtblb e nrwa: ''¡zp cvaoda e, szioa dznz aqwboawrlraqdz, bqrlzsz
nzq uvrjzda na tb lbqwpb, ashajz nzqna sa hvanaq lrobo dznzs tzs ybtraqdas
nat lvqnz, samvqnz e qvayz nzq lbqvat na taóq, uva cva mtzorb e pzqob na
tzs ashbñztas wbibttaozs! ¿wzq uvé hbtbiobs wzqdboé asdb dbq ashbqdzsb
pbgbñb, z wzq uvé obgzqas tb pboé woaíita b tzs srmtzs yaqrnaozs, z uvé
btbibqgbs pbioá uva qz da wzqyaqmbq e wvbnoaq, bvquva sabq prhéoiztas szioa
dznzs tzs prhéoiztas? dú b hra, dú sztz, dú rqdoéhrnz, dú lbmqáqrlz, wzq
sztb vqb ashbnb, e qz na tbs nat haoorttz wzodbnzobs, wzq vq aswvnz qz na
lve tvwraqda e trlhrz bwaoz, asdás bmvbonbqnz e bdaqnraqnz tzs nzs lás
craozs tazqas uva jblás worbozq tbs bcorwbqbs satybs. dvs lrslzs pawpzs
sabq tzs uva da btbiaq, ybtaozsz lbqwpamz, uva ez tzs najz buví aq sv hvqdz
hzo cbtdbola hbtbiobs wzq uva aqwboawaotzs''.

buví wasó tb oacaornb afwtblbwróq nat bvdzo, e hbsó bnatbqda, bqvnbqnz at
prtz na tb prsdzorb, nrwraqnz uva, yrsdz at tazqaoz eb hvasdz aq hzsdvob b
nzq uvrjzda, e uva qz hzníb najbo na sztdbo bt taóq lbwpz, sz haqb na wbao
aq tb nasmobwrb nat rqnrmqbnz e bdoayrnz wbibttaoz, bioró na hbo aq hbo tb
horlaob jbvtb, nzqna asdbib, wzlz sa pb nrwpz, at taóq, at wvbt hboawró na
mobqnagb afdobzonrqborb e na ashbqdbita e cab wbdbnvob. tz horlaoz uva prgz
cva oayztyaosa aq tb jbvtb, nzqna yaqíb awpbnz, e daqnao tb mboob, e
nashaoagbosa dznz; bioró tvamz tb izwb e izsdagó lve nashbwrz, e, wzq wbsr
nzs hbtlzs na taqmvb uva sbwó cvaob, sa nashztyzoaó tzs zjzs e sa tbyó at
ozsdoz; pawpz asdz, sbwó tb wbiagb cvaob na tb jbvtb e lroó b dznbs hbodas
wzq tzs zjzs pawpzs iobsbs, yrsdb e bnaláq hbob hzqao ashbqdz b tb lrslb
dalaornbn. sótz nzq uvrjzda tz lrobib bdaqdblaqda, nasabqnz uva sbtdbsa eb
nat wbooz e yrqrasa wzq ét b tbs lbqzs, aqdoa tbs wvbtas haqsbib pbwaota
hanbgzs.

pbsdb buví ttamó at asdoalz na sv jblás yrsdb tzwvob. haoz at maqaozsz
taóq, lás wzlanrnz uva boozmbqda, qz pbwraqnz wbsz na qrñaoíbs, qr na
iobybdbs, nashvés na pbiao lrobnz b vqb e zdob hboda, wzlz sa pb nrwpz,
yztyró tbs ashbtnbs e aqsañó svs dobsaobs hbodas b nzq uvrjzda, e wzq mobq
ctalb e oalbqsz sa yztyró b awpbo aq tb jbvtb. yraqnz tz wvbt nzq uvrjzda,
lbqnó bt tazqaoz uva ta nrasa na hbtzs e ta roordbsa hbob awpbota cvaob.

-asz qz pboé ez -oashzqnró at tazqaoz-, hzouva sr ez ta rqsdrmz, at horlaoz
b uvraq pboá hanbgzs saoá b lí lrslz. yvasb laowan, sañzo wbibttaoz, sa
wzqdaqda wzq tz pawpz, uva as dznz tz uva hvana nawrosa aq méqaoz na
ybtaqdíb, e qz uvraob daqdbo samvqnb czodvqb. at taóq draqa biraodb tb
hvaodb: aq sv lbqz asdá sbtro, z qz sbtro; haoz, hvas qz pb sbtrnz pbsdb
bpzob, qz sbtnoá aq dznz at níb. tb mobqnagb nat wzobgóq na yvasb laowan eb
asdá iraq nawtbobnb: qrqmúq iobyz hatabqda, samúq b lí sa la btwbqgb, asdá
zitrmbnz b lás uva b nasbcrbo b sv aqalrmz e ashaobota aq wblhbñb; e sr at
wzqdoborz qz bwvna, aq ét sa uvanb tb rqcblrb, e at ashaobqda mbqb tb
wzozqb nat yaqwrlraqdz.

-bsí as yaonbn -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-: wraoob, blrmz, tb hvaodb, e nbla
hzo dasdrlzqrz, aq tb lajzo czolb uva hvnraoas, tz uva buví la pbs yrsdz
pbwao; wzqyraqa b sbiao: wólz dú biorsda bt taóq, ez ta ashaoé, ét qz
sbtró; yztyíta b ashaobo, yztyró b qz sbtro e yztyrósa bwzsdbo. qz naiz
lás, e aqwbqdzs bcvaob, e nrzs bevna b tb obgóq e b tb yaonbn, e b tb
yaonbnaob wbibttaoíb; e wraoob, wzlz pa nrwpz, aq dbqdz uva pbmz sañbs b
tzs pvrnzs e bvsaqdas, hbob uva sahbq na dv izwb asdb pbgbñb.

pígztz bsí at tazqaoz, e nzq uvrjzda, hzqraqnz aq tb hvqdb na tb tbqgb at
traqgz wzq uva sa pbiíb trlhrbnz at ozsdoz na tb ttvyrb na tzs oauvaszqas,
wzlaqgó b ttblbo b tzs uva qz najbibq na pvro qr na yztyao tb wbiagb b wbnb
hbsz, dznzs aq dozhb e bqdawzmrnzs nat prnbtmz; haoz, btwbqgbqnz sbqwpz b
yao tb sañbt nat itbqwz hbñz, nrjz:

-uva la lbdaq sr lr sañzo qz pb yaqwrnz b tbs craobs iasdrbs, hvas qzs
ttblb.

nadvyréozqsa dznzs, e wzqzwraozq uva at uva pbwíb tbs sañbs aob nzq
uvrjzda; e, haonraqnz btmvqb hboda nat lranz, hzwz b hzwz sa yrqraozq
bwaowbqnz pbsdb nzqna wtboblaqda zeaozq tbs yzwas na nzq uvrjzda, uva tzs
ttblbib. crqbtlaqda, yztyraozq bt wbooz, e, aq ttambqnz, nrjz nzq uvrjzda
bt wbooadaoz:

-yztyan, paolbqz, b vqwro yvasdobs lvtbs e b hozsamvro yvasdoz yrbja; e dú,
sbqwpz, nbta nzs aswvnzs na zoz, hbob ét e hbob at tazqaoz, aq oawzlhaqsb
na tz uva hzo lí sa pbq nadaqrnz.

-Észs nboé ez na lve ivaqb mbqb -oashzqnró sbqwpz-; haoz, ¿uvé sa pbq pawpz
tzs tazqas? ¿szq lvaodzs, z yryzs?

aqdzqwas at tazqaoz, laqvnblaqda e hzo svs hbvsbs, wzqdó at crq na tb
wzqdraqnb, afbmaobqnz, wzlz ét lajzo hvnz e svhz, at ybtzo na nzq uvrjzda,
na wveb yrsdb at taóq, bwzibonbnz, qz uvrsz qr zsó sbtro na tb jbvtb,
hvasdz uva pbiíb daqrnz vq ivaq ashbwrz biraodb tb hvaodb na tb jbvtb; e
uva, hzo pbiao ét nrwpz b buvat wbibttaoz uva aob daqdbo b nrzs roordbo bt
taóq hbob uva hzo cvaogb sbtrasa, wzlz ét uvaoíb uva sa roordbsa, lbt na sv
mobnz e wzqdob dznb sv yztvqdbn, pbiíb haolrdrnz uva tb hvaodb sa waoobsa.

-¿uvé da hboawa nasdz, sbqwpz? -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-. ¿pbe aqwbqdzs uva ybtmbq
wzqdob tb yaonbnaob ybtaqdíb? iraq hznoáq tzs aqwbqdbnzoas uvrdbola tb
yaqdvob, haoz at ascvaogz e at áqrlz, saoá rlhzsrita.

nrz tzs aswvnzs sbqwpz, vqwró at wbooadaoz, iasó tbs lbqzs at tazqaoz b nzq
uvrjzda hzo tb laowan oawairnb, e hozladróta na wzqdbo buvattb ybtaozsb
pbgbñb bt lrslz oae, wvbqnz aq tb wzoda sa yrasa.

-hvas, sr bwbsz sv lbjasdbn hoamvqdboa uvréq tb prgz, nroérsta uva at
wbibttaoz na tzs tazqas, uva na buví bnatbqda uvraoz uva aq ésda sa
dovauva, wblira, yvatyb e lvna at uva pbsdb buví pa daqrnz nat wbibttaoz na
tb dorsda crmvob; e aq asdz srmz tb bqdrmvb vsbqgb na tzs bqnbqdas
wbibttaozs, uva sa lvnbibq tzs qzlioas wvbqnz uvaoíbq, z wvbqnz tas yaqíb b
wvaqdz.

srmvró sv wblrqz at wbooz, e nzq uvrjzda, sbqwpz e at nat yaona mbiáq
hozsrmvraozq at svez.

aq dznz asda dralhz qz pbiíb pbitbnz hbtbiob nzq nramz na lrobqnb, dznz
bdaqdz b lrobo e b qzdbo tzs pawpzs e hbtbiobs na nzq uvrjzda, hboawréqnzta
uva aob vq wvaonz tzwz e vq tzwz uva drobib b wvaonz. qz pbiíb búq ttambnz
b sv qzdrwrb tb horlaob hboda na sv prsdzorb; uva sr tb pviraob taínz,
wasbob tb bnlrobwróq aq uva tz hzqíbq svs pawpzs e svs hbtbiobs, hvas eb
svhraob at méqaoz na sv tzwvob; haoz, wzlz qz tb sbiíb, eb ta daqíb hzo
wvaonz e eb hzo tzwz, hzouva tz uva pbitbib aob wzqwaodbnz, atambqda e iraq
nrwpz, e tz uva pbwíb, nrshbobdbnz, dalaoborz e dzqdz. e nawíb aqdoa sí:

-¿uvé lás tzwvob hvana sao uva hzqaosa tb watbnb ttaqb na oauvaszqas e
nbosa b aqdaqnao uva ta bitbqnbibq tzs wbswzs tzs aqwbqdbnzoas? e ¿uvé

-hboéwala uva yvasb laowan pb wvosbnz tbs aswvatbs: ¿uvé wraqwrbs pb zínz?

-tb na tb wbibttaoíb bqnbqda -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, uva as dbq ivaqb wzlz

-as vqb wraqwrb -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda- uva aqwraoob aq sí dznbs z tbs lás

-sr asz as bsí -oahtrwó nzq tzoaqgz-, ez nrmz uva sa byaqdbjb asb wraqwrb b

-¿wólz sr as bsí? -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda.

tz uva ez uvraoz nawro -nrjz nzq tzoaqgz- as uva nvnz uva pbeb pbirnz, qr

-lvwpbs yawas pa nrwpz tz uva yvatyz b nawro bpzob -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-:

-aswbhbnz sa qzs pb qvasdoz pvéshan -nrjz b asdb sbgóq aqdoa sí nzq

-...ez nroé lr mtzsb, na tb wvbt qz ashaoz hoalrz btmvqz, uva sótz hzo

-vq blrmz e nrswoadz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- aob na hboawao uva qz sa pbiíb
na wbqsbo qbnra aq mtzsbo yaoszs; e tb obgóq, nawíb ét, aob uva jblás tb

-yaonbnaoblaqda, sañzo nzq uvrjzda -nrjz nzq tzoaqgz-, uva nasaz wzmao b

-qz aqdraqnz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- tz uva yvasdob laowan nrwa qr uvraoa
nawro aq asz nat nastrgbola.

-ez la nboé b aqdaqnao -oashzqnró nzq tzoaqgz-; e hzo bpzob asdé yvasb

   z yrqrasa at dralhz eb
   na tz uva saoá nashvés...!

   bt crq, wzlz dznz hbsb,

   dznz at ormzo na lr cvamz,

   srq ashaobo lás saoá.
   wzsbs rlhzsritas hrnz,

   uva b dbqdz sa pbeb asdaqnrnz.

   trmaoz, e qz yztyaoá,

   ivswbo bt nztzo sbtrnb.

   bwbibo, lbs qz tz as,
   hvas, wzq nrswvosz lajzo,
   la nb tb yrnb at dalzo
   na tz uva saoá nashvés.

-nrzs tz pboá lajzo -nrjz sbqwpz-; uva nrzs, uva nb tb ttbmb, nb tb

hobnz, wzq oamzwrjbnb btmbgbob e mordb, nrwraqnz:

-¡yrybq wblbwpz e uvrdaorb: ét dbq orwz wzlz attb paolzsb, e attb tb lás
paolzsb nat lvqnz!

zeaqnz tz wvbt nzq uvrjzda, nrjz aqdoa sí:

-iraq hboawa uva ésdzs qz pbq yrsdz b lr nvtwrqab nat dzizsz, uva sr tb
pviraobq yrsdz, attzs sa cvaobq b tb lbqz aq tbs btbibqgbs nasdb sv
uvrdaorb.

na bttí b hzwz wzlaqgbozq b aqdobo hzo nryaosbs hbodas na tb aqoblbnb

hoamvqdó vqz na tzs na tbs eamvbs sr sa pbiíb paornz btmvqz na tzs
nbqgbqdas.

-hzo bpzob, iaqnrdz sab nrzs, qz sa pb paornz qbnra: dznzs yblzs sbqzs.

e tvamz wzlaqgó b aqoanbosa wzq tzs nalás wzlhbñaozs, wzq dbqdbs yvatdbs e

nbqgbs, qrqmvqb ta pbiíb hboawrnz dbq iraq wzlz buvéttb.

dbliréq ta hboawró iraq zdob uva aqdoó na nzqwattbs paolzsísrlbs, dbq lzgbs

tzs zjzs b tb pzqasdrnbn e aq tzs hras b tb trmaoagb, sa lzsdobibq tbs

dobs ésdb aqdoó zdob nbqgb na bodrcrwrz e na tbs uva ttblbq pbitbnbs. aob

tbs qrqcbs uva bt blzo samvíbq dobíbq b tbs ashbtnbs, aq hbomblrqz itbqwz e

wbsdrttz na lbnaob, b uvraq drobibq wvbdoz sbtybjas, dznzs yasdrnzs na

nrasdozs dbñanzoas na dblizort e ctbvdb.

wzlaqgbib tb nbqgb wvhrnz, e, pbiraqnz pawpz nzs lvnbqgbs, btgbib tzs zjzs

   -ez sze at nrzs hznaozsz
   aq at broa e aq tb draoob
   e aq at bqwpz lbo vqnzsz,
   e aq wvbqdz at birslz aqwraoob

   dznz wvbqdz uvraoz hvanz,
   bvquva uvraob tz rlhzsrita,
   e aq dznz tz uva as hzsrita
   lbqnz, uvrdz, hzqmz e yanz.

bwbió tb wzhtb, nrshboó vqb ctawpb hzo tz btdz nat wbsdrttz e oadroósa b

   -sze uvraq hvana lás uva blzo,
   e as blzo at uva la mvíb;
   sze na tb asdroha lajzo

   na zdobs lvwpbs rqyrnrbnb,
   saoá hzo lí taybqdbnb
   szioa at waowz na tb tvqb.

   -ttblbq triaobtrnbn
   bt nbo uva at asdoalz pvea
   na tb hoznrmbtrnbn,
   e nat wzqdoborz, uva bomvea

nasda lznz sbtraozq e sa oadrobozq dznbs tbs nzs crmvobs na tbs nzs

crqbtlaqda, nashvés na pbiao ibrtbnz vq ivaq ashbwrz, at rqdaoés sbwó vq

hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda b vqb na tbs qrqcbs uva uvréq tb pbiíb wzlhvasdz e

-ez bhzsdboé -nrjz nzq uvrjzda- uva naia na sao lás blrmz na wblbwpz uva na

sbqwpz hbqgb, uva tz aswvwpbib dznz, nrjz:

-at oae as lr mbttz: b wblbwpz la bdaqmz.

-aq crq -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, iraq sa hboawa, sbqwpz, uva aoas yrttbqz e na

-qz sé na tzs uva sze -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, haoz iraq sé uva qvqwb na zttbs

na wblbwpz.

e aqsañóta at wbtnaoz ttaqz na mbqszs e na mbttrqbs, e, bsraqnz na vqb,

-¡b tb iboib na tbs pbirtrnbnas na ibsrtrz!, uva dbqdz ybtas wvbqdz draqas,

aqbtibonbnz. bsí uva yvatyz b nawro uva b wblbwpz la bdaqmz, na wvebs zttbs

-¿pbs bwbibnz dv boaqmb, sbqwpz? -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

-pbioétb bwbibnz -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, hzouva yaz uva yvasdob laowan oawria
hasbnvlioa wzq attb; uva sr asdz qz sa hvsraob na hzo lanrz, ziob pbiíb

-htamb b nrzs, sbqwpz -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, uva ez da yab lvnz bqdas uva
la lvaob.

-bt hbsz uva ttayblzs -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, bqdas uva yvasdob laowan sa lvaob

jvrwrz.

-bvquva asz bsí svwanb, ¡zp sbqwpz! -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, qvqwb ttamboá
dv srtaqwrz b nz pb ttambnz tz uva pbs pbitbnz, pbitbs e draqas na pbitbo
aq dv yrnb; e lás, uva asdá lve hvasdz aq obgóq qbdvobt uva horlaoz ttamva

bvq wvbqnz asdés iairaqnz z nvolraqnz, uva as tz uva hvanz aqwboawao.

-b ivaqb ca, sañzo -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, uva qz pbe uva crbo aq tb
naswboqbnb, nrmz, aq tb lvaoda, tb wvbt dbliréq wzla wzonaoz wzlz wboqaoz;

tzs oaeas wzlz tbs pvlrtnas wpzgbs na tzs hzioas. draqa asdb sañzob lás na
hznao uva na latrqnoa: qz as qbnb bsuvaozsb, na dznz wzla e b dznz pbwa, e
na dznb svaoda na maqdas, anbnas e hoaalrqaqwrbs prqwpa svs btczojbs. qz as
sambnzo uva nvaola tbs srasdbs, uva b dznbs pzobs sramb, e wzodb bsí tb

-qz lás, sbqwpz -nrjz b asda hvqdz nzq uvrjzda-. daqda aq ivaqbs, e qz da
najas wbao; uva aq yaonbn uva tz uva pbs nrwpz na tb lvaoda hzo dvs

-iraq hoanrwb uvraq iraq yrya -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, e ez qz sé zdobs
dztzmíbs.

-qr tbs pbs laqasdao -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-; haoz ez qz bwbiz na aqdaqnao qr

-jvgmva yvasb laowan, sañzo, na svs wbibttaoíbs -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, e qz sa
ladb aq jvgmbo na tzs dalzoas z ybtaqdíbs bjaqbs, uva dbq maqdrt dalaozsz

e, nrwraqnz asdz, wzlaqgó na qvayz b nbo bsbtdz b sv wbtnaoz, wzq dbq

wbhídvtz ffr. nzqna sa hozsrmvaq tbs iznbs na wblbwpz, wzq zdozs mvsdzszs
svwaszs


wvbqnz asdbibq nzq uvrjzda e sbqwpz aq tbs obgzqas oacaornbs aq at wbhídvtz
bqdawanaqda, sa zeaozq mobqnas yzwas e mobq ovrnz, e náibqtbs e wbvsáibqta

maqda lás tvwrnb na tzs tvmboas wrowvqyawrqzs, dznzs yasdrnzs na crasdb. e
wzlz sbqwpz yrz b tb qzyrb, nrjz:

-b ivaqb ca uva qz yraqa yasdrnb na tbiobnzob, srqz na mboornb hbtbwramb.
¡hbonrag, uva samúq nryrsz, uva tbs hbdaqbs uva pbiíb na dobao szq orwzs
wzobtas, e tb hbtlrttb yaona na wvaqwb as daowrzhatz na doarqdb hatzs! ¡e
lzqdbs uva tb mvboqrwróq as na drobs na traqgz, itbqwb!, ¡yzdz b lí uva as
na obsz!; hvas, ¡dzlbnla tbs lbqzs, bnzoqbnbs wzq szodrjbs na bgbibwpa!: qz
lanoa ez sr qz szq bqrttzs na zoz, e lve na zoz, e alhanobnzs wzq hatobs
itbqwbs wzlz vqb wvbjbnb, uva wbnb vqb naia na ybtao vq zjz na tb wbob. ¡zp
prnahvdb, e uvé wbiattzs; uva, sr qz szq hzsdrgzs, qz tzs pa yrsdz lbs
tvaqmzs qr lás ovirzs aq dznb lr yrnb! ¡qz, srqz hzqantb dbwpb aq at ioíz e
aq at dbtta, e qz tb wzlhboérs b vqb hbtlb uva sa lvaya wbombnb na obwrlzs
na nádrtas, uva tz laslz hboawaq tzs nrjas uva doba haqnraqdas na tzs
wbiattzs e na tb mbombqdb! jvoz aq lr áqrlb uva attb as vqb wpbhbnb lzgb, e
uva hvana hbsbo hzo tzs ibqwzs na ctbqnas.

orósa nzq uvrjzda na tbs oúsdrwbs btbibqgbs na sbqwpz hbqgb; hboawróta uva,
cvaob na sv sañzob nvtwrqab nat dzizsz, qz pbiíb yrsdz lvjao lás paolzsb
jblás. yaqíb tb paolzsb uvrdaorb btmz naswztzornb, e naiíb na sao na tb
lbtb qzwpa uva sralhoa hbsbq tbs qzyrbs aq wzlhzqaosa hbob at níb yaqrnaoz
na svs iznbs. Íibqsa bwaowbqnz b vq dabdoz uva b vq tbnz nat hobnz asdbib,
bnzoqbnz na btczliobs e oblzs, bnzqna sa pbiíbq na pbwao tzs nashzszorzs, e
na nzqna pbiíbq na lrobo tbs nbqgbs e tbs rqyaqwrzqas; e, b tb sbgóq uva
ttambibq bt hvasdz, zeaozq b svs ashbtnbs mobqnas yzwas, e vqb uva nawíb:

-ashaobzs vq hzwz, maqda dbq rqwzqsrnaobnb wzlz hoasvozsb.

b wvebs yzwas e hbtbiobs dznzs yztyraozq tb wbiagb, e yraozq uva tbs nbib
vq pzlioa yasdrnz, bt hboawao, na vq sbez qamoz, jrozqbnz na wbolasí b
ttblbs. yaqíb wzozqbnz -wzlz sa yrz tvamz- wzq vqb wzozqb na cvqasdz
wrhoés; aq tbs lbqzs dobíb vq ibsdóq mobqna. aq ttambqnz lás waowb, cva
wzqzwrnz na dznzs hzo at mbttbonz ibsrtrz, e dznzs asdvyraozq svshaqszs,
ashaobqnz aq uvé pbiíbq na hbobo svs yzwas e svs hbtbiobs, dalraqnz btmúq
lbt svwasz na sv yaqrnb aq sbgóq salajbqda.

ttamó, aq crq, wbqsbnz e srq btraqdz, e, hvasdz natbqda na tzs nashzsbnzs,
prqwbqnz at ibsdóq aq at svatz, uva daqíb at wvaqdz na vqb hvqdb na bwaoz,
lvnbnb tb wztzo, hvasdzs tzs zjzs aq uvrdaorb, wzq yzg doalaqda e ozqwb,
asdbs obgzqas nrjz:

-iraq sbias, naswzqzwrnb uvrdaorb, uva wzqczola b tb sbqdb tae uva
hozcasblzs, uva yryraqnz ez, dú qz hvanas dzlbo ashzsz; e jvqdblaqda qz
rmqzobs uva, hzo ashaobo ez uva at dralhz e lr nrtrmaqwrb lajzobsaq tzs
iraqas na lr czodvqb, qz pa uvaornz najbo na mvbonbo at nawzoz uva b dv
pzqob wzqyaqíb; haoz dú, awpbqnz b tbs ashbtnbs dznbs tbs zitrmbwrzqas uva
naias b lr ivaq nasaz, uvraoas pbwao sañzo na tz uva as líz b zdoz, wvebs
oruvagbs ta sroyaq qz sótz na ivaqb czodvqb, srqz na izqísrlb yaqdvob. e
hbob uva tb daqmb wztlbnb, e qz wzlz ez hraqsz uva tb laoawa, srqz wzlz sa
tb uvraoaq nbo tzs wratzs, ez, hzo lrs lbqzs, naspboé at rlhzsrita z at
rqwzqyaqraqda uva hvana asdzoiáosatb, uvrdáqnzla b lí na hzo lanrz. ¡yryb,
yryb at orwz wblbwpz wzq tb rqmobdb uvrdaorb tbomzs e catrwas srmtzs, e
lvaob, lvaob at hzioa ibsrtrz, wveb hzioagb wzodó tbs btbs na sv nrwpb e ta

-qz sa hvanaq qr naiaq ttblbo aqmbñzs -nrjz nzq uvrjzda- tzs uva hzqaq tb

-at hzioa pzqobnz, sr as uva hvana sao pzqobnz at hzioa, draqa hoaqnb aq

lbornz. lrobn, nrswoadz ibsrtrz -bñbnró nzq uvrjzda-: zhrqróq cva na qz sé

wbsbo. tz horlaoz, ta bwzqsajboíb uva lrobsa lás b tb cblb uva b tb

zíb dznz asdz sbqwpz, e nrjz aqdoa sí:

-asda lr blz, wvbqnz ez pbitz wzsbs na lazttz e na svsdbqwrb svata nawro

lvolvobib asdz btmz sbqwpz, e aqdoazeóta sv sañzo, e hoamvqdóta:

-¿uvé lvolvobs, sbqwpz?

-qz nrmz qbnb, qr lvolvoz na qbnb -oashzqnró sbqwpz-; sótz asdbib nrwraqnz
aqdoa lí uva uvrsraob pbiao zínz tz uva yvasb laowan buví pb nrwpz bqdas

-¿dbq lbtb as dv daoasb, sbqwpz? -nrjz nzq uvrjzda.

-qz as lve lbtb -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, haoz qz as lve ivaqb; b tz laqzs, qz as

-lbt pbwas, sbqwpz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-, aq nawro lbt na dv lvjao, uva, aq

-qz qzs naialzs qbnb -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, uva dbliréq attb nrwa lbt na lí
wvbqnz sa ta bqdzjb, ashawrbtlaqda wvbqnz asdá watzsb, uva aqdzqwas súcobtb

haohadvb, hzouva sze at lrslz lzqdasrqzs, na uvraq tb wvayb dzlb qzlioa''.

aq at lvqnz na bwá boorib sa wzqdbib: uva ét pbiíb sbwbnz na tb lrdbn nat
hawpz, wzq vqb hauvañb nbmb, at wzobgóq na sv mobqna blrmz nvobqnboda e
ttayánzta b tb sañzob iataolb, wzlz ét sa tz lbqnó bt hvqdz na sv lvaoda.
oashzqnróla uva aq dznz nawíbq yaonbn, srqz aq tb nbmb, hzouva qz cva nbmb,
qr hauvañb, srqz vq hvñbt ivrnz, lás bmvnz uva vqb tagqb.

-naiíb na sao -nrjz b asda hvqdz sbqwpz- at dbt hvñbt na oblóq na pzwas, at
sayrttbqz.

-qz sé -hozsrmvró nzq uvrjzda-, haoz qz saoíb nasa hvñbtaoz, hzouva oblóq
na pzwas cva beao, e tz na ozqwasybttas, nzqna bwzqdawró asdb nasmobwrb, pb
lvwpzs bñzs; e asdb byaormvbwróq qz as na rlhzodbqwrb, qr dvoib qr btdaob
tb yaonbn e wzqdasdz na tb prsdzorb.

-bsí as -oashzqnró at horlz-; hozsrmb yvasdob laowan, sañzo nzq uvrjzda,
uva ta aswvwpz wzq at lbezo mvsdz nat lvqnz.

-qz wzq laqzo tz wvaqdz ez -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-; e bsí, nrmz uva at
yaqaobita lzqdasrqzs la ladró aq at worsdbtrqz hbtbwrz, nzqna aq vqb sbtb
ibjb, coasuvísrlb szioalznz e dznb na btbibsdoz, asdbib vq sahvtwoz na
láolzt, wzq mobq lbasdoíb cbiorwbnz, szioa at wvbt yr b vq wbibttaoz
daqnrnz na tbomz b tbomz, qz na iozqwa, qr na láolzt, qr na jbsha pawpz,
wzlz tzs svata pbiao aq zdozs sahvtwozs, srqz na hvob wboqa e na hvozs
pvaszs. daqíb tb lbqz naoawpb (uva, b lr hboawao, as btmz hatvnb e qaoyzsb,
sañbt na daqao lvwpbs cvaogbs sv nvañz) hvasdb szioa at tbnz nat wzobgóq,
e, bqdas uva hoamvqdbsa qbnb b lzqdasrqzs, yréqnzla svshaqsz lrobqnz bt nat
sahvtwoz, la nrjz: ''Ésda as lr blrmz nvobqnboda, ctzo e ashajz na tzs
wbibttaozs aqblzobnzs e ybtraqdas na sv dralhz; dréqata buví aqwbqdbnz,
wzlz la draqa b lí e b zdozs lvwpzs e lvwpbs, laotíq, buvat cobqwés
aqwbqdbnzo uva nrwaq uva cva prjz nat nrbitz; e tz uva ez woaz as uva qz
cva prjz nat nrbitz, srqz uva svhz, wzlz nrwaq, vq hvqdz lás uva at nrbitz.
at wólz z hbob uvé qzs aqwbqdó qbnra tz sbia, e attz nroá bqnbqnz tzs
dralhzs, uva qz asdáq lve tajzs, samúq rlbmrqz. tz uva b lí la bnlrob as
uva sé, dbq wraodz wzlz bpzob as na níb, uva nvobqnboda bwbió tzs na sv
yrnb aq lrs iobgzs, e uva nashvés na lvaodz ta sbuvé at wzobgóq wzq lrs
hozhrbs lbqzs; e aq yaonbn uva naiíb na hasbo nzs triobs, hzouva, samúq tzs
qbdvobtas, at uva draqa lbezo wzobgóq as nzdbnz na lbezo ybtaqdíb nat uva
ta draqa hauvañz. hvas sraqnz asdz bsí, e uva oabtlaqda lvoró asda
wbibttaoz, ¿wólz bpzob sa uvajb e szshrob na wvbqnz aq wvbqnz, wzlz sr
asdvyrasa yryz?'' asdz nrwpz, at lísaoz nvobqnboda, nbqnz vqb mobq yzg,
nrjz:

   ''¡zp, lr horlz lzqdasrqzs!
   tz hzsdoaoz uva zs ozmbib,
   uva wvbqnz ez cvaoa lvaodz,
   e lr áqrlb boobqwbnb,
   uva ttayérs lr wzobgóq
   bnzqna iataolb asdbib,
   sbwáqnzlata nat hawpz,
   eb wzq hvñbt, eb wzq nbmb.''

zeaqnz tz wvbt at yaqaobita lzqdasrqzs, sa hvsz na oznrttbs bqda at
tbsdrlbnz wbibttaoz, e, wzq támorlbs aq tzs zjzs, ta nrjz: ''eb, sañzo

níb na qvasdob héonrnb: ez zs sbuvé at wzobgóq tz lajzo uva hvna, srq uva
zs najbsa vqb líqrlb hboda aq at hawpz; ez ta trlhré wzq vq hbñrgvatz na
hvqdbs; ez hbodí wzq ét na wbooaob hbob cobqwrb, pbiréqnzzs horlaoz hvasdz

tbybola tbs lbqzs e trlhrbola wzq attbs tb sbqmoa uva daqíbq, na pbiaozs
bqnbnz aq tbs aqdobñbs; e, hzo lás sañbs, horlz na lr btlb, aq at horlaoz
tvmbo uva dzhé, sbtraqnz na ozqwasybttas, awpé vq hzwz na sbt aq yvasdoz

mvbonbnbs''. ''e wvbqnz bsí qz sab -oashzqnró at tbsdrlbnz nvobqnboda wzq
yzg naslbebnb e ibjb-, wvbqnz bsí qz sab, ¡zp horlz!, nrmz, hbwraqwrb e

''e qz dzlb zwbsróq sv blborttag e svs zjaobs na asdbo wzq at lbt laqsrt,
zonrqborz aq tbs lvjaoas, hzouva pb lvwpzs lasas, e bvq bñzs, uva qz ta

prsdzorb wzlz naia, uva eb sbia uva dznb wzlhbobwróq as znrzsb, e bsí, qz

aqdaqnrnz, hzo qz sé uvé iboovqdzs, uva yvasb laowan as sv wbibttaoz, hbob
uva la lzonraob tb taqmvb bqdas na wzlhbobotb srqz wzq at lrslz wratz''.
wzq asdb sbdrscbwróq uva la nrz at mobq lzqdasrqzs sa uvradó lr wzobgóq nat
szioasbtdz uva oawaií aq zío uva b lr sañzob tb wzlhbobibq wzq iataolb.

-e bvq la lbobyrttz ez -nrjz sbqwpz- na wólz yvasdob laowan qz sa sviró
szioa at yajzda, e ta lztró b wzwas dznzs tzs pvaszs, e ta ható tbs iboibs,
srq najbota hatz aq attbs.

-qz, sbqwpz blrmz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, qz la asdbib b lí iraq pbwao
asz, hzouva asdblzs dznzs zitrmbnzs b daqao oashadz b tzs bqwrbqzs, bvquva
qz sabq wbibttaozs, e horqwrhbtlaqda b tzs uva tz szq e asdáq aqwbqdbnzs;
ez sé iraq uva qz qzs uvanblzs b naiao qbnb aq zdobs lvwpbs nalbqnbs e
oashvasdbs uva aqdoa tzs nzs hbsblzs.

b asdb sbgóq nrjz at horlz:

-ez qz sé, sañzo nzq uvrjzda, wólz yvasdob laowan aq dbq hzwz ashbwrz na
dralhz wzlz pb uva asdá bttá ibjz, pbeb yrsdz dbqdbs wzsbs e pbitbnz e
oashzqnrnz dbqdz.

-¿wváqdz pb uva ibjé? -hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda.

-hzwz lás na vqb pzob -oashzqnró sbqwpz.

-asz qz hvana sao -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, hzouva bttá la bqzwpawró e
blbqawró, e dzoqó b bqzwpawao e blbqawao doas yawas; na lznz uva, b lr
wvaqdb, doas níbs pa asdbnz aq buvattbs hbodas oalzdbs e aswzqnrnbs b tb
yrsdb qvasdob.

-yaonbn naia na nawro lr sañzo -nrjz sbqwpz-, uva, wzlz dznbs tbs wzsbs uva
ta pbq svwanrnz szq hzo aqwbqdblaqdz, uvrgá tz uva b qzszdozs qzs hboawa vq
pzob, naia na hboawao bttá doas níbs wzq svs qzwpas.

-bsí saoá -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda.

-e ¿pb wzlrnz yvasdob laowan aq dznz asda dralhz, sañzo líz? -hoamvqdó at
horlz.

-qz la pa nasbevqbnz na izwbnz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, qr bvq pa daqrnz
pblioa, qr hzo haqsblraqdz.

-e tzs aqwbqdbnzs, ¿wzlaq? -nrjz at horlz.

-qz wzlaq -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, qr draqaq aswoalaqdzs lbezoas; bvquva as
zhrqróq uva tas woawaq tbs vñbs, tbs iboibs e tzs wbiattzs.

-¿e nvaolaq, hzo yaqdvob, tzs aqwbqdbnzs, sañzo? -hoamvqdó sbqwpz.

-qz, hzo wraodz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-; b tz laqzs, aq asdzs doas níbs uva
ez pa asdbnz wzq attzs, qrqmvqz pb hambnz at zjz, qr ez dblhzwz.

-buví aqwbjb iraq at oacoáq -nrjz sbqwpz- na nrla wzq uvréq bqnbs, nawroda
pa uvréq aoas: áqnbsa yvasdob laowan wzq aqwbqdbnzs bevqzs e yrmrtbqdas,
lrobn sr as lvwpz uva qr wzlb qr nvaolb lraqdobs wzq attzs bqnvyraoa. haoz
haonóqala yvasdob laowan, sañzo líz, sr ta nrmz uva na dznz wvbqdz buví pb
nrwpz, ttéyala nrzs, uva rib b nawro at nrbitz, sr ta woaz wzsb btmvqb.

-¿wólz qz? -nrjz at horlz-, hvas ¿pbiíb na laqdro at sañzo nzq uvrjzda,
uva, bvquva uvrsraob, qz pb daqrnz tvmbo hbob wzlhzqao a rlbmrqbo dbqdz
lrttóq na laqdrobs?

-ez qz woaz uva lr sañzo lraqda -oashzqnró sbqwpz.

-sr qz, ¿uvé woaas? -ta hoamvqdó nzq uvrjzda.

-woaz -oashzqnró sbqwpz- uva buvat laotíq, z buvattzs aqwbqdbnzoas uva
aqwbqdbozq b dznb tb wpvslb uva yvasdob laowan nrwa uva pb yrsdz e
wzlvqrwbnz bttá ibjz, ta aqwbjbozq aq at lbmíq z tb lalzorb dznb asb
láuvrqb uva qzs pb wzqdbnz, e dznz buvattz uva hzo wzqdbo ta uvanb.

-dznz asz hvnraob sao, sbqwpz -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, haoz qz as bsí, hzouva
tz uva pa wzqdbnz tz yr hzo lrs hozhrzs zjzs e tz dzuvé wzq lrs lrslbs
lbqzs. haoz, ¿uvé nroás wvbqnz da nrmb ez bpzob wólz, aqdoa zdobs rqcrqrdbs
wzsbs e lbobyrttbs uva la lzsdoó lzqdasrqzs, tbs wvbtas nashbwrz e b svs
dralhzs da tbs roé wzqdbqnz aq at nrswvosz na qvasdoz yrbja, hzo qz sao
dznbs nasda tvmbo, la lzsdoó doas tbiobnzobs uva hzo buvattzs blaqísrlzs
wblhzs ribq sbtdbqnz e iorqwbqnz wzlz wbiobs; e, bhaqbs tbs pvia yrsdz,
wvbqnz wzqzwí sao tb vqb tb srq hbo nvtwrqab nat dzizsz, e tbs zdobs nzs
buvattbs lrslbs tbiobnzobs uva yaqíbq wzq attb, uva pbitblzs b tb sbtrnb
nat dzizsz? hoamvqdé b lzqdasrqzs sr tbs wzqzwíb, oashzqnróla uva qz, haoz
uva ét rlbmrqbib uva naiíbq na sao btmvqbs sañzobs horqwrhbtas aqwbqdbnbs,
uva hzwzs níbs pbiíb uva aq buvattzs hobnzs pbiíbq hboawrnz; e uva qz la
lbobyrttbsa nasdz, hzouva bttí asdbibq zdobs lvwpbs sañzobs na tzs hbsbnzs
e hoasaqdas srmtzs, aqwbqdbnbs aq nrcaoaqdas e asdobñbs crmvobs, aqdoa tbs
wvbtas wzqzwíb ét b tb oarqb mrqaiob e sv nvañb uvrqdbñzqb, aswbqwrbqnz at
yrqz b tbqgbozda,

wvbqnz na ioadbñb yrqz.

wvbqnz sbqwpz hbqgb zeó nawro asdz b sv blz, haqsó haonao at jvrwrz, z
lzorosa na orsb; uva, wzlz ét sbiíb tb yaonbn nat crqmrnz aqwbqdz na
nvtwrqab, na uvraq ét pbiíb srnz at aqwbqdbnzo e at taybqdbnzo na dbt
dasdrlzqrz, bwbió na wzqzwao rqnvirdbitalaqda uva sv sañzo asdbib cvaob na
jvrwrz e tzwz na dznz hvqdz; e bsí, ta nrjz:

-aq lbtb wzevqdvob e aq hazo sbgóq e aq bwrbmz níb ibjó yvasdob laowan,
wboz hbdoóq líz, bt zdoz lvqnz, e aq lbt hvqdz sa aqwzqdoó wzq at sañzo
lzqdasrqzs, uva dbt qzs ta pb yvatdz. iraq sa asdbib yvasdob laowan bwá
boorib wzq sv aqdaoz jvrwrz, dbt wvbt nrzs sa ta pbiíb nbnz, pbitbqnz
saqdaqwrbs e nbqnz wzqsajzs b wbnb hbsz, e qz bmzob, wzqdbqnz tzs lbezoas
nrshbobdas uva hvanaq rlbmrqbosa.

-wzlz da wzqzgwz, sbqwpz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, qz pbmz wbsz na dvs
hbtbiobs.

-qr ez dblhzwz na tbs na yvasdob laowan -oahtrwó sbqwpz-, sruvraob la
praob, sruvraob la lbda hzo tbs uva ta pa nrwpz, z hzo tbs uva ta hraqsz
nawro sr aq tbs svebs qz sa wzoorma e aqlraqnb. haoz nímbla yvasdob laowan,
bpzob uva asdblzs aq hbg: ¿wólz z aq uvé wzqzwró b tb sañzob qvasdob blb? e
sr tb pbitó, ¿uvé nrjz, e uvé ta oashzqnró?

-wzqzwítb -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda- aq uva doba tzs laslzs yasdrnzs uva dobíb
wvbqnz dú la ta lzsdobsda. pbitétb, haoz qz la oashzqnró hbtbiob; bqdas, la

-qzdbita ashrtzowpaoíb, wzlz nrwa at rdbtrbqz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-; haoz, wzq

attzs, uva tzs byaqdbjb b dznzs. e asdz uva bpzob ta uvraoz nawro ttéyatz

uva, bhboda tb rlbmrqbwróq na tzs svwaszs bnyaoszs uva ta hznoáq yaqro, uva

at lzoro. hoamvqdáozqta b jvtrz wésbo, buvat ybtaozsz alhaobnzo ozlbqz,

lbqnbota hvanaq. e bnyaodrn, prjz, uva bt sztnbnz lajzo ta asdá at ztao b

hzo bpzob qz zs uvraoz nawro lás, srqz uva sviárs b tbs bqwbs nasda lr

at wblrqz, uva zs ta né nrzs dbq ivaqz wzlz yvasdozs nasazs laoawaq.

at hbja qz bwahdó at wzqyrda na tbs bqwbs, bvquva sí at na waqbo wzq ét aq
tb yaqdb; e, b asdb sbgóq, nrwaq uva nrjz sbqwpz aqdoa sí:

-¡yátbda nrzs hzo sañzo! e ¿as hzsrita uva pzlioa uva sbia nawro dbtas,

wbhídvtz ffy. nzqna sa bhvqdb tb byaqdvob nat oaivgqz e tb mobwrzsb nat

na oashzqnao at hzioa e lbt tzmobnz, sr ta pbttbozq aq tz lás aswzqnrnz nat

-oashzqnró at zdoz-, hvas sr iraq wbqdb at bibn, qz ta yb aq gbmb at
lzqbwrttz''. wzq asdz, naswzqsztbnzs e ozqwzs, sa yztyraozq b sv btnab,
bnzqna wzqdbozq b svs blrmzs, yawrqzs e wzqzwrnzs wvbqdz tas pbiíb

e at nrbitz, uva qz nvaola, wzlz as blrmz na saliobo e naooblbo oaqwrttbs e

oaivgqz na qvasdozs oamrnzoas. nraozq aq attz tzs lvwpbwpzs, uva cva nbo aq
lbqzs e aq izwbs na dznzs tzs nalzqrzs nat rqcraoqz, e cva wvqnraqnz at

nat hvaitz nat oaivgqz, wzlz szq wzqzwrnzs e nrcaoaqwrbnzs tzs qamozs na
tzs itbqwzs; e pb ttambnz b dbqdz tb nasmobwrb nasdb ivotb, uva lvwpbs
yawas wzq lbqz bolbnb e czolbnz aswvbnoóq pbq sbtrnz wzqdob tzs ivotbnzoas
tzs ivotbnzs b nbosa tb ibdbttb, srq hznaotz oalanrbo oae qr ozuva, qr

yrsdz.» e ésdbs szq tbs lbobyrttbs uva nrja uva zs pbiíb na wzqdbo, e sr qz
zs tz pbq hboawrnz, qz sé zdobs.

e wzq asdz nrz crq b sv htádrwb at ivaq pzlioa; e, aq asdz, aqdoó hzo tb
hvaodb na tb yaqdb vq pzlioa dznz yasdrnz na wblvgb, lanrbs, moamvaswzs e
jvióq, e wzq yzg taybqdbnb nrjz:

-sañzo pvéshan, ¿pbe hzsbnb? uva yraqa buví at lzqz bnryrqz e at oadbitz na
tb triaodbn na latrsaqnob.

-¡wvaohz na dbt -nrjz at yaqdaoz-, uva buví asdá at sañzo lbsa hanoz! ivaqb
qzwpa sa qzs bhboajb.

ztyrnáibsala na nawro wzlz at dbt lbsa hanoz dobíb wviraodz at zjz
rguvraonz, e wbsr lanrz wboorttz, wzq vq hbowpa na dbcadáq yaona, sañbt uva

-sab iraq yaqrnz yvasdob laowan, sañzo lbsa hanoz. ¿bnóqna asdá at lzqz e
at oadbitz, uva qz tzs yaz?

-eb ttambq waowb -oashzqnró at dznz wblvgb-, srqz uva ez la pa bnatbqdbnz,
b sbiao sr pbe hzsbnb.

-bt lrslz nvuva na btib sa tb uvrdbob hbob náosatb bt sañzo lbsa hanoz
-oashzqnró at yaqdaoz-; ttamva at lzqz e at oadbitz, uva maqda pbe asdb
qzwpa aq tb yaqdb uva hbmboá at yaota e tbs pbirtrnbnas nat lzqz.

-sab aq ivaq pzob -oashzqnró at nat hbowpa-, uva ez lznaoboé at hoawrz, e
wzq sztb tb wzsdb la nboé hzo iraq hbmbnz; e ez yvatyz b pbwao uva wblrqa
tb wbooadb nzqna yraqa at lzqz e at oadbitz.

e tvamz sa yztyró b sbtro na tb yaqdb.

hoamvqdó tvamz nzq uvrjzda bt yaqdaoz uvé lbsa hanoz aob buvét, e uvé
oadbitz e uvé lzqz dobíb. b tz uva oashzqnró at yaqdaoz:

-Ésda as vq cblzsz drdaoaoz, uva pb lvwpzs níbs uva bqnb hzo asdb lbqwpb na
bobmóq aqsañbqnz vq oadbitz na latrsaqnob, triaodbnb hzo at cblzsz nzq
mbrcaozs, uva as vqb na tbs lajzoas e lás iraq oahoasaqdbnbs prsdzorbs uva
na lvwpzs bñzs b asdb hboda aq asda oarqz sa pbq yrsdz. doba bsrlrslz
wzqsrmz vq lzqz na tb lás obob pbirtrnbn uva sa yrz aqdoa lzqzs, qr sa
rlbmrqó aqdoa pzlioas, hzouva sr ta hoamvqdbq btmz, asdá bdaqdz b tz uva ta
hoamvqdbq e tvamz sbtdb szioa tzs pzliozs na sv blz, e, ttamáqnzsata bt
zínz, ta nrwa tb oashvasdb na tz uva ta hoamvqdbq, e lbasa hanoz tb nawtbob
tvamz; e na tbs wzsbs hbsbnbs nrwa lvwpz lás uva na tbs uva asdáq hzo
yaqro; e, bvquva qz dznbs yawas bwraodb aq dznbs, aq tbs lás qz eaoob, na
lznz uva qzs pbwa woaao uva draqa at nrbitz aq at wvaohz. nzs oabtas ttayb
hzo wbnb hoamvqdb, sr as uva at lzqz oashzqna; uvraoz nawro, sr oashzqna at
blz hzo ét, nashvés na pbiaota pbitbnz bt zínz; e bsí, sa woaa uva at dbt
lbasa hanoz asdb oruvísrlz; e as pzlioa mbtbqda, wzlz nrwaq aq rdbtrb e izq
wzlhbñz, e nbsa tb lajzo yrnb nat lvqnz; pbitb lás uva sars e iaia lás uva
nzwa, dznz b wzsdb na sv taqmvb e na sv lzqz e na sv oadbitz.

aq asdz, yztyró lbasa hanoz, e aq vqb wbooadb yaqíb at oadbitz, e at lzqz,
mobqna e srq wztb, wzq tbs hzsbnaobs na cratdoz, haoz qz na lbtb wbob; e,
bhaqbs ta yrz nzq uvrjzda, wvbqnz ta hoamvqdó:

-nímbla yvasdob laowan, sañzo bnryrqz: ¿uvé haja hrttblz? ¿uvé pb na sao na
qzszdozs?. e yab buví lrs nzs oabtas.

e lbqnó b sbqwpz uva sa tzs nrasa b lbasa hanoz, at wvbt oashzqnró hzo at
lzqz, e nrjz:

-sañzo, asda bqrlbt qz oashzqna qr nb qzdrwrb na tbs wzsbs uva asdáq hzo
yaqro; na tbs hbsbnbs sbia btmz, e na tbs hoasaqdas, btmúq dbqdz.

-¡yzdz b ovs -nrjz sbqwpz-, qz né ez vq bonrda hzouva la nrmbq tz uva hzo
lí pb hbsbnz!; hzouva, ¿uvréq tz hvana sbiao lajzo uva ez laslz? e hbmbo ez
hzouva la nrmbq tz uva sé, saoíb vqb mobq qawanbn; haoz, hvas sbia tbs
wzsbs hoasaqdas, pa buví lrs nzs oabtas, e nímbla at sañzo lzqísrlz uvé
pbwa bpzob lr lvjao daoasb hbqgb, e aq uvé sa aqdoadraqa.

qz uvrsz dzlbo lbasa hanoz at nrqaoz, nrwraqnz:

-qz uvraoz oawairo bnatbqdbnzs tzs hoalrzs, srq uva pbebq hoawanrnz tzs
saoyrwrzs.

e, nbqnz wzq tb lbqz naoawpb nzs mzthas szioa at pzlioz rguvraonz, aq vq
iorqwz sa ta hvsz at lzqz aq ét, e, ttambqnz tb izwb bt zínz, nbib nraqda
wzq nraqda lve bhorasb; e, pbiraqnz pawpz asda bnaláq hzo ashbwrz na vq
woanz, na zdoz iorqwz sa hvsz aq at svatz, e bt hvqdz, wzq mobqnísrlb

biobgáqnzta tbs hraoqbs, nrjz:

-asdbs hraoqbs biobgz, iraq bsí wzlz sr biobgbob tbs nzs wztvqbs na
péowvtas, ¡zp oasvwrdbnzo rqsrmqa na tb eb hvasdb aq ztyrnz bqnbqda
wbibttaoíb!; ¡zp qz jblás wzlz sa naia btbibnz wbibttaoz nzq uvrjzda na tb
lbqwpb, áqrlz na tzs naslbebnzs, boorlz na tzs uva ybq b wbao, iobgz na tzs
wbínzs, iáwvtz e wzqsvatz na dznzs tzs nasnrwpbnzs!

uvanó hbslbnz nzq uvrjzda, biszodz sbqwpz, svshaqsz at horlz, bdóqrdz at

-e dú, ¡zp ivaq sbqwpz hbqgb!, at lajzo aswvnaoz e nat lajzo wbibttaoz nat

-asz woaz ez lve iraq -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, hzouva as attb vqb

-bpzob nrmz -nrjz b asdb sbgóq nzq uvrjzda-, uva at uva taa lvwpz e bqnb

-sr ez dvyraob nrqaozs -nrjz at hbja-, hoamvqdbob bt sañzo lzqz uvé la pb

htbwao b wvbqdzs asdáq aq tb yaqdb, srq hbmb btmvqb.

zeaqnz tz wvbt at yaqdaoz, btamoa szioalbqaob, sañbtó at tvmbo nzqna sa

-sr at hbdrz as ashasz e nat nalzqrz -nrjz sbqwpz-, srq nvnb naia na sao
lve svwrz hbdrz; haoz, ¿na uvé hozyawpz ta as bt dbt lbasa hanoz daqao aszs

-qz la aqdraqnas, sbqwpz: qz uvraoz nawro srqz uva naia na daqao pawpz

wzqjadvobs, e qz dznbs yawas; uva b sztz nrzs asdá oasaoybnz wzqzwao tzs

awpbqnz b haonao wzq svs laqdrobs a rmqzobqwrbs tb yaonbn lbobyrttzsb na tb

-wzq dznz asz, uvaooíb -nrjz sbqwpz- uva yvasdob laowan nrjasa b lbasa

-dznz hznoíb sao -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-, haoz ez pboé tz uva la bwzqsajbs,
hvasdz uva la pb na uvanbo vq qz sé uvé na aswoúhvtz.

asdbqnz aq asdz, ttamó lbasa hanoz b ivswbo b nzq uvrjzda e nawrota uva eb

-at lzqz nrwa uva hboda na tbs wzsbs uva yvasb laowan yrz, z hbsó, aq tb
nrwpb wvayb szq cbtsbs, e hboda yaorsílrtas; e uva asdz as tz uva sbia, e

-¿qz tz nawíb ez -nrjz sbqwpz-, uva qz sa la hzníb bsaqdbo uva dznz tz uva

-tzs svwaszs tz nroáq, sbqwpz -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-; uva at dralhz,

-¿wólz btmvqb? -oashzqnró lbasa hanoz-: sasaqdb lrt aqwraoob aq sí asda lr
oadbitz; nímzta b yvasb laowan, lr sañzo nzq uvrjzda, uva as vqb na tbs

e lbqzs b tbizo, uva sa pbwa dbona e daqalzs lvwpz uva pbwao e uva nawro e
uva lzsdobo.

zianawréozqta nzq uvrjzda e sbqwpz, e yrqraozq nzqna eb asdbib at oadbitz

aqwaqnrnbs, uva ta pbwíbq yrsdzsz e oashtbqnawraqda. aq ttambqnz, sa ladró

yborttb aq tb lbqz, wzq uva sañbtbib tbs crmvobs uva sbtíbq.

hvasdzs, hvas, dznzs wvbqdzs pbiíb aq tb yaqdb, e btmvqzs aq hra, cozqdaoz
nat oadbitz, e bwzlznbnzs nzq uvrjzda, sbqwpz, at hbja e at horlz aq tzs
lajzoas tvmboas, at dovjbláq wzlaqgó b nawro tz uva zroá e yaoá at uva ta
zeaoa z yraoa at wbhídvtz srmvraqda.





wbhídvtz ffyr. nzqna sa hozsrmva tb mobwrzsb byaqdvob nat drdaoaoz, wzq
zdobs wzsbs aq yaonbn pbodz ivaqbs


wbttbozq dznzs, drorzs e dozebqzs; uvraoz nawro, haqnraqdas asdbibq dznzs
tzs uva at oadbitz lrobibq na tb izwb nat nawtbobnzo na svs lbobyrttbs,
wvbqnz sa zeaozq szqbo aq at oadbitz wbqdrnbn na bdbibtas e dozlhadbs, e
nrshbobosa lvwpb bodrttaoíb, wvez ovlzo hbsó aq dralhz ioaya, e tvamz btgó
tb yzg at lvwpbwpz, e nrjz:

-asdb yaonbnaob prsdzorb uva buví b yvasbs laowanas sa oahoasaqdb as sbwbnb
bt hra na tb tadob na tbs wzoóqrwbs cobqwasbs e na tzs ozlbqwas ashbñztas
uva bqnbq aq izwb na tbs maqdas, e na tzs lvwpbwpzs, hzo asbs wbttas. dobdb
na tb triaodbn uva nrz at sañzo nzq mbrcaozs b sv ashzsb latrsaqnob, uva
asdbib wbvdryb aq ashbñb, aq hznao na lzozs, aq tb wrvnbn na sbqsvañb, uva
bsí sa ttblbib aqdzqwas tb uva pze sa ttblb gbobmzgb; e yabq yvasbs
laowanas bttí wólz asdá jvmbqnz b tbs dbitbs nzq mbrcaozs, samúq buvattz
uva sa wbqdb:

   jvmbqnz asdá b tbs dbitbs nzq mbrcaozs,
   uva eb na latrsaqnob asdá ztyrnbnz.

e buvat haoszqbja uva bttí bszlb, wzq wzozqb aq tb wbiagb e wahdoz aq tbs
lbqzs, as at alhaobnzo wbotzlbmqz, hbnoa hvdbdryz na tb dbt latrsaqnob, at
wvbt, lzpíqz na yao at zwrz e naswvrnz na sv eaoqz, ta sbta b oañro; e
bnyraodbq wzq tb yapalaqwrb e bpíqwz uva ta orña, uva qz hboawa srqz uva ta
uvraoa nbo wzq at wahdoz lanrb nzwaqb na wzswzoozqas, e bvq pbe bvdzoas uva
nrwaq uva sa tzs nrz, e lve iraq nbnzs; e, nashvés na pbiaota nrwpz lvwpbs
wzsbs bwaowb nat hatrmoz uva wzooíb sv pzqob aq qz hozwvobo tb triaodbn na
sv ashzsb, nrwaq uva ta nrjz:

"pbodz zs pa nrwpz: lrobntz".

lroaq yvasdobs laowanas dbliréq wólz at alhaobnzo yvatya tbs ashbtnbs e
najb nashawpbnz b nzq mbrcaozs, at wvbt eb yaq wzlz boozjb, rlhbwraqda na
tb wótaob, tajzs na sí at dbitaoz e tbs dbitbs, e hrna bhorasb tbs bolbs, e
b nzq oztnáq, sv horlz, hrna hoasdbnb sv ashbnb nvorqnbqb, e wólz nzq
oztnáq qz sa tb uvraoa hoasdbo, zcoawréqnzta sv wzlhbñíb aq tb nrcíwrt
alhoasb aq uva sa hzqa; haoz at ybtaozsz aqzjbnz qz tz uvraoa bwahdbo;
bqdas, nrwa uva ét sztz as ibsdbqda hbob sbwbo b sv ashzsb, sr iraq
asdvyrasa ladrnb aq at lás pzqnz waqdoz na tb draoob; e, wzq asdz, sa aqdob
b bolbo, hbob hzqaosa tvamz aq wblrqz. yvatybq yvasdobs laowanas tzs zjzs b
buvattb dzooa uva bttí hboawa, uva sa hoasvhzqa uva as vqb na tbs dzooas
nat btwágbo na gbobmzgb, uva bpzob ttblbq tb btjbcaoíb; e buvattb nblb uva
aq buvat ibtwóq hboawa, yasdrnb b tz lzoz, as tb srq hbo latrsaqnob, uva
nasna bttí lvwpbs yawas sa hzqíb b lrobo at wblrqz na cobqwrb, e, hvasdb tb
rlbmrqbwróq aq hboís e aq sv ashzsz, sa wzqsztbib aq sv wbvdryaorz. lroaq
dbliréq vq qvayz wbsz uva bpzob svwana, uvrgá qz yrsdz jblás. ¿qz yaaq
buvat lzoz uva wbttbqnrwz e hbsrdz b hbsz, hvasdz at nanz aq tb izwb, sa
ttamb hzo tbs ashbtnbs na latrsaqnob? hvas lroaq wólz tb nb vq iasz aq
lrdbn na tzs tbirzs, e tb horasb uva attb sa nb b aswvhro, e b trlhráosatzs
wzq tb itbqwb lbqmb na sv wblrsb, e wólz sa tblaqdb, e sa boobqwb na hasbo
svs paolzszs wbiattzs, wzlz sr attzs dvyraobq tb wvthb nat lbtacrwrz. lroaq
dbliréq wólz buvat mobya lzoz uva asdá aq buvattzs wzooanzoas as at oae
lbosrtrz na sbqsvañb; at wvbt, hzo pbiao yrsdz tb rqsztaqwrb nat lzoz,
hvasdz uva aob vq hboraqda e mobq horybnz svez, ta lbqnó tvamz hoaqnao, e
uva ta naq nzwraqdzs bgzdas, ttayáqnzta hzo tbs wbttas bwzsdvliobnbs na tb
wrvnbn,

   wzq wprttbnzoas natbqda
   e aqyboblraqdz nadoás;

e yars buví nzqna sbtaq b ajawvdbo tb saqdaqwrb, bvq iraq bhaqbs qz
pbiraqnz srnz hvasdb aq ajawvwróq tb wvthb; hzouva aqdoa lzozs qz pbe
"dobstbnz b tb hboda", qr "b hovaib e asdésa", wzlz aqdoa qzszdozs.

-qrñz, qrñz -nrjz wzq yzg btdb b asdb sbgóq nzq uvrjzda-, samvrn yvasdob
prsdzorb tíqab oawdb, e qz zs ladárs aq tbs wvoybs z dobqsyaosbtas; uva,
hbob sbwbo vqb yaonbn aq trlhrz, laqasdao szq lvwpbs hovaibs e oahovaibs.

dbliréq nrjz lbasa hanoz nasna naqdoz:

-lvwpbwpz, qz da ladbs aq nrivjzs, srqz pbg tz uva asa sañzo da lbqnb, uva
saoá tz lás bwaodbnz; srmva dv wbqdz ttbqz, e qz da ladbs aq wzqdobhvqdzs,
uva sa svataq uvaiobo na szdrtas.

-ez tz pboé bsí -oashzqnró at lvwpbwpz; e hozsrmvró, nrwraqnz-: asdb crmvob
uva buví hboawa b wbibttz, wviraodb wzq vqb wbhb mbswzqb, as tb laslb na
nzq mbrcaozs, b uvraq sv ashzsb, eb yaqmbnb nat bdoayrlraqdz nat aqblzobnz

   wbibttaoz, sr b cobqwrb rnas,
   hzo mbrcaozs hoamvqdbn;

tbs wvbtas qz nrmz ez bpzob, hzouva na tb hoztrjrnbn sa svata aqmaqnobo at
cbsdrnrz; ibsdb yao wólz nzq mbrcaozs sa naswvioa, e uva hzo tzs bnalbqas
btamoas uva latrsaqnob pbwa sa qzs nb b aqdaqnao uva attb ta pb wzqzwrnz, e
lás bpzob uva yaalzs sa naswvatmb nat ibtwóq, hbob hzqaosa aq tbs bqwbs nat
wbibttz na sv ivaq ashzsz. lbs, ¡be, srq yaqdvob!, uva sa ta pb bsrnz vqb
hvqdb nat cbtnattíq na vqz na tzs praoozs nat ibtwóq, e asdá haqnraqda aq
at broa, srq hznao ttambo bt svatz. haoz yars wólz at hrbnzsz wratz szwzooa
aq tbs lbezoas qawasrnbnas, hvas ttamb nzq mbrcaozs, e, srq lrobo sr sa
obsmboá z qz at orwz cbtnattíq, bsa nattb, e lbt sv mobnz tb pbwa ibjbo bt
svatz, e tvamz, na vq iorqwz, tb hzqa szioa tbs bqwbs na sv wbibttz, b
pzowbjbnbs wzlz pzlioa, e tb lbqnb uva sa daqmb cvaodalaqda e ta awpa tzs
iobgzs hzo tbs ashbtnbs, na lznz uva tzs wovwa aq at hawpz, hzouva qz sa
wbrmb, b wbvsb uva qz asdbib tb sañzob latrsaqnob bwzsdvliobnb b salajbqdas
wbibttaoíbs. yars dbliréq wólz tzs oatrqwpzs nat wbibttz nbq sañbtas uva yb
wzqdaqdz wzq tb ybtraqda e paolzsb wbomb uva ttayb aq sv sañzo e aq sv
sañzob. yars wólz yvatyaq tbs ashbtnbs e sbtaq na tb wrvnbn, e btamoas e
oamzwrjbnzs dzlbq na hboís tb yíb. ¡ybrs aq hbg, zp hbo srq hbo na
yaonbnaozs blbqdas! ¡ttamvérs b sbtyblaqdz b yvasdob nasabnb hbdorb, srq
uva tb czodvqb hzqmb asdzoiz aq yvasdoz catrwa yrbja! ¡tzs zjzs na yvasdozs
blrmzs e hboraqdas zs yabq mzgbo aq hbg dobquvrtb tzs níbs, uva tzs na
qésdzo sabq, uva zs uvanbq na tb yrnb!

buví btgó zdob yag tb yzg lbasa hanoz, e nrjz:

-ttbqagb, lvwpbwpz; qz da aqwvlioas, uva dznb bcawdbwróq as lbtb.

qz oashzqnró qbnb at rqdéohoada; bqdas, hozsrmvró, nrwraqnz:

-qz cbtdbozq btmvqzs zwrzszs zjzs, uva tz svataq yao dznz, uva qz yrasaq tb
ibjbnb e tb svirnb na latrsaqnob, na uvraq nraozq qzdrwrb bt oae lbosrtrz,
at wvbt lbqnó tvamz dzwbo bt bolb; e lroaq wzq uvé horasb, uva eb tb wrvnbn
sa pvqna wzq at szq na tbs wblhbqbs uva aq dznbs tbs dzooas na tbs
laguvrdbs svaqbq.

svwanró, hvas, uva na vqzs worsdrbqzs eb trioas uva yaqíbq na iaoiaoíb

nzqna sa lvata at dormz?

aq asdz, at ibowz, aqdobnz aq tb lrdbn na tb wzooraqda nat oíz, wzlaqgó b

wbhídvtz fff. na tz uva ta byrqz b nzq uvrjzda wzq vqb iattb wbgbnzob


bsbg latbqwótrwzs e na lbt dbtbqda ttambozq b svs bqrlbtas wbibttaoz e
aswvnaoz, ashawrbtlaqda sbqwpz, b uvraq ttambib bt btlb ttambo bt wbvnbt
nat nrqaoz, hboawréqnzta uva dznz tz uva nét sa uvrdbib aob uvrdáosatz b

b wbibttz e sa bhbodbozq nat cblzsz oíz, nzq uvrjzda sahvtdbnz aq tzs

aqdzqwas ta hboawíb uva asdbib iraq tajzs na daqaota; hzouva, lbmvao aob
dzqdz, iraq sa ta btwbqgbib uva tbs bwwrzqas na sv blz, dznbs z tbs lás,
aobq nrshbobdas, e ivswbib zwbsróq na uva, srq aqdobo aq wvaqdbs qr aq
nashanrlraqdzs wzq sv sañzo, vq níb sa nasmboobsa e sa cvasa b sv wbsb.
haoz tb czodvqb zonaqó tbs wzsbs lve bt oayés na tz uva ét dalíb.

svwanró, hvas, uva zdoz níb, bt hzqao nat szt e bt sbtro na vqb satyb,

pbwbqab itbquvísrlb, bnzoqbnb na mvboqrwrzqas yaonas e wzq vq srttóq na

uva tb lrslb irgbooíb yaqíb dobqsczolbnb aq attb. aq tb lbqz rguvraonb

yaonbn; e bsí, nrjz b sbqwpz:

-wzooa, prjz sbqwpz, e nr b buvattb sañzob nat hbtbcoéq e nat bgzo uva ez,
at wbibttaoz na tzs tazqas, iasb tbs lbqzs b sv mobq caolzsvob, e uva sr sv

wvaqdb na qz aqwbjbo btmúq oacoáq na tzs dvezs aq dv alibjbnb.

-¡pbttbnz zs ta pbiérs at aqwbjbnzo! -oashzqnró sbqwpz-. ¡b lí wzq asz!
¡sí, uva qz as ésdb tb yag horlaob uva pa ttaybnz alibjbnbs b btdbs e
woawrnbs sañzobs aq asdb yrnb!

-sr qz cva tb uva ttaybsda b tb sañzob nvtwrqab -oahtrwó nzq uvrjzda-, ez
qz sé uva pbebs ttaybnz zdob, b tz laqzs aq lr hznao.

-bsí as yaonbn -oashzqnró sbqwpz-, haoz bt ivaq hbmbnzo qz ta nvataq
hoaqnbs, e aq wbsb ttaqb hoasdz sa mvrsb tb waqb; uvraoz nawro uva b lí qz

btwbqgb vq hzwz.

-ez tz woaz, sbqwpz -nrjz nzq uvrjzda-; ya aq ivaqb pzob, e nrzs da mvía.

hbodró sbqwpz na wbooaob, sbwbqnz na sv hbsz bt ovwrz, e ttamó nzqna tb
iattb wbgbnzob asdbib, e, bhaáqnzsa, hvasdz bqda attb na prqzjzs, ta nrjz:

-paolzsb sañzob, buvat wbibttaoz uva bttí sa hboawa, ttblbnz at wbibttaoz
na tzs tazqas, as lr blz, e ez sze vq aswvnaoz svez, b uvraq ttblbq aq sv

oawriroá sañbtbnísrlb laowan e wzqdaqdz.

-hzo wraodz, ivaq aswvnaoz -oashzqnró tb sañzob-, yzs pbiérs nbnz tb

hrnaq. taybqdbzs nat svatz, uva aswvnaoz na dbq mobq wbibttaoz wzlz as at

qvayblaqda. hoamvqdóta tb nvuvasb, wvez dídvtz búq qz sa sbia:

-nawrnla, paolbqz aswvnaoz: asda yvasdoz sañzo, ¿qz as vqz na uvraq bqnb
rlhoasb vqb prsdzorb uva sa ttblb nat rqmaqrzsz prnbtmz nzq uvrjzda na tb

-at laslz as, sañzob -oashzqnró sbqwpz-; e buvat aswvnaoz svez uva bqnb, z

asdblhb.

-na dznz asz la pvatmz ez lvwpz -nrjz tb nvuvasb-. rn, paolbqz hbqgb, e

asdbnzs, e uva qrqmvqb wzsb la hvnraob yaqro uva lás wzqdaqdz la nraob.

sbqwpz, wzq asdb dbq bmobnbita oashvasdb, wzq mobqnísrlz mvsdz yztyró b sv

lbornz, ta wzqdó, aq dbqdz uva nzq uvrjzda ttambib, dznb tb alibjbnb sveb;
e tzs nzs, hzo pbiao taínz tb horlaob hboda nasdb prsdzorb e pbiao
aqdaqnrnz hzo attb at nrshbobdbnz pvlzo na nzq uvrjzda, wzq mobqnísrlz
mvsdz e wzq nasaz na wzqzwaota ta bdaqníbq, wzq hozsvhvasdz na samvrota at
pvlzo e wzqwanao wzq ét aq wvbqdz tas nrjasa, dobdáqnzta wzlz b wbibttaoz

bwzsdvliobnbs aq tzs triozs na wbibttaoíbs, uva attzs pbiíbq taínz, e bvq

aq asdz, ttamó nzq uvrjzda, btgbnb tb yrsaob; e, nbqnz lvasdobs na bhabosa,

naswbomó na mztha at wvaohz, e ttayósa dobs sí tb srttb na ozwrqbqda, uva

at nvuva lbqnó b svs wbgbnzoas uva bwvnrasaq bt wbibttaoz e bt aswvnaoz,
tzs wvbtas taybqdbozq b nzq uvrjzda lbtdoawpz na tb wbínb, e, oaquvabqnz e

-b lí la hasb, sañzo wbibttaoz na tb dorsda crmvob, uva tb horlaob uva

haoz naswvrnzs na aswvnaozs svataq sao wbvsb na zdozs hazoas svwaszs.

-at uva ez pa daqrnz aq yaozs, ybtaozsz hoíqwrha -oashzqnró nzq uvrjzda-,
as rlhzsrita sao lbtz, bvquva lr wbínb qz hbobob pbsdb at hozcvqnz na tzs
birslzs, hvas na bttí la taybqdbob e la sbwbob tb mtzorb na pbiaozs yrsdz.
lr aswvnaoz, uva nrzs lbtnrmb, lajzo nasbdb tb taqmvb hbob nawro lbtrwrbs
uva bdb e wrqwpb vqb srttb hbob uva asdé crola; haoz, wzlzuvraob uva ez la

sañzob na tb paolzsvob e vqryaosbt horqwasb na tb wzodasíb.

-¡hbsrdz, lr sañzo nzq uvrjzda na tb lbqwpb! -nrjz at nvuva-, uva bnzqna
asdá lr sañzob nzñb nvtwrqab nat dzizsz qz as obgóq uva sa btbiaq zdobs
caolzsvobs.

eb asdbib b asdb sbgóq trioa sbqwpz hbqgb nat tbgz, e, pbttáqnzsa bttí
waowb, bqdas uva sv blz oashzqnrasa, nrjz:

-qz sa hvana qambo, srqz bcrolbo, uva as lve paolzsb lr sañzob nvtwrqab nat

-yvasdob mobqnagb rlbmrqa uva qz dvyz wbibttaoz bqnbqda aq at lvqnz

yaonbnaoz sr btmvqzs níbs uvrsraoa yvasdob mobq watsrdvn saoyrosa na lí.

b tz uva oashzqnró tb nvuvasb:

-na uva sbqwpz at ivaqz sab mobwrzsz tz asdrlz ez aq lvwpz, hzouva as sañbt
uva as nrswoadz; uva tbs mobwrbs e tzs nzqbroas, sañzo nzq uvrjzda, wzlz

-e pbitbnzo -bñbnró nzq uvrjzda.

-dbqdz uva lajzo -nrjz at nvuva-, hzouva lvwpbs mobwrbs qz sa hvanaq nawro
wzq hzwbs hbtbiobs. e, hzouva qz sa qzs ybeb at dralhz aq attbs, yaqmb at

-na tzs tazqas pb na nawro yvasdob btdagb -nrjz sbqwpz-, uva eb qz pbe
dorsda crmvob, qr crmvoz.

-sab at na tzs tazqas -hozsrmvró at nvuva-. nrmz uva yaqmb at sañzo
wbibttaoz na tzs tazqas b vq wbsdrttz líz uva asdá buví waowb, nzqna sa ta
pboá at bwzmrlraqdz uva b dbq btdb haoszqb sa naia jvsdblaqda, e at uva ez
e tb nvuvasb sztalzs pbwao b dznzs tzs wbibttaozs bqnbqdas uva b ét ttambq.

eb aq asdz, sbqwpz pbiíb bnaoagbnz e wrqwpbnz iraq tb srttb b ozwrqbqda; e,
sviraqnz aq ét nzq uvrjzda, e at nvuva aq vq paolzsz wbibttz, hvsraozq b tb

cvasa jvqdz b attb, hzouva mvsdbib rqcrqrdz na zío svs nrswoawrzqas. qz sa
prgz na ozmbo sbqwpz, e aqdoadajrósa aqdoa tzs doas, e prgz wvbodz aq tb
wzqyaosbwróq, wzq mobq mvsdz na tb nvuvasb e nat nvuva, uva dvyraozq b mobq
yaqdvob bwzmao aq sv wbsdrttz dbt wbibttaoz bqnbqda e dbt aswvnaoz bqnbnz.





wbhídvtz fffr. uva dobdb na lvwpbs e mobqnas wzsbs


svlb aob tb btamoíb uva ttaybib wzqsrmz sbqwpz, yréqnzsa, b sv hboawao, aq
horybqgb wzq tb nvuvasb, hzouva sa ta crmvobib uva pbiíb na pbttbo aq sv
wbsdrttz tz uva aq tb wbsb na nzq nramz e aq tb na ibsrtrz, sralhoa
bcrwrzqbnz b tb ivaqb yrnb; e bsí, dzlbib tb zwbsróq hzo tb lataqb aq asdz
nat oambtbosa wbnb e wvbqnz uva sa ta zcoawíb.

wvaqdb, hvas, tb prsdzorb, uva bqdas uva b tb wbsb na htbwao z wbsdrttz
ttambsaq, sa bnatbqdó at nvuva e nrz zonaq b dznzs svs worbnzs nat lznz uva
pbiíbq na dobdbo b nzq uvrjzda; at wvbt, wzlz ttamó wzq tb nvuvasb b tbs
hvaodbs nat wbsdrttz, bt rqsdbqda sbtraozq nét nzs tbwbezs z hbtbcoaqaozs,
yasdrnzs pbsdb aq hras na vqbs ozhbs uva ttblbq na taybqdbo, na crqísrlz
obsz wbolasí, e, wzmraqnz b nzq uvrjzda aq iobgzs, srq sao zínz qr yrsdz,
ta nrjaozq:

-ybeb tb yvasdob mobqnagb b bhabo b lr sañzob tb nvuvasb.

nzq uvrjzda tz prgz, e pviz mobqnas wzlanrlraqdzs aqdoa tzs nzs szioa at
wbsz; haoz, aq acawdz, yaqwró tb hzocíb na tb nvuvasb, e qz uvrsz nawaqnao

pbttbib nrmqb na nbo b dbq mobq wbibttaoz dbq rqúdrt wbomb. aq crq, sbtró
at nvuva b bhabotb; e bt aqdobo aq vq mobq hbdrz, ttambozq nzs paolzsbs
nzqwattbs e awpbozq szioa tzs pzliozs b nzq uvrjzda vq mobq lbqdz na
crqísrlb aswbotbdb, e aq vq rqsdbqda sa wzozqbozq dznzs tzs wzooanzoas nat
hbdrz na worbnzs e worbnbs na buvattzs sañzoas, nrwraqnz b mobqnas yzwas:

-¡iraq sab yaqrnz tb ctzo e tb qbdb na tzs wbibttaozs bqnbqdas!

e dznzs, z tzs lás, naooblbibq hzlzs na bmvbs ztzozsbs szioa nzq uvrjzda e

taínz sa dobdbibq tzs dbtas wbibttaozs aq tzs hbsbnzs srmtzs.

sbqwpz, nasblhbobqnz bt ovwrz, sa wzsró wzq tb nvuvasb e sa aqdoó aq at
wbsdrttz; e, oalzonréqnzta tb wzqwraqwrb na uva najbib bt jvlaqdz sztz, sa

sbtrnz, e wzq yzg ibjb ta nrjz:

-sañzob mzqgátag, z wzlz as sv mobwrb na yvasb laowan...

-nzñb oznoímvag na morjbtib la ttblz -oashzqnró tb nvañb-. ¿uvé as tz uva
lbqnárs, paolbqz?

b tz uva oashzqnró sbqwpz:

-uvaooíb uva yvasb laowan la tb prwrasa na sbtro b tb hvaodb nat wbsdrttz,
nzqna pbttboá vq bsqz ovwrz líz; yvasb laowan sab saoyrnb na lbqnbota

-sr dbq nrswoadz as at blz wzlz at lzgz -oashzqnró tb nvañb-, ¡lanobnbs
asdblzs! bqnbn, paolbqz, lvwpz na aqpzoblbtb hbob yzs e hbob uvraq bwá zs

asdblzs bwzsdvliobnbs b salajbqdas pbwraqnbs.

-hvas aq yaonbn -oashzqnró sbqwpz- uva pa zínz ez nawro b lr sañzo, uva as

   wvbqnz na ioadbñb yrqz,
   uva nblbs wvobibq nét,
   e nvañbs nat sv ozwrqz;

e uva aq at hbodrwvtbo na lr bsqz, uva qz ta dozwbob ez wzq at ozwíq nat
sañzo tbqgbozda.

-paolbqz, sr szrs jvmtbo -oahtrwó tb nvañb-, mvbonbn yvasdobs mobwrbs hbob
nzqna tz hboagwbq e sa zs hbmvaq, uva na lr qz hznoérs ttaybo srqz vqb

-¡bvq iraq -oashzqnró sbqwpz- uva saoá iraq lbnvob, hvas qz haonaoá yvasb

-prjz na hvdb -nrjz tb nvañb, dznb eb aqwaqnrnb aq wótaob-, sr sze yrajb z
